loans.name: Blanca Flor

texts.es: Blanca tiene 30 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su familia. Ella se dedica al comercio de productos de primera necesidad en una pequeña tienda que ha logrado establecer en su casa de residencia. Blanca desea mejorar el techo de su vivienda por lo que ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de madera y tejas. De esta forma espera poder mejorar sus condiciones y las de su familia.
texts.en:
Blanca is 30 years old and lives in her own home together with her family. She makes her living selling basic grocery goods in a small store which she managed to set up in her home. 

Blanca wants to improve the roof of her house, which is why she has taken the decision to seek this loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of wood and tiles: in this manner she hopes to improve the living conditions of her own and those of her family.

loans.use: to buy wood and tiles to repair the roof of her home.

loans.name: Queli Yamilex

texts.es: Queli tiene 34 años de edad y habita en casa  propia junto a sus hijas de 12 años, 8 años y su hijo de 14 años de edad. Queli se dedica a la venta de ropa nueva dentro de su vivienda y de forma ambulante. Queli trabaja muy duro para sacar adelante a su familia y desea mejorar sus condiciones. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de materiales como: cemento, arena y ladrillo para construir una pila con lavadero y un baño y además desea encementar el piso del corredor de la vivienda si le alcanza.
texts.en:
Queli, 34, lives in her own house with her daughters, ages 8 and 12, and her 14-year-old son. Queli sells new clothing from her home and as a traveling saleswoman. She works very hard to provide for her family and she hopes to improve their living conditions.

She has decided to apply for this loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of materials such as: cement, sand, and bricks to build a washbasin with a laundry area and a bath. She would also like to cement the floor of the hallway in her house if there is enough money.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, and bricks to build a large basin with a laundry area and a bath, and to cement the floor of the hallway in her house.

loans.name: Blanca Maribel

texts.es: Blanca es una joven de 20 años de edad quien se gana la vida trabajando como empleada en una empresa cercana a su localidad. Ella habita en casa propia junto a su pequeño hijo de 2 años de edad quien es su principal motor para seguir luchando por mejores condiciones de vida. Con el fin de mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la instalación de luz eléctrica en su vivienda y para comprar láminas y madera para terminar de construir la vivienda.
texts.en:
Blanca is a 20 year old young woman.  She earns a living working as an employee of a business close to her area.  She lives in her own house with her little two year old son.  He is her main drive in order to continue struggling for better living conditions.

In order to improve their living conditions, she is requesting this loan from FUSAI to install electricity in her house.  She will also buy laminated metal sheeting and wood to finish building her house.

loans.use: to install electricity in her house and to buy laminated metal sheeting and wood to finish building her house.

loans.name: Maria Alicia

texts.es: María tiene 35 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a sus padres de 66 y 68 años de edad. María trabaja como empleada en una empresa cercana de su localidad lo cual le permite percibir un ingreso que le sirve para llevar el sustento a su hogar. María desea construir una pila con baño para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento y arena. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento y así poder proceder a la construcción lo antes posible.
texts.en:
María is 35 years old and lives in her own home along with her parents, ages 66 and 68. She is employed at a business near her town, which allows her to earn an income for sustaining her household.

María wants to build a bathroom with a water basin, so she is requesting a loan from FUSAI. She will invest in the purchase of bricks, cement, and sand. She hopes to receive this loan so that she can proceed with the construction as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, and sand for building a bathroom with a water basin.

loans.name: Carlos Rafael

texts.es: Carlos tiene 31 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos y su abuelo. Carlos es un hombre trabajador quien se gana la vida por medio de la realización de viajes de ganado los cuales transporta de una comunidad a otra por lo que recibe un ingreso que le permite llevar el sustento a su hogar. Carlos es muy visionario y siempre esta pendiente de su familia. Con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado construir su vivienda pero por falta de recursos no ha podido comprar las puertas y ventanas de la misma por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ventanas y puertas que le permitan dar mayor seguridad a su vivienda.
texts.en:
Carlos is 31 years old and lives in his own house with his life companion, his two children and his grandfather. Carlos is a hard-working man who makes his living through moving cattle which he transports from one community to another. He receives income from doing this which allows him to support his family. Carlos is quite far-sighted and always watches out for his family. 

With a lot of effort he has manged to build his house but due to lack of resources he has not yet bought the doors and windows. So he is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of windows and doors that will allow for greater security for his home.

loans.use: to buy doors and windows for his house.

loans.name: Silvia Elena

texts.es: Silvia tiene 59 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su familia. Ella es una mujer admirable quien a pesar se sus años no se cansa de luchar por mejores condiciones de vida. Silvia  posee un pequeño comedor donde ofrece variedad de platillos. Tiene mucho tiempo de contar con este negocio por lo que ya posee mucha clientela. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI dado que desea invertir en su negocio con el fin de abarcar una mayor cuota de mercado que le permita aumentar sus ingresos. Con el monto solicitado comprará verduras, cereales, carnes, aceite, bebidas,etc.
texts.en:
Silvia is 59 years old and lives with her family in a house of their own. She is an admirable woman, who despite her age works restlessly to improve her quality of life. Silvia owns a small restaurant where she offers a wide variety of dishes. She has had this business for a long time, so she has now a good customer base.

Silvia has decided to request this loan at FUSAI, since she wants to invest in her business in order to attract more customers and increase her income. With the requested amount she will buy vegetables, cereals, different kinds of meat, oil, beverages, etc.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, cereals, different kinds of meat, oil, beverages, etc.

loans.name: Isbelia Zuleyma

texts.es: Isbelia tiene 25 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y pequeño hijo de un año de edad. Isbelia es muy trabajadora y responsable ya que hace todo lo que que este a su alcance para llevar el sustento a su hogar. Ella se dedica  a la venta de ropa de forma ambulante y ademas es promotora de salud dentro de su comunidad. Con el fin de dar mejores condiciones habitacionales a su familia ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI dado que desea encementar el piso de la vivienda para lo cual necesita materiales como: cemento, arena, y ladrillo. De esta forma espera mejorar las condiciones de su querida familia.
texts.en:
Isbelia is 25 years old and lives in her own home along with her husband and small one-year-old son. Isbelia is very hard-working and responsible since she does all that is within her power to bring sustenance to her home. She makes a living through the sale of clothing on foot, and furthermore promotes health within her community. 

With the goal of providing better living conditions to her family, she has made the decision to request this loan from FUSAI. She wishes to pave the floor of her home for which she needs materials such as: cement, sand, and bricks. In this way, she hopes to improve her dear family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, and bricks to pave the floor of her home.

loans.name: Maria Eulogia

texts.es: María tiene 49 años de edad y reside en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y su madre quien depende económicamente de ella. María se ocupa de los oficios domésticos y junto a su esposo van saliendo adelante y tratan de dar mejores condiciones de vida a su familia. María desea invertir en la construcción de un baño y una pila para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para comprar los materiales necesarios como: ladrillo, arena, cemento, hierro y lámina. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento y así dar inicio a la construcción lo antes posible.
texts.en: Maria is 49 years old and lives in her own house with her life companion and her mother, who depends on her economically. Maria does domestic work, and she and her husband are making progress and trying to improve the living conditions of their family. Maria wants to invest in the construction of a bathroom and a water trough, for which she is applying to FUSAI for this loan to purchase the necessary materials, such as bricks, sand, cement, iron, and metal sheets. She hopes to be able to have this financing and thus begin the construction as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy bricks, sand, cement, iron, and metal sheets to build a bathroom and a water trough

loans.name: Maria Petronila

texts.es: María tiene 48 años de edad, es madre soltera y habita en casa propia junto a su pequeño hijo de 15 años de edad. María se dedica a la venta de tortillas (preparación alimenticia a base de masa de maíz) y de esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. María desea mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena y grava ya que desea repellar las paredes de la vivienda así como pavimentar el piso de la misma. Espera poder contar con este apoyo ya que no puede hacer la mejora sin un financiamiento.
texts.en: María, 48, is a single mother and lives in her own home with her young 15-year-old son.  She sells tortillas (made from corn dough) to earn a living and support the household.  María wants to carry out some home improvements and is requesting a loan through FUSAI to buy cement, sand and gravel so she can install drywall and a paved floor.  María is counting on this support because without it she cannot finance the renovation.

loans.use: To buy cement, sand and gravel to install drywall and a floor in her house.

loans.name: Maria Agustina

texts.es: María tiene 26 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a sus abuelos, madre y su pequeña hija de 6 años de edad. María se dedica a la venta de pollos y gallinas desde hace un año. Ella es una mujer muy emprendedora, trabajadora y responsable. Para ella lo más importante es su familia y desea apoyar a mejorar sus condiciones de vida. María desea construir un pequeño cuarto para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para comprar madera y lámina galvanizada para dar inicio a la construcción lo antes posible.
texts.en:
María, age 26, lives in her own house with her grandparents, her mother, and her little six year old daughter.  María has been selling chickens and hens for one year.  She is a very enterprising, hard-working, and responsible woman.  

Her family is the most important thing to her.  She wishes to improve her living conditions.  María wishes to build a small room.  In order to do so, she is requesting this loan from FUSAI.  She will use the loan to buy wood and galvanized metal sheeting to start building as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy wood and galvanized metal sheeting to build a room.

loans.name: Elis Antonio

texts.es: Elis tiene 29 años de edad y habita en casa de sus suegros junto a su compañera de vida y su pequeño hijo de 5 años de edad. Elis trabaja como albañil y además presta servicios de seguridad desde hace mucho tiempo. Elis desea construir su casa en un pequeño terreno que ha recibido de su suegro para que construya. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento, arena y hierro para dar inicio a la construcción lo antes posible.
texts.en: Elis is a 29-year-old  construction worker who has also provided security services for a long time. Elis, his wife, and their five-year-old son live with her family. Elis wants to build a home on a small plot of land that his father-in-law has given him, and is therefore applying for a loan from FUSAI. Elis will use the loan funds to purchase bricks, cement, sand, and iron so that he can start construction as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase brick, cement, sand and iron for building a home.

loans.name: Melisa De Jesus

texts.es: Melisa tiene 28 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y su pequeña hija de 5 años de edad. Melisa trabaja como empleada en una empresa cercana a su localidad lo cual le permite apoyar a su esposo con la economía del hogar. Melisa ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de un baño con ducha para lo cual necesita comprar materiales como: ladrillo, arena, cemento y pago de  mano de obra para la construcción.
texts.en: Melisa is 28 years old and lives in her own house with her husband and little, 5 year-old daughter. Melisa is an employee of a nearby business, which affords her the opportunity to assist her husband with the household expenses. Melisa decided to request this loan from FUSAI to invest in the construction of a bathroom with a shower. For this, she needs to purchase materials such as brick, sand and cement, and pay labor costs to build it.

loans.use: to buy brick, sand and cement, and pay labor costs for the construction of a bathroom with a shower.

loans.name: Dora Alicia

texts.es: Dora tiene 42 años de edad y reside en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos de 20 y 9 años de edad. Dora trabaja como empleada doméstica desde hace mucho tiempo y junto a su compañero de vida llevan la economía del hogar. Ella desea mejorar la seguridad de su familia por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de puertas y ventanas con balcón ya que las que tiene se encuentran deterioradas.
texts.en:
Dora, 42, lives in her own home with her life partner and their two children, ages 9 and 20. She has been working as a domestic employee for a long time. She and her partner are responsible for the family's finances. 

She would like to improve her family's security, so she is applying for a loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of doors and windows with a balcony because the ones she has have deteriorated.

loans.use: to buy doors and windows with a balcony for her home.

loans.name: Reina Elizabeth

texts.es: Reina tiene 32 años de edad y reside en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos de 16 y 6 años de edad. Reina trabaja como empleada doméstica desde hace un año y de esta forma colabora con la economía del hogar dado que con lo que percibe su compañero de vida no les alcanza para cubrir los gastos del hogar.  Reina y su familia habitan en condiciones muy humildes y desea mejorar el techo de la vivienda dado que se encuentra en mal estado. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de madera y lámina para proceder a la mejora lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Reina is 32 years old and lives in her own home with her life partner and their two children of 16 and 6 years old.

Reina has been working as a domestic maid for a year and in this way she contributes to the family expenses, as her life partner’s income is not enough to cover the family expenses.

Reina and her family live in very humble conditions and she wants to improve the roof of the house, as it is in a very bad state. For this reason, she is asking for this loan from FUSAI to invest in buying wood and sheet metal, to proceed as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy wood and sheet metal to repair the roof of her house.

loans.name: Fredy Arnulfo

texts.es: Fredy tiene 24 años de edad y se gana la vida trabajando como albañil dentro de su localidad. Fredy es muy trabajador y hace todo lo que este en sus manos para llevar el sustento a su hogar y su familia. Con el fin de mejorar sus condicione habitacionales solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la mejora  del piso y repello de paredes de la vivienda. Con el monto solicitado comprará cemento, arena y ladrillo de piso.
texts.en: Fredy is 24 years old and he earns his living working as a skilled construction worker in his town. Fredy is very hardworking and he does everything he possibly can to support his household and his family. With the goal of improving his housing conditions, he is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in the improvement of the floor and stucco of his house. With the amount he has requested, he will buy cement, sand, and flooring bricks.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, and flooring bricks for stuccoing the walls and to install a brick floor in his house.

loans.name: Wendy Elizabeth

texts.es: Wendy tiene 30 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su pequeña hija de dos años de edad y se dedica a la venta de variedad de prendas de vestir desde hace 6 años. De esta forma se gana la vida y le da a su hija lo necesario. Ella desea construir una fosa séptica para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en los materiales necesarios como: cemento, arena, grava ladrillo, etc. Confía que con los ingresos que percibe logrará cancelar la duda que el crédito implica.
texts.en: Wendy is 30 years old and lives with her little 2-year-old daughter in a house that she owns. She has been selling various types of garments for the past 6 years. That way she makes a living and provides her daughter with the things she needs. She wishes to build a septic tank, which is why she requests this loan from FUSAI so she can invest in the supplies she needs, such as cement, sand, gravel, bricks, etc. She's confident that with the profits she makes she'll be able to repay the debt from the loan.

loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, gravel, bricks, etc., so she can build a septic tank.

loans.name: Elsa Oliva

texts.es: Elsa tiene 36 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus dos hijas de 16 años y 10 años de edad quienes se encuentran estudiando en la escuela pública de su localidad. Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora quien con mucho esfuerzo junto a su esposo quien es agricultor se ganan la vida y mantienen la economía del hogar. Elsa desea construir una fosa séptica por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para comprar los materiales necesarios como: ladrillo, cemento, arena y grava. Espera poder contar con este apoyo dado que no cuenta con el capital disponible para hacer el desembolso pero expresa que de lo que percibe de su negocio logrará cancelar la deuda.
texts.en:
Elsa, 36, lives in her own house with her husband and two children, ages 10 and 16. Her children are studying at the local public school. She works very hard to make a living and maintain the family's finances alongside her husband, who is a farmer. 

Elsa would like to build a septic tank, so she has applied for a loan from FUSAI to buy necessary materials such as bricks, cement, sand, and gravel. She hopes to count on this support because she does not have the necessary capital to make the payment. She will manage to cancel the debt with the money she earns from her business.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand, and gravel to build a septic tank.

loans.name: Maria Salvadora

texts.es: María tiene 38 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y su pequeña hija de 6 años de edad. Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora quien se dedica a la prestación de servicios domésticos desde hace mucho tiempo y de esta forma junto a su esposo llevan la economía del hogar. María habita en condiciones muy humildes junto a su familia y lucha día con día para poco a poco ir mejorando. Con el desea de mejorar sus condiciones de vida ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI dado que desea construir un baño y hacer un graderío en la entrada de su casa ya que queda en alto y cuando llueve se dificulta la entrada. Con el monto solicitado comprará cemento, arena, grava, ladrillo y pago de mano de obra para la construcción.
texts.en:
María is 38 years old and lives in her own house with her husband and 6-year old daughter. She is a very hardworking woman who has earned her living as a domestic servant for a long time. In this way she helps her husband with household expenses.

María lives in a very basic house with her family and works every day to improve it little by little. As she wishes to better her living conditions, she has decided to seek a loan from FUSAI to add a bathroom and a step at the entrance to her home. When it rains, it is difficult to get into the house as it is high up.

With the loan money María plans to buy cement, sand, gravel, bricks and pay for someone to build the bathroom and step.

loans.use: buy cement, sand, gravel, bricks and pay for someone to build the bathroom and step.

loans.name: Reina Isabel

texts.es: Reina tiene 40 años de edad y reside en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos de 22 años y 5 años de edad. Reina tiene un molino de nixtamal el cual es su principal fuente de ingresos dado que muchas personas la buscan para moler variedad de semillas como maíz, arroz, frijoles, etc. Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora quien hace todo lo que este en sus manos para sacar adelante a su querida familia. Con la intención de mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina, madera y puertas ya que desea construir el techo y poner las puertas a la vivienda.
texts.en: Reina is 40 years old and lives in her own house with her partner and her two children, who are 22 years and 5 years of age. Reina has a corn mill, which is her main source of income since many people seek her out in order to mill a variety of seeds, such as corn, rice, and beans. She is a very hard-working woman who does everything possible to help her dear family to get ahead. With the goal of improving her living conditions, she is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of metal sheets, wood, and doors since she wishes to construct a roof and install doors.

loans.use: to purchase metal sheets, wood, and doors in order to construct a roof for her house and install doors

loans.name: Norma Elizabeth

texts.es: Norma tiene 34 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a sus tres hijos de 18 años, 10 años y 8 años de edad. Norma se dedica a la prestación de servicios domésticos y a la venta de tortillas desde hace 10 años y de esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Norma desea mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de pilares de cemento, madera y lámina galvanizada para reparar el techo y las bases de la vivienda las cuales se encuentran en mal estado.
texts.en: Norma is 34 years old and lives in a home of her own with her three children, ages 18, 10, and 8.  Norma has been providing domestic services and selling tortillas for 10 years and earns a living and supports her household this way.  Norma wants better living conditions and is asking for this loan through FUSAI to buy cement pillars, lumber, and galvanized metal to repair her roof and base which are in bad shape.

loans.use: to repair her roof.

loans.name: Erika Marisol

texts.es: Erika tiene 19 años de edad y se dedica a la venta de ropa nueva de forma ambulante. La venta la realizad desde hace dos años y de esta forma lleva el sustento a sus hijos (4 años y 1 año de edad)y a su abuela que son las personas con quienes habita y dependen de económicamente de ella. Erika desea terminar su vivienda dado que por falta de recursos económicos no ha logrado repellar las paredes y enladrillar el piso de la vivienda para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en los materiales necesarios como: ladrillo de piso, cemento, arena, grava y pago de mano de obra para realizar las mejoras.
texts.en:
Erika is 19 years old and earns her living selling clothing in the streets. She’s been doing this for two years and with the money she earns she supports her two children aged 4 and 1 as well as her grandmother. They all live with her and are financially dependent on her. 

Erika wishes to finish building her house. Because she ran out of money, the walls lack plaster and the floor lacks bricks. She is seeking a loan from FUSAI to buy the necessary materials (floor bricks, cement, sand, gravel) and pay someone to complete the work.

loans.use: buy floor bricks, cement, sand, gravel, and pay labour costs

loans.name: Iris Beatriz

texts.es: Iris tiene 25 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de de vida y sus dos hijos de de 9 años y 5 años de edad. Iris posee una tienda la cual con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado establecer en su hogar de habitación y de esta forma junto a su compañero de vida llevan la economía del hogar. Iris desea hacer algunas mejoras a su vivienda para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo de piso, cemento, arena y grava dado que desea enladrillar el piso de la vivienda y repellar las paredes de la misma.
texts.en:
Iris is 25 years old and lives in her own home with her partner and their two children, aged 9 and 5 years old. Iris has a store which she established in a room in her own home with great effort and so that she and her partner could help elevate their home's economic situation. 
Iris wants to do some home improvements which is why she has requested this loan from FUSAI. She will invest in the purchase of brick, cement, sand, and gravel to construct a floor and plaster their walls.

loans.use: to purchase materials to construct a floor and plaster the walls of her house.

loans.name: Roberto Carlos

texts.es: Roberto tiene 34 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su familia y se gana la vida como albañil desde hace 14 años. Roberto desea construir un cuarto para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de los materiales necesarios como: ladrillo, cemento, arena y hierro. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento y así dar inicio a la construcción del cuarto lo antes posible ya que no cuenta con el capital disponible para hacerlo por su cuenta pero si con la capacidad de pago mensual que el crédito implica.
texts.en: Roberto is 34 years old and lives in a house he owns with his family. He has made a living as a stone mason for more than fourteen years. Roberto wants to build a room, so he is asking for this loan from FUSAI to invest in buying the materials necessary such as brick, cement, sand and iron. He hopes to be able to count on this financing and thus begin building the room as soon as possible, as he doesn't have the capital available to do it on his own but can with the capacity of the monthly payment on the loan.

loans.use: to buy brick, cement, sand and iron to build a room

loans.name: Yoselin Carolina

texts.es: Yoselin tiene 20 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su hija y grupo familiar. Ella se dedica al comercio de tienda. Con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado establecer una pequeña tienda en su hogar de habitación la cual es su principal fuente de ingresos y lo le permite ganarse el pan de cada día. Yoselin desea convertirse en la número uno cuanto a tienda se trata por lo que ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de variedad de productos de tienda como: golosinas, azúcar, frijoles, arroz, detergente, macarrones, huevos, etc. Y de esta forma espera mantener su negocio activo por mucho tiempo para dar a su familia lo necesario.
texts.en:
Yoselin is 20 years old and lives in her own house with her daughter and her family. She has her own shop. 

With a lot of effort she succeeded in setting up a small shop in her house which is her main source of income and which enables her to cover her basic expenses. Yoselin wants to become the number one shop and therefore has decided to ask for this loan with FUSAI. She wants to invest it in the purchase of a variety of products, such as: sweets, sugar, beans, rice, detergents, pasta, eggs, etc.

By this she hopes to be able to keep her shop running for a long time so that she can provide her family with all they need.

loans.use: to buy sweets, sugar, beans, rice, detergents, pasta, eggs, etc.

loans.name: Imelda Del Carmen

texts.es: Imelda tiene 43 años de edad y junto a su esposo han procreado un hijo el cual tiene 8 años de edad. Imelda trabaja muy duro en el comercio de pupusas desde hace 8 años y gracias a su carisma y deliciosas pupusas que con mucho entusiasmo prepara todos los días muchas personas la prefieren por lo que cuenta con muchos clientes. Tiene el deseo de invertir en su negocio dado que desea llegar a un grupo mayor de personas que le permitan aumentar las ventas e ingresos. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de los insumos necesarios como: maíz, frijoles, queso, lorocos, tomates, repollo y gas propano. Confía que con lo que percibe de su negocio logrará cancelar la deuda que implica el crédito.
texts.en: Imelda is 43 years old and together with her husband have one 8 year old child. Imelda has worked very hard in the pupusa (local El Salvador food) business for 8 years. Thanks to her charisma and the delicious pupusas that she prepares every day with much enthusiasm, a lot of people prefer her. So she has many clients. She wants to invest in her business as she would like to access a larger amount of people which allows her to increase her sales and income. For this reason she is requesting a loan to buy the needed ingredients like corn, beans, cheese, lorocos (an edible flower), tomatoes, cabbage and propane. She is certain that with what she makes at her business she will be able to pay off the loan.

loans.use: to buy corn, beans, cheese, lorocos (an edible flower), tomatoes, cabbage and propane.

loans.name: Lucio De Jose

texts.es: Lucio tiene 62 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposa. Lucio es un hombre muy trabajador quien se dedica a la venta y crianza de pollos y gallinas desde hace 5 años.  Lucio tiene mucha clientela dado que ofrece buenos precios  en sus pollos y gallinas. Con el fin de mejorar sus condiciones de vida ha tomado la decisión de invertir en su negocio ya que desea cubrir una mayor cuota de mercado y así lograr su objetivo de mejorar sus ventas e ingresos. Con el monto solicitado comprará gallinas, pollos y concentrado. Tiene plena confianza que logrará cancelar la deuda que el crédito implica y de la misma forma mejorará sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia.
texts.en: Lucio is 62 years old and lives with his wife in their own home. Lucio is a very hard-working man who has been selling and raising chickens and hens for the past five years. Lucio has a lot of customers because he sells his chickens and hens at a good price. In order to improve his living conditions, he has decided to invest in his business because he wants to secure a greater market share and, as a result, achieve his goal of improving his sales and his income. He will use the amount he has requested to buy hens, chickens and chicken feed. He is very confident that he will be able to pay off the debt and that he will be able to improve his and his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy hens, chickens and chicken feed.

loans.name: Ana Rooth

texts.es: Ana tiene 58 años de edad y  se dedica al comercio de verduras, gallinas, lácteos y productos de belleza desde hace más de 20 años. De esta forma se gana la vida y mantiene la economía del hogar. Muchas personas dan buenas referencias de Ana ya que se caracteriza por ser una mujer emprendedora, trabajadora y muy responsable. Con el fin de mantener su negocio activo el cual es su principal fuente de ingresos solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de mercadería como: lociones, lácteos, carnes y pescado dado que desea aumentar sus ventas que le permitan mejorar sus ingresos y por consecuencia su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Ana is 58 years old and has been making a living selling vegetables, hens, dairy products, and beauty products for over 20 years. This work allows her to earn a living and to support her household. Many people have good things to say about Ana, an enterprising, hard-working and very responsible woman. In order to keep her business - Ana's only source of income - afloat, Ana is applying for this loan from "FUSAI" in order to invest in merchandise such as lotions, dairy products, meat and fish. Ana wants to increase her sales, allowing her to increase her income and, consequently, her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy lotions, dairy products, meat and fish.

loans.name: Alfredo De Jesus

texts.es: Alfredo tiene 32 años de edad y reside en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y sus cuatro hijos, de los cuales tres se encuentran estudiando. Alfredo es albañil y es así como se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Alfredo desea construir un cuarto dormitorio ya que su casa es bastante pequeña y no da abasto para todos. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de los materiales necesarios como: ladrillo, cemento, arena y hierro para dar inicio a la construcción lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Alfredo is 32 years old and resides in a house he owns with his life partner and their four children, three of whom are studying. Alfredo is a stone mason, and that's how he makes a living and sustains his home. 

Alfredo wants to build a bedroom, as his house is quite small and there isn't enough space for everyone. He is therefore asking for this loan from FUSAI to invest in buying the materials necessary like brick, cement, sand and iron in order to begin building as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy brick, cement, sand and iron to build a bedroom

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy security bars for the windows and to have a drop ceiling added to her home.

loans.name: Karen Verali

texts.es: Karen tiene 20 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su familia y trabaja como auditora de calidad en una empresa cercana a su localidad. Karen desea terminar dos cuartos dormitorios que con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado construir por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de en la compra de cemento, arena y grava para enecementar el piso y repellar las paredes. Confía que con lo que percibe de su trabajo logrará cancelar la deuda que el crédito implica.
texts.en:
Karen is 20 years old and lives in her own home with her family. She works as a quality auditor at a business that is close to her locality.

Karen wishes to finish two bedrooms that, through great effort, she has been able to build. This is why she is applying to FUSAI for this loan to invest in the purchase of cement, sand and gravel, in order to cement the floor and plaster the walls.

She is confident that with what she earns from her job, she will be able to pay off the debt from the loan.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand and gravel in order to cement the floor and plaster the walls of two bedrooms.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy cement, sand, and gravel, and pay workers for establishing connection to electrical energy.

loans.name: Erick Edgar

texts.es: Erick tiene 42 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y su pequeña hija de 12 años de edad. Erick trabaja como empleado en una empresa cercana a su localidad y es así como lleva el sustento a su hogar.  Con mucho esfuerzo está construyendo su vivienda con material más resistente pero por falta de recursos económicos no ha logrado terminarla por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, polines, cemento, arena y grava para colocar el techo y encementar el piso de la vivienda.
texts.en: Erick is 42 years old and lives in his own home with his wife and young 12 year old daughter.  Erick works as an employee for a nearby company and supports his household this way.  With great effort he managed to build his home out of more solid materials, but he has not been able to finish it due to lack of resources.  He is asking for a loan through FUSAI to buy galvanized metal, beams, cement, sand, and gravel to install the roof and floor.

loans.use: to buy building materials.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy galvanized laminate, cement, sand, gravel and iron grates to finish a bedroom.

loans.name: Jose Raul

texts.es: José tiene 53 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y sus cuatro hijos. José se gana la vida como albañil desde hace mas de 30 años. Es un hombre muy trabajador y responsable quien hace todo lo que este a su alcance para dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida. José desea construir un muro de retención para evitar que su terreno se siga lavando y para asegurar a su familia. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento, arena y hierro. De esta forma espera poder realizar a construcción del muro ya que no cuenta con el capital disponible para hacer el desembolso.
texts.en:
José is 53 years old and lives in his own home with his wife and four children. José has made a living as a bricklayer for more than 30 years. He is a very hardworking and responsible man who does everything within his reach to give his family better living conditions.

José wishes to build a retaining wall to keep his land from continuing to wash away, and to secure his family. For this he is applying to FUSAI for this loan to invest in the purchase of bricks, cement, sand and iron. In this way he hopes to build the wall, since he does not otherwise have the available capital to cover the cost.

loans.use: to buy:  bricks, cement, sand and iron to build a retaining wall.

loans.name: Arcadia De Jesus

texts.es: A sus 52 años de edad Arcadia trabaja muy duro para ganarse el pan de cada día  y apoyar a su familia con los gastos del hogar. Arcadia es una mujer muy admirable quien hace todo lo que este a su alcance para llevar el sustento a su hogar. Ella se dedica a la venta de lácteos desde hace mucho tiempo y es así como ha sacado adelante a sus hijos quienes ya son mayores de edad y le colaboran con la economía del hogar. Con el fin de dar mejores condiciones habitacionales a su familia así como proteger su principal patrimonio solicita este crédito a FUSAI para cambiar las columnas de madera de su vivienda por pilares de cemento ya que se encuentran en mal estado.
texts.en: At 52 years of age, Arcadia works very hard to earn the daily bread and support her family with their bills. Arcadia is a very admirable woman who does everything in her reach to support the home. She has been dedicated to selling dairy products for a long time and thus has gotten her children ahead who are adults now and help her with the home expenses. With the goal of providing better living conditions to her family as well as protect their main asset, she is requesting this loan from FUSAI to exchange the wooden columns in her house for cement pillars since they are in bad condition.

loans.use: to buy cement pillars for the house.

loans.name: Maria Elba

texts.es: María tiene 33 años de edad y se dedica a la elaboración y venta de pan dulce y francés desde hace 9 años. Ella se encuentra acompañada y tiene una hija de 8 años y un hijo de 11 años de edad. María trabaja muy duro en su panadería para dar a sus hijos mejores condiciones de vida es así como ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en su negocio en la compra de los insumos necesarios tales como: harina para pan, mantequilla, azúcar, leche, canela, etc. para elaborar el delicioso pan y así poder mejorar sus ventas al igual que sus ingresos.
texts.en: María, 33 years old, has worked baking and selling sweet bread and french bread for the last nine years. María is married and has an 8-year-old daughter, and an 11-year-old son. She works hard in her bakery to give her children a good quality of life. That's why she has decided to request this loan from FUSAI to invest in her business. She will buy necessary ingredients such as bread flour, butter, sugar, milk, cinnamon, etc. to make delicious breads and be able to increase her sales as well as her income.

loans.use: to buy bread flour, butter, sugar, milk, cinnamon, etc.

loans.name: Santos Vilma

texts.es: Santos tiene 45 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su hija de 11 años de edad quien se encuetra estudiando en la escuela pública de su localidad. Santos se dedica a la elaboración y venta de pan francés y pan dulce desde hace 6 años y es así como se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Gracias a su experiencia y carisma ya cuanta con muchos clientes que cada día la prefieren más. Con el fin de mejorar sus ingresos y así su calidad de vida solicita este préstamo a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de los insumos necesarios (harina, huevos, azúcar, mantequilla, sal, canela, etc.) para la elaboración del delicioso pan y así poder abarcar una mayor cuota de mercado que le permita aumentar sus ventas.
texts.en:
Santos is 45 years old.  She lives in a house that she owns, with her eleven year old daughter who is enrolled in the local public school.  For the past six years, Santos has worked making and selling french bread and sweat bread.  This is how she earns her living and supports her household.  Thanks to her experience and charisma, she has many customers who prefer her more each day.  

With the goal of improving her income and her quality of life, she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in purchasing the necessary supplies for making delicious breads (flour, eggs, sugar, butter, salt, cinnamon, etc...).  Through this, she can cover a larger share of the market, increasing her sales.

loans.use: purchase flour, eggs, sugar, butter, salt, cinnamon, etc...

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy wood and galvanized sheets.

loans.name: Dennis Fernando

texts.es: Dennis tiene 18 años de edad y reside junto a su grupo familiar. Desde hace mucho tiempo Dennis se dedica a la venta de granos básicos especialmente de maíz y frijoles. En el negocio le ayuda su madre y abuela y juntos van saliendo adelante y se ganan la vida honradamente. Con el fin de mejorar su calidad de vida ha tomado la decisión de invertir en su negocio ya que desea llegar a un número mayor de clientes que le permitan aumentar sus ingrsos. Por lo anterior solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de mayor cantidad de granos básicos(maíz y frijoles) para su negocio. Confía que de esta forma logrará mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Dennis is 18 years old and lives with his family. For many years, he has worked selling staple grains, especially corn and beans. His mother and grandmother help Dennis with the business. Things have been going very well for him and they are able to earn a living honorably. With the goal of improving his quality of life, Dennis has decided to invest in his business. He wants to increase the number of customers he serves, which will allow him to increase his income. For all of those reasons, he is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of a larger quantity of staples (corn and beans) for his business. He trusts that in this way, he will improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy corn and beans in bulk.

loans.name: Juan Manuel

texts.es: Juan tiene 30 años de edad y trabaja como jornalero desde hace mucho tiempo. De esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su compañera de vida y a sus tres hijos quienes habitan junto a él en casa propia. Juan desea construir una pila para almacenar el agua y ademas, desea mejorar el baño. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento, arena y grava para dar inicio a la construcción lo antes posible.
texts.en: Juan is 30 years old and has been working as a laborer for a long time.  He earns a living and supports his wife and three children this way.  They live together.  Juan wants to build a water tower and also make improvements to the bathroom.  He is asking for a loan through FUSAI to buy bricks, cement, sand, and gravel to begin construction as soon as possible.

loans.use: to make home improvemets.

loans.name: Yeny Raquel

texts.es: Yeny tiene 29 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos de 12 años y 7 años de edad. Yeny es muy emprendedora ya que desde hace 8 años se dedica a la venta de medicina natural, bisutería y artesanías en madera. De esta forma es como se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Junto a su compañero de vida mantienen la economía del hogar y hacen todo lo que esta a su alcance para dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida. Yeny ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en el negocio en la compra de mercadería como: medicina natural, bisutería y artesanías en madera. Espera poder mejorar sus ventas y así dar a su familia mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Yeny, 29, owns her home and lives with her husband and their two children, 12 and 7 years old. Yeny is very enterprising and since she was 8 years old she has been selling natural medicine, costume jewelry and wooden crafts. That is how she earns her living and sustains her home. Together with her spouse they maintain their finances and do everything within their reach to improve their family's living conditions.

Yeny has decided to ask FUSAI for a loan to invest in her business by purchasing merchandise such as natural medicine, costume jewelry and wooden crafts. She hopes to be able to improve her sales and thus give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy natural medicine, costume jewelry and wooden crafts.

loans.name: Juan Pablo

texts.es: Juan tiene 40 años de edad y habita en condiciones muy humildes junto a su compañera de vida, su hija de 16 años de edad y sus hijo de 14 años de edad. Juan se dedica a la prestación de servicios de seguridad desde hace mucho tiempo y de esta forma es como mantiene a sus familia y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Juan desea mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda ya que por las lluvias y el tiempo el material se ha deteriorado por lo que desea cambiarlo lo antes posible. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, cemento, arena y ladrillo para reparar el corredor de la vivienda lo antes posible.
texts.en: Juan is 40 years old. He lives in very humble conditions along with his life partner, his 16-year-old daughter, and his 14-year-old son. Juan has long been in the business of providing security services, which is how he earns the money to support and sustain his family and home. Juan wants to improve his home; whenever it rains, the materials of the house deteriorate still further, and he wants to fix them as soon as possible. For this reason, he has requested this loan from FUSAI which he will use to buy galvanized metal sheets, cement, sand, and bricks to repair the hallway of his home.

loans.use: buy building materials to fix the hallway of his home.

loans.name: Maria Leonor

texts.es: María tiene 42 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus hijos. María posee una tortilleria la cual con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado adecuar en su casa de habitación. Este negocio es su principal fuente de ingresos por lo que desea solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en el negocio en la compra de maíz, gas propano y cal, ya que desea hacer crecer su negocio y abarcar una mayor cuota  de mercado que le permita aumentar sus ventas y sus ingresos y así dar a su familia mejores condicione de vida.
texts.en: María is 42 and lives in her own home with her husband and children. She has a tortilla business. Through great hard work she has been able to set up her home for this business. The business is her main source of income, so she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in it. She will purchase corn, propane, and lime. She wants to expand her business and have more merchandise, which will allow her to increase her sales and income. This will allow her to give her family better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy corn, propane, and lime for making tortillas.

loans.name: Ana Cludia

texts.es: Ana es una mujer de 26 años de edad que se dedica a la elaboración y venta de pan dulce desde hace mucho tiempo. Gracias a la calidad del producto y los buenos precios muchas personas la prefieren.  Ana habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y su pequeño hijo de un año de edad. El deseo de Ana es invertir en su negocio de pan ya que desea satisfacer a un mayor número de de clientes de tal forma que le permitan aumentar sus ventas e ingresos. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de los insumos necesarios como: harina, huevos, crema, azúcar, colorante, canela, levadura, etc. Tiene plena confianza que con la ayuda de FUSAI logrará hacer crecer su negocio y podrá dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en: Ana is a 26 year old woman who has worked making and selling sweet bread for a long time. Thanks to the product quality and the good prices, a lot of people prefer her. Ana lives in her own house with her life's companion and their small son who is one year old. Ana wants to invest in her bread business because she wants to serve a bigger number of customers so that she can increase her sales and income. To do that, she has asked FUSAI for this loan to invest in buying ingredients she needs such as: flour, eggs, cream, sugar, coloring, cinnamon, yeast, etc. She is totally confident that with FUSAI's help, she will make her business grow and be able to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy flour, eggs, cream, sugar, coloring, cinnamon, yeast, etc.

loans.name: Ana Del Carmen

texts.es: Ana tiene 39 años de edad y se dedica al comercio de joyería, ropa interior y perfumería. Ana  habita en casa alquilada junto a su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos de 18 años y 12 años de edad quienes se encuentran estudiando en la escuela pública de su localidad. Ana y su compañero de vida hacen todo lo que este a su alcance para dar a sus hijos mejores condiciones de vida. Ana ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en su negocio ya que es una de sus principales fuentes de ingresos y desea mantenerlo activo. El monto solicitado lo invertirá en la compra de mercadería como: joyería, cosméticos, perfumería, ropa interior, etc. ya que son los artículos que comercializa de manera ambulante desde hace mucho tiempo.
texts.en: Ana is 39 years old and makes a living selling jewelry, underwear and perfume. She lives in a rental home with her partner and two children aged 18 and 12. Both children are enrolled at the local public school. Ana and her spouse do all that they can to given their children better living conditions. She has chosen to request this loan from FUSAI to invest in her business because it is her main source of income and would like to keep it active. The requested amount will be invested in the purchase of merchandise including jewelry, cosmetics, perfume, and underwear. She has sold these goods by making sales on foot for many years.

loans.use: to buy jewelry, cosmetics, perfume, and underwear.

loans.name: Gloria Esperanza

texts.es: Gloria tiene 39 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus tres hijos de 14 años, 12 años y 7 años de edad. Gloria posee una pequeña tienda que con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado establecer en su hogar de residencia. De esta forma se gana la vida y junto a su esposo mantienen la economía del hogar. Gloria ha tomado la decisión de construir un cuarto para dar mayor comodidad a sus hijos. Es por esta razón que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena, ladrillo y hierro. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento y así poder construir el cuarto dormitorio que tanto desea.
texts.en:
Gloria is 39 years old and resides in her own home with her husband and their three children (ages 14, 12, and 7). She has a small store that she established in her home with great effort. This enables her to earn a living and partner with her husband in maintaining the household finances.

Gloria decided to build a room that will provide greater comfort for her children. For this reason, she is requesting this loan from FUSAI so that she can invest in the purchase of cement, sand, bricks, and iron. She hopes to have this loan so that she can build the fourth bedroom that she desires.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, bricks, and iron for building a fourth bedroom.

loans.name: Iris Beatriz

texts.es: Iris tiene 25 años de edad y habita en casa alquilada junto  a su compañero de vida y su pequeña hija de 2 años de edad. Iris trabaja muy duro para sacar adelante a su familia y dar mejores condiciones de vida. Iris se dedica a la elaboración y venta de tortillas desde hace mucho tiempo y es así como junto a su esposo llevan la economía del hogar. Este negocio es una de sus principales fuentes de ingresos y desea invertir en la compra de los insumos necesarios como: Maíz, cal y gas propano, etc. para seguir manteniendo su negocio activo y poder contar con mayor capacidad que le permita satisfacer a más clientes. Dado que no cuenta con el capital para hacer el desembolso solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de los insumos.
texts.en:
Iris is 25 years old, and she lives in a rented house with her life partner and her little two-year-old daughter.  Iris works very hard to raise her family and provide them with better living conditions.

Iris and her husband have been preparing and selling tortillas for a long time. This is how they provide financial support for their home, and it is one of their main sources of income. She would like to invest in the purchase of necessary supplies, such as corn, lime powder, propane gas, etc., in order to keep her business running and to be able to increase its capacity, which will allow her to satisfy more customers.

She is seeking a loan from FUSAI in order to invest in the purchase of supplies, as she does not have the capital to make this expenditure.

loans.use: to purchase corn, lime powder, propane gas, etc.

loans.name: Celia Del Carmen

texts.es: Celia tiene 29 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus tres hijos de 12 años, 5 años y 2 años de edad. Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora quien se dedica a la crianza y venta de pollo de engorde, venta de ropa y verduras. De esta forma se gana la vida y junto a su esposo quien se dedica a la venta de cereales mantienen la economía del hogar. Celia desea mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la instalación de la energía eléctrica y para comprar los materiales necesarios(ladrillo, cemento y arena) para construir una pila con baño.
texts.en: Celia is 29 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and three children aged twelve, five and two. She is a very hard-working woman who works raising and selling fattened chickens, clothing and vegetables. In this way she earns a living. She supports the household with her husband who sells basic grains. Celia hopes to improve her and her family's living conditions. For this reason she is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in the installation of electricity and to buy the materials needs (bricks, cements, and gravel) to build a washing area and bathroom.

loans.use: to buy cement, gravel, and brick to build a washing area with a bathroom and install electricity.

loans.name: Juan Antonio

texts.es: Juan tiene 40 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y sus cuatro hijos quienes son menores de edad. Juan trabaja muy duro en un taller de enderezado y pintura de vehículos y su esposa posee un pequeño negocio de granos básicos. De esta forma Juan y su esposa se ganan la vida y dan a sus hijos lo necesario. Juan desea mejorar las condiciones habitacionales de su familia  por lo ha tomado la decisión de construir un cuarto dormitorio para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI Para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena, ladrillo y hierro para proceder a la construcción lo antes posible.
texts.en: Juan is 40 years old and lives in a home of his own with his wife and four minor children.  Juan works very hard in a vehicle body shop and his wife has a small basic grain business.  Juan and his wife earn a living and provide for their children this way.  Juan wants to improve his family’s living conditions and has decided to build a bedroom so he is asking for a loan through FUSAI, so he can buy cement, sand, bricks, and iron bars to proceed as quickly as possible.

loans.use: to buy building materials.

loans.name: Maria Haydee

texts.es: María tiene 59 edad y se gana la vida por medio de la venta de lácteos desde hace tres años. La venta la realiza en su casa y de forma ambulante por lo que tiene muchos clientes que cada día la prefieren más. María desea dar mayor seguridad a su familia y proteger sus pocas pertenencias por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de un portón metálico para cerrar la entrada de su casa ya que  por el momento tiene uno provisional pero no es muy seguro.
texts.en:
María is 59 years old and earns her living by selling dairy products, which she has been doing for three years. Her sales are conducted from her house and also as a traveling vendor. She has many customers who prefer to do business with her each day.

María wants to provide more security for her family and to protect their few belongings. For this reason, she is requesting a loan from FUSAI so that she can invest in the purchase of a metal gate for securing the entrance to her house. At the moment, there is only a provisional gate that is not very secure.

loans.use: to buy a large metal gate for securing the entrance to her house.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: Juan tiene 49 años de edad y se gana la vida por medio de la venta de quesos desde hace cuatro años. Juan Trabaja muy duro para sacar adelante a su familia y brindar mejores condiciones de vida. Juan habita en casa propia junto a su madre quien depende de él económicamente. Juan desea desea construir un cuarto dormitorio para lo cual necesita comparar los materiales necesarios como: ladrillo, cemento, arena, lámina galvanizada, etc. Por el momento no cuenta con el capital disponible para hacer el desembolso por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para hacer la inversión y así ir pagando mes a mes la cuota del crédito.
texts.en:
Juan is 49 years old, and he has made a living selling cheese for four years. 

Juan works very hard to raise his family and to provide them with better living conditions. Juan lives in his own house, along with his mother, who depends on him financially.  

Juan wants to build a bedroom, for which he needs to purchase the necessary materials, such as brick, cement, sand, galvanized sheeting, etc.  Presently he does not have the capital available to make the expenditure, so he is seeking a loan from FUSAI in order to make the investment, and he will make the loan payments every month.

loans.use: to purchase brick, cement, sand, and galvanized sheeting, in order to build a room.

loans.name: Rafael Antonio

texts.es: Rafael tiene 38 años de edad y y habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida. Rafael trabaja como empleado en una empresa cercana a su localidad y de esta forma lleva el sustento a su hogar. Rafael desea reparar el techo su vivienda dado que con el tiempo se ha deteriorado y cuando es tiempo de lluvias  el agua se filtra y daña sus pocas pertenencias. Rafael solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada y madera dado que no cuenta con el capital disponible para hacer el desembolso pero si con la capacidad de pago mensual que el crédito implica.
texts.en: Rafael is 38 years old. He lives in his own house with his life companion. Rafael works as an employee in a company close to where he lives and in this way he supports his household. Rafael wants to repair the roof of his house which over time has deteriorated and when it rains the water filters in and damages his few possessions. Rafael has requested a loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of galvanized laminate and wood as he doesn't have the available capital to make the purchase. But he does have the capacity to pay the monthly installments of the loan.

loans.use: to buy galvanized laminate and wood to repair the roof of his house.

loans.name: Mariela  Sarai

texts.es: Mariela tiene 30 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y su pequeño hijo de un año de edad. Mariela  trabaja como vendedora en una tienda cercana a su localidad. Mariela es una mujer muy trabajadora quien desea dar mejores condiciones de vida a su familia. Mariela solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de piedra, cemento y arena para pavimentar el piso del corredor de la vivienda dado que cuando es tiempo de lluvias el agua se acumula causando charcos y e insalubridad  para su familia.
texts.en:
Mariela is thirty years old and lives in her own home with her life partner and their one-year-old little boy. Mariela works as a saleswoman at a store near her town. Mariela is a very hard worker and she wants to give her family better living conditions. 

Mariela is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in purchasing stone, cement, and sand in order to pave the hallway in her home, since during the rainy season water accumulates and causes puddles and unhealthy conditions for her family.

loans.use: to buy stone, cement, and sand to pave the floor in the hallway of her home.

loans.name: Margarita Del Transito

texts.es: Margarita tiene 54 años de edad y habita ne casa propia junto a su familia. Margarita se dedica a la venta de panes con gallina desde hace 15 años. De esta forma es como se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Margarita siempre esta pensando en la seguridad de su familia por lo que hace todo lo que este a su alcance para brindarles mejores condiciones. Ella desea cambiar la puerta principal de su vivienda dado que la que tiene se encuentra deteriorada, por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de una puerta y para pagar la mano de obra para que coloquen la puerta.
texts.en: Margarita is 54 years old and lives in her own home with her family. She has worked selling chicken sandwiches for the past 15 years. This is how she makes a living and supports her family. Margarita is always thinking about her family's safety, which is why she does everything she can to provide them with better living conditions. She wants to change the front door of her home, as the current one is getting damaged. This is why she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in buying a door and to pay for labour to fit the door.

loans.use: to buy a door for her house and pay for labour.

loans.name: Blanca Rosa

texts.es: Blanca tiene 50 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a sus hijos. Ella se dedica a la venta de fruta en su hogar de residencia. Es una mujer muy trabajadora quien se gana la vida honradamente. Su vivienda es muy humilde y actualmente el techo se encuentra deteriorado por lo que desea cambiarlo lo antes posible ya que cuando es tiempo de lluvias el agua se filtra y daña sus pocas pertenencias. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra lámina galvanizada y madera para reparar el techo lo antes posible.
texts.en: Blanca is 50 years old and lives in her own home with her children. She works selling fruit from her house. She is a very hardworking woman who earns an honest living. Her home is very humble and her roof is currently damaged. She'd like to fix it as soon as possible otherwise during the rainy season water will get in and ruin her few possessions. She is asking FUSAI for a loan so she can purchase galvanised sheeting and wood to mend the roof as soon as she can.

loans.use: to buy galvanised sheeting and wood to fix the roof of her house.

loans.name: Mario Alfredo

texts.es: Mario tiene  44 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposa desde hace mucho tiempo. Mario y su esposa son personas muy trabajadoras quienes hacen todo lo que este a su alcance para ganarse el sustento diario. Mario solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento y arena para terminar una pared de la vivienda que por falta de recursos económicos no ha logrado terminar. Expresa tener la capacidad de pago que el crédito implica.
texts.en: Mario is 44 years old and lives in a house that he has owned with his wife for many years.  Mario and his wife are very hardworking people who do whatever they can to earn a living.  Mario is seeking a loan from FUSAI to invest in purchasing bricks, cement and sand to finish a wall in his home, because he was not able to finish it due to lack of resources.  He states that he will be capable of fulfilling the payments on the loan.

loans.use: purchase bricks, cement and sand to finish a wall in his home.

loans.name: Roxana Patricia

texts.es: Roxana tiene 38 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus tres hijos de 18 años, 15 años y 12 años de edad. Roxana posee un chalet dentro de una escuela de su localidad en el cual vende variedad de productos como: golosinas, pan dulce, refrescos, sodas, etc. Es así como junto a su compañero de vida van saliendo adelante y dan a sus hijos lo necesario. Roxana desea mejorar sus condiciones  habitacionales por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de un cuarto dormitorio para el cual necesita comprar cemento, arena, ladrillo, grava y hierro y además pagar la mano de obra por la construcción.
texts.en:
Roxana is 38 years old and lives in her own home with her life partner and her three children of 18, 15 and 12 years of age. Roxana owns a detached house inside a school of her area in which she sells a variety of products such as sweets, sweet bread, drinks, fizzy drinks and so on. It is in this manner that together with her life partner they get ahead in life and give their children what they need. 

Roxana wants to improve her living conditions, which is why she is seeking this loan from FUSAI. This money will be invested in the construction of a bedroom for which she will need to buy cement, sand, bricks, broken stones and iron, as well as to pay for labor for its construction.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, bricks, crushed stone and iron to build a bedroom.

loans.name: Orbelina Estefania

texts.es: Orbelina tiene 18 años de edad es soltera y habita en casa familiar junto a su madre, hermana y prima. Orbelina se gana la vida por medio de la prestación de servicios domésticos desde dos años. De esta forma se gana la vida y apoya a su familia con los gastos del hogar. Orbelina  es una joven visionaria con deseos de superación. Ella ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la instalación de la luz eléctrica y agua potable en su vivienda ya que no cuenta con  estos servicios. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento y así poder gozar junto a su familia de mejores condiciones habitacionales.
texts.en:
Orbelina is 18 years old, single, and lives in the family home with her mother, sister and cousin. Orbelina has made a living in domestic service for two years. This is how she makes a living and supports her family with the costs of running the home. Orbelina is a visionary young woman with desires to overcome.

She has taken the decision to ask for this loan from FUSAI to use in the installation of electric light and potable water in her house, as it does not have these services. She hopes to be able to count on this funding and be able to enjoy better living conditions with her family.

loans.use: to pay for the installation of electric power and potable water in her house.

loans.name: Elsa Clementina

texts.es: Elsa tiene 42 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus tres hijos de 20 años, 17 años y 12 años de edad. Elsa posee una pequeña tienda en la cual comercializa variedad de productos de primera necesidad como: huevos, arroz, azúcar, pan dulce, golosinas, etc. Tiene 10 años de tener su tienda por lo que cuenta con mucha experiencia en el negocio y con muchos clientes que cada día la prefieren más. Con el fin de mejorar sus ingresos solicita este préstamo a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de productos de tienda como: arroz, azúcar, frijoles, macarrones, huevos, golosinas, etc. Y así poder contar con un mayor inventario para satisfacer a más clientes.
texts.en: Elsa is 42 years old and lives at home with her husband and three children aged 20, 17, and 12 years of age. Elsa has a small shop in which she sells a variety of staple products including eggs, sugar, rice, pastries, sweets, and more. She has had her store for 10 years so she has a lot of experience in the business and many customers who prefer to shop with her everyday. In order to improve her income, she has requested a loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of rice, sugar, beans, macaroni, eggs, sweet, and more for her shop. She can have a larger inventory and satisfy more customers.

loans.use: to stock her store with rice, sugar, beans, and more.

loans.name: Maria Magdalena

texts.es: María tiene 30 años de edad y se dedica a la crianza y venta de pollos desde hace mucho tiempo. Dicho negocio es el que le permite llevar el sustento a su familia y junto a su compañero de vida van sacando adelante a sus dos hijos de 8 años y 15 años de edad. María desea hacer crecer su negocio para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de pollos y así poder contar con mayor capacidad para satisfacer a más clientes lo cual le permita aumentar sus ingresos y así mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Maria, 30, earns her living raising and selling chickens. She has done this work for a very long time. This business is one that allows her to bring sustenance to her family. She is raising her two children aged 8 and 15 years with her life partner. Maria wants to grow her business with this loan. She has requested the loan from FUSAI to invest in buying chickens so that she can have a larger flock to meet customer demand. It will allow her to increase her income and improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to increase her flock of chickens.

loans.name: Ana Marlene

texts.es: Ana tiene 34 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y su hija de 10 años de edad y su pequeño hijo de 2 años de edad. Ana es una mujer muy creativa que día a día busca las formas de ganarse la vida. Ella se dedica a la venta de cocos y refrescos naturales y junto a su compañero de vida quien es agricultor van sacando adelante a sus hijos y luchan por mejorar sus condiciones de vida. Ana ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de una pila con baño para lo cual necesita comprar materiales como: ladrillo, cemento, arena, grava y hierro. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento ya que no cuenta con un lugar adecuado para reguardar el agua al igual que no cuenta con un baño en buenas condiciones.
texts.en: Ana is 34 years old and lives in her own home with her partner, 10-year-old daughter and little 2-year-old son. Ana is a very creative woman who finds ways to earn a living day by day. She works selling coconuts and natural fruit drinks with her partner, who is a farmer. They support their children and fight to improve their living conditions. Ana has taken the decision to request this loan from FUSAI to invest in building a water tank and a bathroom, for which she needs to buy bricks, cement, sand, gravel and iron. She hopes that she receives this loan as she has nowhere to store water and no suitable bathroom.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand, gravel and iron to build a water tank and a bathroom.

loans.name: Reynaldo

texts.es: Reynaldo tiene 58 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y su nieto. Reynaldo se gana la vida por medio de la crianza de cerdos los cuales luego de un tiempo pone a la venta. Este negocio es su principal fuente de ingresos y desea mantenerlo activo por mucho más tiempo. Con el fin de mejorar su negocio y sus condiciones de vida ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cerdos y concentrado para hacer más grande su granja y así poder incrementar sus ventas y al mismo tiempo sus ingresos que le permitan mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia.
texts.en: Reynaldo is 58 years old and lives in a house he owns with his wife and grandson. He earns a living by raising pigs that he later sells. This business is his principal source of income and he wants to keep it going for a long time. With the goal of improving his business, and his living conditions, he has decided to apply for this loan from FUSAI to purchase pigs and feed. Thus he can expand his pig farm and increase sales and income. This will enable him to improve his own and his family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase pigs and feed.

loans.name: Luis Manuel

texts.es: Luis tiene 28 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y su pequeña hija de dos años de edad. Luis trabaja como jornalero desde hace mucho tiempo y de esta forma se gana  la vida honradamente. Es un hombre muy trabajador quien cada día busca las oportunidades para dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida. Luis desea construir el corredor de su vivienda dado que no cuenta con uno y cuando hace sol o cuando es tiempo de lluvias es muy incomodo. Además, desea conectar el servicio de agua potable dado que no cuenta con el vital líquido. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI  para invertir en la compra de los materiales necesarios (ladrillo, lámina, cemento, arena, grava, etc.) para construir el corredor de la vivienda y para pagar la mano de obra para la conexión del agua potable.
texts.en:
Luis is 28 years old and lives in his own house with his wife and his young daughter of two years old. Luis has worked as a day laborer for a long time and in this way, he makes an honest living. He is a very hardworking man, who looks for opportunities every day to give his family the best conditions in life.

Luis wants to build a patio for his home, as it doesn't have one and it is very uncomfortable when it's sunny or it rains. Also, he wants to connect it to the potable water system, as the house doesn't have this vital liquid. For these reasons he is asking for this loan from FUSAI to buy the necessary materials (bricks, sheet metal, cement, gravel, etc.) to build the patio for his house and pay for the manual labor and for the connection to potable water.

loans.use: to buy materials to build a patio for his house and connect it to potable water.

loans.name: Rosa Idalia

texts.es: Rosa tiene 33 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus tres hijas de 12 años, 7 años y 2 años de edad. Rosa se dedica a la elaboración y venta de pan dulce de forma artesanal. Rosa trabaja muy duro para que junto con su esposo mantener a sus hijos y dar mejores condiciones de vida. Rosa desea instalar el servicio de agua potable en su vivienda dado que no cuenta con el servicio. Por lo anterior Rosa solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la instalación del agua potable.
texts.en: Rosa, 33, lives in her own home with her life partner and their three children who are 12, 7, and 2. Rosa makes and sells artesian sweet bread. She works very hard with her husband to take care of her children and give them better living conditions. Rosa wants to install drinking water services in her home because she doesn't currently have this service. Previously, Rosa is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in installing drinking water.

loans.use: to install drinking water services in her home.

loans.name: Maria Angela

texts.es: María tiene 26 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y su pequeño hijo de 8 años de edad. María se gana la vida por medio de la venta de mariscos y verduras desde hace tres años. La venta la realiza de manera ambulante y en su vivienda. Gracias a su carisma y a la frescura con que comercializa sus productos ha sabido ganarse a muchos clientes que cada día demandan más sus productos. María desea mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia por lo que desea invertir en su negocio con el fin de cubrir una mayor demanda de mercado que le permita mejorar sus ventas y sus ingresos. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compara de  conchas, camarones, pescado y variedad de verduras.
texts.en:
María, age 26, lives in her own house with her life partner and her eight year old son.  María has been earning a living by selling seafood and vegetables for three years.  She sells in an itinerant manner and at her house.  Thanks to her charisma and the freshness of the products that she sells, she has known how to win over many customers.  Every day they demand more of her products.

María wishes to improve her living conditions and those of her family.  Therefore, she wishes to invest in her business in order to cover greater market demand.  This will allow her to improve her sales and her profits.  In order to do so, she is requesting this loan from FUSAI.  She will use the loan to buy shellfish, shrimp, fish, and a variety of vegetables.

loans.use: to buy shellfish, shrimp, fish, and a variety of vegetables.

loans.name: Teresa De Jesus

texts.es: Teresa tiene 61 años de edad y se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad como: azúcar, café,leche, maíz, jabón y gallinas desde 10 años. Teresa  habita en casa de un hijo junto a su esposo y juntos trabajan muy duro para ganarse la vida. Teresa desea invertir en su negocio ya que desea aumentar sus ventas y así mejorar sus ingresos al igual que sus condiciones de vida. Teresa ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de café, leche, gallinas, azúcar, detergente, etc. para satisfacer a un mayor número de clientes y así mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Teresa is 61 years old and for the past ten years has been selling such staples as: sugar, coffee, milk, corn, soap and chickens. She and her husband live in the house of one of her sons and they work very hard to earn a living. Teresa wants to invest in her business because she wants to increase her sales and thereby increase her income and improve her living conditions.
