Teresa has decided to ask FUSAI for this loan so she can buy coffee, milk, chickens, sugar, detergent, etc. to satisfy an increasing number of customers, and improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy coffee, milk, chickens, sugar, detergents, etc.

loans.name: Ana Haydee

texts.es: Ana tiene 42 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos de 14 años y 7 años de edad. Ana se dedica al cultivo y venta de pipianes los cuales son muy demandados por sus clientes. Ana desea continuar con el cultivo de pipianes pero necesita invertir en a compra de la semilla y del abono para la producción. Con el fin de mantener su negocio activo y poder mantener la economía del hogar junto a su compañero de vida solicita este crédito a FUSAI para hacer la compra de los insumos. Confía que con la venta de los pipianes logrará cancelar la deuda que el crédito implica.
texts.en: Ana, 42, lives at home with her life partner and two children aged 14 and 7 years. Ana is dedicated to the cultivation and sale of pipián peppers which have a high customer demand. Ana wants to continue growing pipián peppers but needs to invest in the purchase of seed and fertilizer for their cultivation. She has requested this loan from FUSAI to purchase these agricultural inputs in order to keep her business up and running and to keep up the economy of her home with her life partner. She is confident that the sales she makes with these pipián peppers will allow her the pay her debts.

loans.use: to plant and fertilize pipián pepper plants.

loans.name: Maria Julia

texts.es: María tiene 35 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida, su hija de 7 años y su suegra. María es una mujer emprendedora quien se dedica a la venta de mariscos y empanadas de leche de forma ambulante. María recorre  las calles de su localidad primero para ofrecer mariscos y en las tardes para ofrecer empanadas de leche. Gracias a su experiencia y carisma ya cuenta con muchos clientes que cada día la prefieren más y es así como se gana la vida y junto a su esposo mantienen la economía del hogar. Con el  fin de mejorar sus ingresos ha tomado la decisión de invertir en su pequeño negocio con el fin de abarcar una mayor cuota de mercado y así mejorar sus ingresos. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de pescado, camarones, plátanos, leche, azúcar, canela y aceite para el negocio de mariscos y empanadas.
texts.en:
María is 35 years old, and she lives in her own house with her life companion, her 7-year-old daughter, and her mother-in-law. 

María is an enterprising woman who sells seafood and empanadas de leche on foot. She walks along the streets in her area—selling  seafood first, and empanadas de leche in the afternoon.  Thanks to her experience and her charisma, she already has many customers who prefer her more each day. This is how she makes a living, and along with her husband, maintains the household finances. 

With the goal of improving her income, she has decided to invest in her little business, in order to cover a larger section of the market and increase her earnings. 

She is seeking a loan from FUSAI in order to invest in the purchase of fish, shrimp, plantains, milk, sugar, cinnamon, and oil, for her seafood and empanada business.

loans.use: to purchase fish, shrimp, plantains, milk, sugar, cinnamon, and oil, for her seafood and empanada business.

loans.name: Rosa Margarita

texts.es: Con 60 años de edad Rosa trabaja muy duro para apoyar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar. Rosa se dedica a la venta de leche, pollos y gallinas desde hace 5 años. Su esposo es agricultor y juntos van saliendo adelante poco a poco. Rosa desea invertir en su pequeña granja ya que desea tener una mayor capacidad de venta por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de pollos y gallinas para incrementar su inventario de animales y poder cubrir una mayor cuota de mercado.
texts.en: At 60 years of age, Rosa works hard to support her husband and pay household expenses. Rosa has sold milk and chickens for five years. Her husband is a farmer and together they are slowing progressing. Rosa wants to invest in their small farm to have greater capacities for sales so she is applying for a loan from FUSAI to invest in buying chickens to increase their inventory and cover a larger market share.

loans.use: to increase her flock of chickens.

loans.name: Claudia Maria

texts.es: Claudia tiene 26 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y dos hijos de 6 años y 2 años de edad. Claudia se dedica a la venta de pescado desde hace mucho tiempo y es así como junto a su esposo mantienen la economía del hogar. Claudia desea mejorar el techo de su vivienda dado que con el tiempo se ha deteriorado y es necesario cambiarlo lo antes posible. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de madera y lámina galvanizada para proceder a la mejora lo antes posible.
texts.en: Claudia is 26 years old and she lives in her own home along with her husband and two children who are 6 and 2 years old. She has sold fish for a living for some time now and this is how she and her husband are able to keep house. Claudia wants to improve her roof because over time it has deteriorated and she needs to repair it as soon as possible. And so she is asking for this loan with FUSAI in order to invest in her home and purchase wood as well as purchase galvinized metal sheets in order to get the roof repaired as soon as possible.

loans.use: purchase wood and galvinized metal sheets to repair her roof.

loans.name: Adan

texts.es: Adan tiene 28 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y su pequeño hijo de 4 años de edad. Adan se gana la vida trabajando como empleado en una empresa cercana a su localidad. Adan desea construir una pared para dividir el área de la vivienda ya que solo cuenta con un área común y desea tener una mejor distribución que le permita dar mayor comodidad a su familia. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra cemento, arena, ladrillo y hierro para construir la pared lo antes posible. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento ya que no cuenta con el capital disponible para hacer el desembolso.
texts.en: Adan is 28 years old. He lives in his own house with his wife and his young son who is 4 years old. Adan earns his living working as an employee in a business close to his community. Adan wants to build a wall to divide the space in the house since it only has one common living area and he wants better distribution so his family will be more comfortable. Because of this, he is asking FUSAI for a loan to invest in buying cement, sand, bricks, and iron to build the wall as soon as possible. He hopes to have this loan because he doesn't have the available capital to finance it.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, bricks and iron to build a dividing wall inside the house.

loans.name: Maria Nicolasa

texts.es: María tiene 19 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida, hijo de dos años y sus hermanos. María es comerciante de frutas y verduras en el mercado central de su localidad. Tiene muchos clientes dado que sus productos siempre están frescos y a buen precio. María solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de un cuarto para lo cual necesita comprar madera y lámina galvanizada. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento y así dar inicio a la construcción lo antes posible.
texts.en:
María is 19 years old and lives in her own home with her life companion, her two-year-old son, and her siblings. She is a fruit and vegetable merchant at the central market in her town. María has many customers because her products are always fresh and priced well.

She is requesting this loan from FUSAI so that she can invest in the construction of a room. María needs to buy wood and galvanized sheets. She hopes to receive this loan so that she can begin construction as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy wood and galvanized sheets for building a room.

loans.name: Ana Gloria

texts.es: Ana tiene 47 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y sus cinco hijos (22 años, 17 años, 14 años, 12 años, y 8 años). Ana se dedica  a la venta de frutas y verduras en el merado central de su localidad desde hace 20 años. Es una mujer muy trabajadora quien hace todo lo que este a su alcance para ganarse la vida. Ana desea mejorar sus condiciones de vida por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la reparación del techo de la vivienda ya que se encuentra deteriorado. Con el monto solicitado comprará madera y lámina galvanizada.
texts.en: Ana is 47 years old.  She lives in her own home with her life companion and five children (ages 22, 17, 14, 12, and 8).  For the past twenty years, Ana has been engaged in selling fruits and vegetables at the central market in her town.  She is a very hardworking woman who does everything in her power to earn a living.  Ana wishes to improve her living conditions and this is why she is requesting this loan through Fusai.  She will invest in the repair of her home’s roof as it is damaged.  She will use the funds to purchase wood and galvanized sheet metal.

loans.use: to purchase wood and galvanized sheet metal to repair her home's roof.

loans.name: Edgar Osmin

texts.es: Edgar es una persona muy trabajadora quien se dedica a vender minutas, las cuales son hechas de hielo garantizado, cubierto de jarabes de frutas, las cuales comercializa de forma ambulante por diferentes lugares Su venta es bastante estable, y es la que le permite sostener su hogar, ya que su esposa se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar. Edgar solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para comprar mayor cantidad de maquetas de hielo, así mismo para comprar más variedad de jarabes de distintos sabores. De esta manera él espera mejorar sus ganancias y salir adelante.
texts.en: Edgar is a hard-working person who sells slushies, make from crushed ice topped with fruit syrups, He sells in the streets in a variety of locations. His sales are fairly stable which allows him to support his family. His wife takes care of the home. Edgar is requesting a loan so that he can have the money needed to buy blocks of ice in greater quantities and to buy a greater variety of syrups of distinct flavors. Doing this he hopes to improve his profits and get ahead.

loans.use: to buy blocks of ice wholesale and different flavors of syrup.

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es: Pedro tiene 58 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y sus dos hijos de 21 años y 17 años de edad. Pedro se dedica a la comercialización de ropa de cama (colchas, cubrecamas y toallas). La venta la realiza de manera ambulante y  de forma fija desde hace 20 años. Pedro solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de una fosa séptica la cual no ha podido construir por falta de recursos económicos. Con el monto solicitado comprará cemento, ladrillo, arena y grava. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento y así poder proceder a la construcción lo antes posible.
texts.en: Pedro is 58 years old. He lives at home with his wife and two children aged 21 and 17 years. Pedro earns his living selling bedding such as quilts, comforters, and towels. He has sold as a street vendor and in a fixed location for 20 years. Pedro is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in the construction of a septic tank that he had been unable to build due to the lack of financial resources. With the amount he requested, he will buy cement, bricks, sand, and gravel. He hopes to have this loan so that he can proceed with the construction as soon as possible.

loans.use: to construct a septic tank.

loans.name: Flor De Fatima

texts.es: Flor tiene 24 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos de 5 años y 6 años de edad. Flor se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza por catalogo. La venta la realiza de forma ambulante desde hace mucho tiempo y de esta forma junto a su compañero de vida mantiene la economía del hogar. Flor desea terminar lo antes posible el techo de su vivienda que con mucho esfuerzo han logrado construir junto a su compañero de vida. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de polines y lámina galvanizada y así colocar el techo a la vivienda lo antes posible.
texts.en: Flor is 24 years old and lives in her own house, along with her life partner and their two children, who are 5 and 6 years old. Flor works selling beauty products from a catalog. She makes her sales as a mobile vendor. She has been doing this for a long time. In this way, together with her life partner, she is sustaining her household economically. As soon as possible, Flor would like to finish off the roof of her house, which she and her partner were able to build together with great effort. Because of this, she is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in buying beams and galvanized metal sheets. Thus, she will be able to install the roof on the house as quickly as posisble.

loans.use: to buy beams and galvanized metal sheets to build the roof of her home.

loans.name: Claudia Haydee

texts.es: Claudia tiene 24 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y su pequeña hija de dos años de edad. Claudia trabaja en un proyecto que se desarrolla en su comunidad y junto a su esposo quien es jornalero se ganan la vida y llevan el sustento a su hogar. Claudia desea mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la instalación del servicio de energía eléctrica ya que no cuenta con dicho servicio y desea que su hija se desarrolle en mejores condiciones.
texts.en:
Claudia is 24 years old and lives in her own house with her life partner and their two-year-old daughter. Claudia works on a project developed in her community and with her husband, who works as a day labourer, they bring home their earnings.

Claudia wants to improve their housing conditions and that is why she is requesting a loan from FUSAI. She wants to invest in the installation of electric service as she doesn't have this service and she wants her daughter to grow up in better conditions.

loans.use: to install electric service.

loans.name: Blanca Argelia

texts.es: Blanca vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus dos hijos, desde hace varios años se dedica a la agricultura su principal siembra es el maiz y el frijol, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, con lo que obtiene de sus ganancias logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Blanca esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de controles de plaga, semillas, abonos, etc. asi como muestra la fotografia para poder seguir con sus siembras y tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Blanca lives in her own home with her husband and two children. She has worked in agriculture for several years. Her main crop is corn and beans. She sells her products in the different markets near her house. With what she earns, she is able to pay for some of her household expenses. Blanca is asking for a loan to buy pest control, seeds, fertilizer, etc. in order to be able to continue planting and have a better quality of life, as can be seen in the photo.

loans.use: to buy pest control, seeds, fertilizer, etc.

loans.name: Rosario De La Cruz

texts.es: Rosario de 44 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hija, desde hace varios años se dedica a la venta de agua de coco su negocio lo tiene ubicado en el mercado que se encuentra cerca de su lugar de residencia, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo y con la ayuda de su esposo logran salir adelante en los gastos de su hogar, Rosario esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de cocos por mayor para poder seguir con su trabajo que le genera buenas ganancias para tener una mejor calidad de vida junto con su familia.
texts.en:
Rosario is 44 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and daughter. For a number of years now she has worked selling coconut water in a market near where she lives. With the income she earns from her business and the help of her husband, they are able to stay ahead with their household expenses.

Rosario is requesting this loan to buy coconuts at wholesale prices so that she can continue with her business. She hopes to make a good profit and improve her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy coconuts at wholesale prices.

loans.name: Antonia

texts.es: Antonia de 42 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus dos hijos, ella posee una tienda en su lugar de residencia desde hace varios años, posee mucha clientela por la variedad de los productos y los buenos precios, con lo que obtiene de sus ganancias logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Antonia esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de golosinas, granos básicos, refrescos, sopas, detergentes, jabón, etc. para poder surtir su tienda y generar mejores ingresos para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Antonia is 42 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and two children. She has had a small grocery store in her home for a number of years now. She has many customers, because of her good prices and variety of products. With the profit she earns from her business, she is able to pay some of her household expenses.

Antonia is requesting this loan to buy candy, basic grains, soft drinks, soup, detergent, soap, etc. to stock her store. She hopes to improve her income and give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy candy, basic grains, soft drinks, soup, detergent, soap, etc. to stock her store.

loans.name: Aracely

texts.es: Aracely vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella se dedica a la venta y elaboración de hamacas su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia también vende de forma ambulante por las diferentes colonias, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos d su hogar, Aracely esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de hilos de colores por mayor para seguir elaborando las hamacas y así obtener mejores ganancias para darle tener una mejor calidad de vida junto con su esposo.
texts.en: Aracely lives in her own home with her husband. She makes and sells hammocks. She works from her home and also sells in the streets in various neighborhoods. She manages to pay some of the household expenses with her earnings. Aracely is requesting a loan to buy different colored threads to continue to make the hammocks and generate more revenue to enjoy a better quality of living along with her husband.

loans.use: to buy colored thread wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la clienta de 24 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hijo, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa desde hace varios años lo hace de forma ambulante por las diferentes colonias que se encuentran cerca de su casa, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo y con la ayuda de su esposo logran solventar los gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, la clienta esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de ropa por mayor para poder seguir con su trabajo que le genera buenas ganancias y asi darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
The client is 24 years old and lives in a house she owns with her husband and her son. She has been a traveling clothes salesperson for the last few years, selling to the various areas around her home. With the money she makes from her work and also with the help of her husband, she manages to cover their household costs. 

She is asking for this loan to buy clothes in bulk so that she can keep on working and making a good living, thereby providing a better quality of life for her family.

loans.use: buy clothes in bulk to sell on

loans.name: Rosa Elena

texts.es: Doña rosa de 55 años de edad tiene un pequeño negocio de ventas de plantas naturales como:  margaritas, rosas, claveles, entre otros, desde hace 15 años, tiene mucha clientela pues vende variedad de plantas y a precios muy accesibles, con las ganancias que obtiene y con la  ayuda de su esposo y  de una de sus hijas logran cubrir algunos gastos del hogar, vive en casa propia con sus dos hijas y su esposo, doña rosa solicita un crédito para poder comprar mas variedad de plantas por mayor para seguir  obteniendo mejores ganancias y darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Rosa is 55 years old and has for 15 years now had a small business selling plants such as daisies, roses and carnations. She has many customers because of her affordable prices and variety of plants. With the profit she earns and with the help of her husband and one of her daughters, they are able to pay for some of their household expenses. Rosa lives in her own home with her husband and her two daughters.

Rosa is requesting this loan to buy a variety of plants at wholesale prices. She hopes to improve her profits and give her family better financial stability.

loans.use: to buy a variety of plants at wholesale prices.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la cleinta de 24 años de edad vive en casa de un familiar con su abuela y su hija, desde hace varios años posee una tienda en su lugar de residencia tiene mucha clientela por la variedad de los productos que comercializa, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas ayuda en los gastos de la casa, la clienta esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de sopas, refrescos, golosinas, azúcar, arroz, frijoles, aceite, jabón, detergentes, etc. y asi poder continuar con su trabajo y obtener mejores ganancias para tener junto con su familia una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
The borrower is 24 years old and lives in the home of a family member with her grandmother and daughter. For a number of years now she has had a small grocery store in the home where she lives. She has many customers because of the variety of products that she sells. With the income she earns from her sales, she helps with household expenses.

The borrower is requesting this loan to buy soup, soft drinks, candy, sugar, rice, beans, oil, soap, detergent, etc. She hopes to continue with her business and improve her profits so that she and her family can enjoy more financial stability.

loans.use: to buy soup, soft drinks, candy, sugar, rice, beans, oil, soap, detergent, etc. for her store.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: María tiene 31 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida, su hija de 2 años y su hijo de 13 años de edad. Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora quien se dedica a  la crianza y venta de pollo de engorde. Junto a su compañero de vida mantienen la economía del hogar y dan a sus hijos lo necesario. María desea construir un baño para lo cual necesita un financiamiento dado que no cuenta con el capital disponible para hacer el desembolso. Es por esta razón que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, tubos, arena, grava, cemento y para pagar la mano de obra para la construcción.
texts.en: María, 31, lives in her own house with her common-law husband and children: a two-year-old daughter and a thirteen-year-old son.  She is a very hard worker and earns a living raising and selling chickens.  She and her husband support the household economically and give their children all they need.  María wants to build a bathroom and requires a loan because she does not have the capital necessary to cover the expense.  Therefore, she is requesting a loan to buy bricks, pipes, sand, gravel and cement, and to hire workers for the construction.

loans.use: To buy bricks, pipes, sand, gravel and cement to build a bathroom.

loans.name: Candida Yanira

texts.es: Candida de 39 años de edad se dedica a la venta de mariscos desde hace varios años lo hace de forma ambulante por las diferentes colonias tiene mucha clientela por que su producto es fresco y a buen precio, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar, vive en casa propia con su esposo y su  dos hijas, Candida esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mariscos por mayor para poder seguir con sus ventas y asi obtener mejores ganancias y darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Candida is 39 years old. She has been selling seafood for several years as a street vendor in the different settlements. She has many customers because her product is fresh and offered at a good price. She is able to cover the household expenses with what she earns from her sales. She lives in her own home with her husband and her two daughters.

Candida is asking for a loan in order to buy wholesale seafood so she can continue with her sales and obtain better earnings and give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy wholesale seafood

loans.name: Klelia Lizeth

texts.es: Klelia tiene 22 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y su pequeña hija de 3 años de edad. Klelia se dedica a la elaboración y venta de prendas de vestir desde hace 6 años. Es una mujer muy trabajadora y creativa ya que elabora prendas de vestir muy bonitas y a la moda y gracias a eso ha sabido ganarse a muchos clientes. Klelia desea reparar el techo de la vivienda y repellar las paredes de la misma por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSIA para invertir en la compra de teja, madera, cemento y arena para realizar las mejoras necesarias. Klelia espera poder contar con dicho financiamiento y así dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Klelia is 22 years old and lives in her own home with her life companion and her little 3 year old daughter. Klelia has worked making and selling clothing for 6 years. She is a hardworking and creative woman that makes pretty and fashionable outfits and thanks to this she has earned many customers.

Klelia wants to repair the roof of her house and to plaster the walls so she is asking for a loan through FUSIA in order to buy tile, wood, cement, and sand, so that she can make the necessary improvements. Klelia is hoping for the financing so that she can give her family better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy tile, wood, cement, and sand to repair the roof and plaster the walls of the house

loans.name: Imelda De La Paz

texts.es: Imelda de 31 años de edad vive en casa de un familiar con su esposo y sus cuatro hijos, ella se dedica a la venta y elaboración de antojitos como pastelitos de carne, enchiladas, empanadas, yuca y papas fritas, etc. su negocio lo tiene ubicado en las afueras de su casa tiene mucha clientela pues un producto muy vendible, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gasto del hogar, Imelda esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de maiz, frijoles, repollos, carne, tomates, yuca, papas, plátanos, etc. para seguir con su trabajo y darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Imelda is 31 years old and lives in the home of a family member with her husband and four children. She works making and selling snacks such as empanadas, enchiladas, fried yucca and potatoes, etc. Her business is located outside of her house. She has many customers because her products are very popular. She uses the income she earns from her business to pay some of her household expenses.

Imelda is requesting this loan to buy corn, beans, cabbage, meat, tomatoes, yucca, potatoes, plantains, etc. She hopes to continue with her business and give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn, beans, cabbage, meat, tomatoes, yucca, potatoes, plantains, etc.

loans.name: Luis Alonso

texts.es: luis de 57 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar conformado por su esposa y sus dos hijos, el es responsable y trabajador, se dedica a la mecanica de obra de banco( elaboracion de estructuras metalicas: puertas, balcones, portones, techos) desde hace varios años, Don Luis solicita el credito para comprar mas materiales como hierro, laminas, pinturas, barniz, etc. ya que tiene mucha demanda porque hace un buen trabajo y con las ganancias que obtiene ha logrado sacar adelante a su familia y solventar los gastos que se le presentan.
texts.en: Luis, age 57, lives in his own home with his family consisting of his wife and their two children. He is responsible and hardworking. He has been a bench mechanic for several years (making metal structures: doors, balconies, entryways, roofs). Luis requests this loan to buy more materials like iron, metal sheeting, paint, varnish, etc. since he is in high demand for doing a good job. With the income he earns he has been able to support his family and manage their expenses.

loans.use: to buy iron, metal sheeting, paint, varnish, etc.

loans.name: Maria Antonia

texts.es: María tiene 73 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su grupo familiar. María es una mujer trabajadora quien a pesar de sus años lucha día con día para salir adelante y apoyar a su familia con los gastos del hogar. María se dedica a la venta de pupusas, tortillas y bebidas gaseosas. De esta forma se ha ganado la vida desde hace 10 años. Ella desea reparar su vivienda dado que con el tiempo el techo se ha deteriorado, además desea repellar las paredes de la vivienda para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para comprar los materiales necesarios como: teja, madera, clavos, arena y cemento.
texts.en:
Maria is 73 years old and lives in her own home with her family. She is hardworking, and despite her years, she works everyday to get ahead and support her family with household expenses. Maria works selling pupusas [traditional Salvadorean stuffed corn tortillas], tortillas and carbonated soft drinks. She has earned a living with this business for 10 years now.

Maria would like to repair her home, the roof of which has deteriorated with time. She would also like to plaster her walls. She is requesting this loan from FUSAI to buy the necessary materials, such as tile, wood, nails, sand and cement.

loans.use: to buy tile, wood, nails, sand and cement to repair her roof and plaster her walls.

loans.name: Reina Isabel

texts.es: Reina tiene 45 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos quienes se encuentran estudiando. Reina es una mujer trabajador y responsable quien desea mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia. Reina se dedica a la venta de antojitos típicos como: yuca frita, pasteles de carne, enchiladas, papas fritas, etc. Reina ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de canales para la salida de agua, además desea construir un pasamano para lo cual necesita comprar: ladrillo, cemento, hierro, arena y grava.
texts.en: Reina is 45 years old and lives in her own home with her life partner and their children who are currently students. She is a hardworking and responsible woman who wants to improve the living conditions of herself and her family. Reina works selling traditional foods like fried yuca, meat pies, enchiladas, fried potatoes, etc. She has made the decision to request this loan from FUSAI to invest in purchasing gutters for moving water, and she also wants to build a handrail for which she will need brick, cement, iron, sand, and gravel.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, iron, sand, gravel, and gutters, to build a handrail in her home and to hang gutters for moving water.

loans.name: Yoselin Isamar

texts.es: Yoselin tiene 22 años de edad es soltera y habita en casa propia junto a su grupo familiar. Yoselin es una joven muy trabajadora y responsable quien se gana la vida por medio de la venta de productos de belleza por catalogo, comida típica y además ayuda en una tortillería, es una joven admirable tanto por su dedicación en el trabajo como por el emprendedurismo. Ella desea mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena, teja y madera para reparar el techo de la vivienda y para repellar las paredes de la misma.
texts.en:
Yoselin is 22 years old, single and lives in her own house with her family. Yoselin is a very hard working and responsible young woman who makes a living selling beauty products (by mail order) and typical foods and also helps in a tortilla shop. She is an admirable woman as much for her dedication to her work as for her entrepreneurialism. 

She wants better living conditions and so she solicits this loan from FUSAI to invest in buying cement, sand, tiles and wood to repair the roof of her house and to plaster the walls.

loans.use: buying cement, sand, tiles and wood to repair the roof of her house and to plaster the walls.

loans.name: Elsa Nohemy

texts.es: Elsa tiene 27 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos de 10 años y 3 años de edad. Elsa se dedica a la venta de pan dulce y de esa forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Su deseo es cerrar la parte del corredor para habilitarlo como cuarto y así poder contar con mayor espacio para la comodidad de su familia. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, ladrillo, arena, grava y hierro. Confía que con los ingresos que percibe de su negocio de venta de pan dulce logrará cancelar la deuda que el crédito implica.
texts.en: Elsa is 27 years old and lives in her own house along with her spouse and her two children who are 10 and 3 years old. Elsa is dedicated to selling pastries and thus makes a living and supports her family. Her wish is to close up part of the hallway to turn it into a room and thus be able to have greater space for the comfort of her family. Therefore she has requested this loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of cement, brick, sand, gravel and iron. She says that with the income she receives from her business selling pastries she will manage to pay the loan debt.

loans.use: ti buy cement, brick, sand, gravel, and iron to build walls for a room.

loans.name: Ever Alonso

texts.es: Ever tiene 27 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida, padres y hermano. Ever se dedica a la venta de granos básicos especialmente de maíz y maicillo. Ever desea hacer algunas mejoras en su vivienda para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la reparación del techo, piso y paredes de la vivienda. Con el monto solicitado comprará lámian galvanizada, cemento, arena y grava para reparar el techo, repellar las paredes y encementar el piso de la vivienda ya que se encuentra en malas condiciones.
texts.en:
Ever, age 27, lives in his own house with his life partner, his parents, and his brother.   Ever sells basic grains, especially corn and sorghum.

Ever wishes to make some improvements to his house.  In order to do so he is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in repairing the roof, floor, and walls of his house.  He will use the loan to buy galvanized metal sheeting, cement, sand, and gravel to repair the roof, to plaster the walls, and to pour cement flooring in his house.  He will do this because it is now in bad condition.

loans.use: to buy galvanized metal sheeting, cement, sand, and gravel.

loans.name: Juan Humberto

texts.es: Juan tiene 59 años de edad y reside en casa propia junto a su esposa y su hijo de 14 años de edad. Juan se dedica a la agricultura y al comercio de ganado desde hace 20 años. Juan desea mejorar la seguridad de su humilde vivienda para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de un portón metálico y tela metálica para construir un cerco perimetral y proteger sus pocas pertenencias y familia.
texts.en: Juan is 59 years old and resides in his own home along with his wife and 14-year-old son. Juan has made a living in agriculture and the livestock trade for 20 years. Juan wishes to improve the security of his humble home. For this, he is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of a metal gate and wire mesh to construct a perimeter fence and protect his few belongings and family.

loans.use: to purchase a metal gate and wire mesh to construct a perimeter fence.

loans.name: Marta Alicia

texts.es: Marta tiene 33 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su hijo de 20 años de edad ya que sus otros hijos ya son independientes y cuando pueden le apoyan con los gastos del hogar. Marta se dedica a la venta de comida, bebidas y golosinas desde hace 6 años y es así como ha sacado adelante a su familia. Marta solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de una pila y mejorar el corredor de la vivienda dado que se encuentra deteriorado a causa de las lluvias y el tiempo. Con el monto solicitado comprará cemento, ladrillo, arena y lámina galvanizada. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento y así dar inicio a las mejoras lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Marta is 33 years old and lives with her 20 year old son in a house that she owns.  Her other children are independent, and when they can, they help her with her household expenses.  Marta has worked selling food, drinks and snacks for the past six years, by which she has been able to get her family ahead.  

Marta is seeking a loan from FUSAI to invest in the construction of a sink and to repair the hallway in her home as it is in poor shape because of the rain and its age.  With the requested amount, she will purchase cement, bricks, sand, and galvanized metal sheets.  She hopes to be able to receive this funding so that she can begin the repairs as soon as possible.

loans.use: purchase cement, bricks, sand and galvanized metal sheets to build a sink and a hallway in her home.

loans.name: Blanca Mabel

texts.es: Blanca tiene 46 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y su hija de 19 años de edad. Blanca se dedica al comercio de perfumes, zapatos y joyas por catalogo. De esta forma se gana la vida y junto a su compañero de vida van saliendo adelante y dan a su familia mejores condiciones de vida. Blanca desea mejorar la seguridad de su vivienda para lo cual solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de puertas y ventanas de metal para proteger sus pocas pertenencias y a su querida familia ya que las que tiene se encuentran en mal estado.
texts.en:
Blanca is 46 and lives in her own house with her partner and 19-year-old daughter. Blanca makes a living selling perfume, shoes and catalog jewelry. In this way, she makes a living, and with the help of her partner, they are getting ahead and giving their family better living conditions. 

Blanca hopes to improve the security of her home, which is why she is requesting a loan from FUSAI. It will be invested in the purchase of metal doors and windows to protect her few belongings and beloved family, since the ones she currently has are in poor condition.

loans.use: to buy metal doors and windows for her home

loans.name: Sarvia Raquel

texts.es: Sarvia tiene 27 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y su pequeño hijo de 5 meses de edad. Ella trabaja como empleada en ventas en una tienda de su localidad desde hace tres años. Sarvia solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de un cuarto dormitorio para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra ladrillo, cemento, arena, grava y hierro para proceder lo antes posible a la construcción del cuarto.
texts.en: Sarvia is 27 and lives in her own house with her partner and small five-month-old son. For the last three years, she has worked as a saleswoman in a store in her area. Sarvia is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in building a bedroom, which is why she is asking for a loan to purchase bricks, cement, sand, gravel and iron in order to proceed as soon as possible with the building of the room.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand, gravel and iron to build a room

loans.name: Karina Beatriz

texts.es: Karina de 19 años de edad habita en casa de la suegra junto a su pequeña hija de 5 años de edad. Karina lucha cada día para poder brindar a su hija mejores condiciones de vida. El compañero de vida de Karina emigro hace algunos años al extranjero en busca de mejores condiciones de vida. Lastimosamente los ingresos no les alcanzan a cubrir los gastos del hogar por lo que Karina ha logrado establecer un pequeño negocio en el cual vende pupusas y refrescos. Karina desea  mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales y las de su familia por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la mejora del piso y construcción del pasamano para lo cual necesita comprar material como: cemento, arena, grava y ladrillo.
texts.en: Karina, age 19, lives in her mother-in-law's home with her little 5-year-old daughter. Karina works hard every day to provide her daughter with better living conditions. Karina's partner emigrated a few years ago to another country in search of better living conditions. Unfortunately, their income does not cover their living costs. Because of this, Karina has been able to establish a small business where she sells pupusas [a thick corn tortilla stuffed with cheese, fried pork rind, chicken, or refried beans] and drinks. Karina wants to improve the living conditions of herself and her family, so she is requesting this loan from FUSAI. She will invest in improving the floor and building bannisters. For this, she needs to buy materials like cement, sand, gravel, and bricks.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, gravel and bricks to cement the floor and build bannisters in the home.

loans.name: Martha Alicia

texts.es: Martha tiene 52 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y su hija. Marta se dedica a  la venta de pan dulce de forma ambulante desde hace tres años. Martha trabaja muy duro para sacar adelante a su familia y dar mejores condiciones. Ella solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de puertas y ventanas para la vivienda y para encementar el piso de la vivienda. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento y así poder dar mayor seguridad a su vivienda.
texts.en: Martha is 52 years old and lives in her own house with her husband and her daughter. Martha has made a living by selling pan dulce on the street for three years. Martha works very hard to support her family and give them better living conditions. She is requesting this loan from FUSAI so she can invest in the purchase of doors and windows for her home and install cement flooring in her home. She hopes to receive this loan so she can make her home safer.

loans.use: to purchase doors, windows, cement, sand, and gravel

loans.name: Jose Israel

texts.es: José de 50 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y sus dos hijos de 23 años y 17 años de edad. José trabaja como empleado en un taller de mecánica cercano a su localidad desde hace 6 años. José desea construir una pared de ladrillo y encementar el piso el cual actualmente es de tierra. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento, arena,  grava y hierro para proceder lo antes posible a construir la pared y encementar el piso.
texts.en: Jose is 50 years old and lives in his own home with this wife and two children, ages 23 and 17. He has worked as an employee in a vehicle repair shop near his home for six years. Jose would like to build a brick wall and put in a cement floor, which is currently just earth. For this reason, he is requesting this loan from FUSAI to buy bricks, cement, sand, gravel and iron to build the wall and put in the cement floor as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand, gravel and iron to build a brick wall and put in a cement floor in his home.

loans.name: Roxana De Los Angeles

texts.es: Roxana tiene 39 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a sus dos hijos de 19 años y 7 años de edad y su pequeña hija de 11 años de edad. Lastimosamente hace algunos años se separó de su esposo quien emigro hacia el extranjero en busca de mejores condiciones de vida lo cual les costo la separación. Hoy en día recibe ayuda de su ex esposo lo cual le permite ajustar junto a lo que ella recibe de su negocio de venta de ropa para mantener a sus hijos y darles lo necesario. Ella solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de una pared de división de un cuarto la cual no ha logrado construir por falta de recursos económicos por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, arena, cemento y hierro para finalizar la pared y poder contar con mayor comodidad.
texts.en:
Roxana is 39 years old and lives in her own home with her two sons, ages 19 and 7, and her 11-year-old daughter. Unfortunately, she separated from her husband a few years ago after he emigrated to another country to look for better living conditions. She currently receives assistance from her ex-husband, which she combines with the money she earns from her clothing sales business to support her children and provide for them.

She requests this loan from FUSAI to invest in the construction of a wall to divide a room. She has not been able to build this due to a lack of resources, which is why she has requested the loan from FUSAI. She will invest in the purchase of bricks, sand, cement, and iron to finish the wall and have more comfort.

loans.use: to purchase bricks, sand, cement, and iron to finish construction on a wall.

loans.name: Veronica Claribel

texts.es: Verónica tiene 39 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su madre de 65 años de edad quien depende económicamente de ella. Verónica se dedica a la elaboración y venta de flores artesanales desde hace 9 años. Ella es muy trabajador y responsable y sus vecinos dan buenas referencias de ella. Verónica ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI dado que desea invertir en la mejora del piso de los cuartos de la vivienda ya que se encuentra deteriorado. Con el monto solicitado comprará cemento, arena, y ladrillo de piso para hacer la mejora lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Verónica is 39 years old and lives in her own home with her 65-year-old mother, who depends on her financially. Verónica works making and selling hand crafted flowers. She has been doing this for nine years. She is very hardworking and responsible and has good references from her neighbors. 

Verónica has decided to request this loan from FUSAI because she wants to invest in improving the bedroom floors in her home, which are in disrepair. She will use the requested amount to buy cement, sand, and floor tiles to make the improvement as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, and floor tiles to replace the bedroom floors in her house.

loans.name: Ruth Elizabeth

texts.es: Ruth tiene 44 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus hijos. Ruth se dedica a la prestación de servicios domésticos desde hace 3 años y es así como se gana la vida y junto a su esposo mantienen la economía del hogar. Ruth solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la introducción del agua potable en su vivienda dado que no cuenta con el servicio y tiene que trasladarse a otro lugar para acarrear el vital liquido.
texts.en:
Ruth is 44 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and children. She has been providing housekeeping services for the past three years in order to earn a living. Ruth and her husband work together in maintaining the household finances.

Ruth is requesting this loan from FUSAI so that she can bring potable water into her home. At the moment, she does not have this service so she must travel to another location and bring back water to her house.

loans.use: to install a potable water connection in her house.

loans.name: Blanca Aracely

texts.es: Blanca tiene 49 años de edad es soltera y habita junto a su madre quien depende de ella económicamente. Blanca se dedica a la venta de ropa usada de forma ambulante. La venta la realiza desde hace más de 20 años y es así como mantiene su hogar y busca las formas de salir adelante. Blanca desea mejorar las paredes de su vivienda y comenzar la construcción de una fosa séptica. Por lo anterior solicita solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de arena, cemento, ladrillo y grava para dar inicio al repello de las paredes de la vivienda y para comenzar a construir la fosa séptica.
texts.en: Blanca is 49 years old. She is single and lives with her mother, who depends on her financially. Blanca sells used clothes as a street vendor. She has been selling for more than 20 years and it is how she supports her home and seeks ways to get ahead. Blanca wants to improve the walls in her home and start building a septic tank. To do this, she is asking for this loan from FUSAI to invest in buying sand, cement, bricks and gravel to start finishing the walls and to start building the septic tank.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement, bricks and gravel to finish the walls of the house and build a septic tank.

loans.name: Nuria Guadalupe

texts.es: Nuria tiene 37 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo, dos hijos de 20 y 17 años de edad y una hija de 12 años de edad. Nuría se dedica a la confección de variedad de prendas de vestir desde hace mas de 20 años. Gracias a la calidad del trabajo que realiza ya cuenta  con muchos clientes que cada día la prefieren más. Nuria desea construir un muro de retención dado que su vivienda se encuentra en un terreno inclinado el cual no es muy seguro. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena, ladrillo y hierro. De esta forma espera dar a su familia mayor seguridad.
texts.en: Nuria is 37 years old and lives in her own house with her husband, her 20-year-old son, her 17-year-old son, and her 12-year-old daughter. For twenty years, Nuria has made a living by making various garments. Thanks to the quality of her work, she already has many clients who like her more every day. Nuria wants to build a retaining wall, since her home is located on sloping land and is not very secure. For this reason, she is requesting a loan from FUSAI in order to invest in cement, sand, brick, and iron. In this way, she hopes to give her family greater security.

loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, bricks, and iron for building a retaining wall

loans.name: Fatima Carolina

texts.es: Fatima tiene 41 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su hija de 14 años de edad y su pequeño hijo de 9 años de edad. Fatima trabaja muy duro en una institución cercana a su localidad desde hace 9 años y de esa forma mantiene a sus hijos. Fatima desea construir un corredor a su vivienda para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI  para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, y hierro. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento y así poder dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en: Fatima is 41 years old and lives in her own house alongside her 14-year-old daughter and her young 9-year-old son. Fatima has been working very hard at a local institution for nine years and, with this job, she supports her children. Fatima wants to build a hall in her house. She is applying for a loan from "FUSAI" in order to buy galvanised laminate sheeting and iron. Fatima hopes to be able to count on this loan and to be able to give her family better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy galvanised laminate sheeting and iron in order to build a hall in her home.

loans.name: Marlene Elisabeth

texts.es: Marlene de 32 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos quienes estudian actualmente, ella se dedica  a la venta de ajos lo hace de forma ambulante por las diferentes colonias que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia posee mucha clientela porque su producto es muy vendible, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra sacra adelante a sus dos hijos, Marlene esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de ajos por mayor para poder seguir con su trabajo y así darle a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Marlene is 32 years old and lives in her own house with her two children, who are both currently studying. Marlene makes a living selling garlic as a street vendor in the different areas near her home. She has many customers as her product is very popular. With the money that she earns from her sales, Marlene manages to get ahead with her two children. Marlene is applying for a loan in order to buy garlic in bulk. She can then continue with her work and offer her children a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy garlic in bulk.

loans.name: Alfredo

texts.es: Alfredo de 49 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus tres hijos, el se dedica a la agricultura desde hace varios años su principal siembra es el maíz y el frijol, cunado su cosecha ya esta lista la almacena en los graneros que muestra la fotografía para luego salir a comercializarla en los alrededores de la zona donde el reside, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Alfredo esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de abonos, fertilizantes, controles de plagas, semillas, herbicidas, etc. para poder continuar con sus cultivos y así generar mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
Alfredo is 49 years old and lives in his own home with his wife and three children. He has made a living in agriculture for many years. His main crops are corn and beans. When the harvest is ready, he stores it in the granaries that are shown in the photograph to later go and sell it around the zone where he lives. With what he obtains from his sales he is able to pay some home expenses.

Alfredo is requesting a loan for the purchase of manure, fertilizer, pest control, seeds, herbicide, etc., to be able to continue with his crops and so generate better profits.

loans.use: to purchase manure, fertilizer, pest control, seeds, herbicide, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cement, iron, sand and brick and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Elsy Guadalupe

texts.es: Elsy de 47 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida, Elsy tiene un negocio de venta de ropa en donde ofrece variedad de prendas de vestir su negocio esta ubicado en el mercado que se encuentra cerca de su lugar de residencia en una zona muy transitada y conocida por los habitantes del municipio. El puesto de Elsy  es muy visitado ya que las personas siempre encuentran lo que buscan y en este lugar, la amabilidad y el buen trato es lo más importante. Su sueño es ver crecer su negocio por lo que ha decidido hacer un préstamo a INTEGRAL para poder comprar mas ropa por mayor y tener más variedad de prendas de vestir Como: pantalones, faldas, blusas, camisetas, shorts, entre otros. Con el propósito de atraer a más compradores y lograr un mayor nivel de ventas así como un mayor nivel de ingresos para tener junto con su compañero de vida una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Elsy is 47 years old and lives in her own house with her life's companion. She has a business selling clothes where she offers a variety of items to wear. Elsy's business is located in the market close to her residence in a zone much-traveled and well-known to the city's inhabitants. Her stall is frequently visited because people always find what they are looking for. In this shop, friendliness and good treatment is the most important thing.

Elsy's dream is to see her business grow. For that reason, she decided to approach INTEGRAL to arrange a loan for purchasing merchandise such as pants, skirts, blouses, t-shirts, and shorts, among other items. Her goal is to attract more buyers and achieve a higher level of sales and income, in order to share a better quality of life with her companion.

loans.use: buy clothing at wholesale to sell.

loans.name: Jose Adalberto

texts.es: Jose de 32 años de edad es una persona muy trabajadora y responsable quien vive junto a su esposa y sus hijos en casa propia. Jose se dedica a la pesca artesanal, contando con una pequeña lancha y algunas redes para obtener mariscos. Él se ha dedicado a esta actividad durante varios años, la cual incluso ahora le permite salir adelante.El solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para invertir en la compra de más redes para pescar así como muestra la fotografía, también anzuelos y otros instrumentos necesarios para realizar la pesca diariamente, desea darle una mejor vida a su familia en donde puedan contar con todo lo necesario.
texts.en:
Jose is 32 years old and he is a very hardworking and responsible person. He lives with his wife and children in his own home.

Jose makes his living in small scale fishing. He has a small boat and a few nets to catch seafood. He has worked at this occupation for several years, which has always helped him to get ahead.

He is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL through which he will have the money he needs to invest in the purchase of more fishing nets, as shown in the photograph, as well as fishing hooks and other gear necessary for daily fishing.

He wants to give his family a better life in which they can everything they need.

loans.use: to buy more fishing nets, hooks, and other gear.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: el cliente de 28 años de edad vive en casa propia con su madre, el se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 8 años su principal cultivo es el maíz comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, posee mucha clientela establecida ya que su producto es de muy buena calidad y a buen precio, con lo que obtiene de sus ganancias ayuda en los gastos de su casa, el cliente esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. y así continuar con sus cosechas ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y así poder tener junto con su madre una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en: The client is 28-years old and lives in his own home with his mother.  He has made his living in agriculture for the last eight years.  His main crop is corn, which he sells in the different markets near his house.  He has a large, established clientele, as his products are high quality and well-priced.  With what he earns, he is able to help with the household expenses.  The client is requesting a loan to purchase seeds, fertilizers, compost, pest control etc. so he can continue with his harvests.  Farming is his only source of work, and with the loan he and his mother will be able to have better financial stability.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers, compost, pest control etc.

loans.name: Ana Guadalupe

texts.es: Ana tiene 45 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo, su hija de 11 años y su hijo de 14 años de edad. Ana se dedica al comercio de pan dulce de manera ambulante desde hace más de 6 años. Ana desea mejorar las condiciones habitacionales para su familia para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de un cuarto dormitorio para su hija para lo cual necesita material como: ladrillo, cemento, arena y hierro.
texts.en: Ana is 45-years-old and lives in her own home with her husband. Her daughter is 11-years-old and her son is 14-years-old. She makes a living selling sweet breads on foot and has done so for six years. Ana hopes to improve her living conditions for her family and is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in the construction of one bedroom for her daughter. For this she needs materials including brick, cements, gravel and iron.

loans.use: to buy brick, cement, gravel and iron to build a bedroom.

loans.name: Jose Santos

texts.es: Jose de 48 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus tres hijos, el se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras desde varios años y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, el lugar donde comercia es muy estratégico para la actividad y además muy concurrido de personas, ya tiene mucha clientela que lo prefieren porque su producto es fresco, a buen precio, de calidad y con un excelente servicio, en las últimas semanas aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar para realizar una nueva inversión pero no posee de suficiente capital que la respalde por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar frutas y verduras por mayor como fresas, plátanos, naranjas, tomates, cebollas, chiles, etc. Jose esta agradecido con el apoyo y asegura que podrá saldar la deuda, a la vez confía que le dará a su familia una vida mejor.
texts.en: Jose is 48 years old and lives with his wife and three children in a house that he owns. He's been selling fruits and vegetables for several years. This has provided him with a great deal of experience in sales, which allows him to make higher profits. His place of business is very strategically located and also very much sought after. He already has a large clientele who comes to him because his produce is fresh, high-quality, sold at good prices and with excellent service. Demand has increased in the past few weeks, and he wishes to make the most of it by making a new investment. However, he doesn't have enough capital for that, which is why he's requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that allows him to purchase wholesale fruits and vegetables such as strawberries, plantains, oranges, tomatoes, onions, peppers, etc. Jose is grateful for the support and guarantees that he'll be able to repay the loan. At the same time, he's confident that he'll improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale fruits and vegetables such as strawberries, plantains, oranges, tomatoes, onions, peppers, etc.

loans.name: Pius

texts.en: Pius is married to Jane, and together they have eight children, four who are above 18 years, while the other four are still in school. Pius runs a butchery and also does some farming activity. He has been in the business for the last 14 years and makes a monthly income of KES. 28,000. This is his fourth loan with VisionFund Kenya.  He plans to purchase goats for slaughter for his butchery, and use the anticipated profits to pay the loan and save the remainder. He hopes and dreams of commanding a chain of businesses.

loans.use: to buy goats for slaughter.

loans.name: Reyna Maria

texts.es:
Reyna de 54 años de edad, casada con dos hijos mayores de edad e independiente, es originaria de  León, lugar que está ubicado en la zona norte del país. Se caracteriza por ser trabajadora, responsable, con ganas de superación personal. Cuando sus hijos eran pequeños todavía se desempeñaba como maestra de la localidad. Lamentablemente quedo sin trabajo motivo por el cual se decidió a establecer su negocio, para poder ayudar con los gastos del hogar. En la actualidad sigue con su negocio, para poder sobrevivir ya que hoy en día sus hijos cumplió con su sueño de fórmalos y  que sean persona independiente.
Gracia a su esfuerzo y sus ganas de superación personal, tiene por actividad económica la venta de mercadería en general como: pantalones, chores, faldas, camisetas, ropa interior, ropa de cama, perfumes, body, cosméticos. Ella dedica a su negocio unas ocho  horas diarias ofreciendo su producto, el cual desempeña de forma ambulante y en su casa de habitación. El objetivo del crédito es invertir en capital de trabajo y surtir su negocio en la compra y venta de mercadería para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda obtener mejores ingresos. Reyna agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva les brindan a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
Reyna is 54, married, and has two independent adult children. She comes from León, in the northern part of the country. She is both hard-working and responsible, and she shows a personal desire to improve herself. When her children were small she was still acting as a neighbourhood teacher. Unfortunately she was left without work, which was why she decided to set up her business and cover her household expenses. Currently she is carrying on with her business in order to survive because now her children have fulfilled her dream of becoming educated and living independent lives.

Thanks to her effort and her personal desire to improve herself, she sells goods such as trousers, shorts, skirts, shirts, underwear, bed linen, perfume, body creams and cosmetics. She works eight hours a day selling her goods as a street vendor and from her own home. She wants the loan to invest in working capital to stock her business for buying and selling goods so that in the near future she will be able to earn a better income. Reyna is grateful for the help that Kiva lenders provide to those with few resources and to poor countries such as Nicaragua so that people can have dignified work.

loans.use: to invest in working capital to stock her business by purchasing and selling items such as trousers, shorts, skirts, shirts, underwear, bed linen, perfumes, body creams and cosmetics.

loans.name: Jenifa

texts.en:
Jenifa is a 65-year-old lady from Kakamega county.  She is married to Thomas, who is a farmer in the same region.  Together they are blessed with four children, ages 15,13, 9 and 6-years-old.

She operates a retail shop business.  She has done this for 14 years making a monthly income of KES 12,000.  She is taking KES 20,000, her fifth loan with VisionFund Kenya, which she intends to use to expand her current business.

The anticipated profits will be used to pay fees for her children and part of it will be plowed back into the business.

loans.use: To purchase sacks of sugar and flour to resell to her customers.

loans.name: Karina

texts.es: Karina es una joven de 18 años de edad que vive en la ciudad de Chincha, Perú. Ella es una joven que disfruta mucho de escuchar su música favorita y tejer algunas prendas u adornos para decorar su casa. Karina se dedica a la confección y venta de tejido de canastas en la puerta de su casa, este tipo de productos es muy comercializado en la ciudad de Chincha, pueden ofrecer desde sillas hasta carteras, bonitas, simples y coloridas. Ella nos comenta que fue su madre la que anteriormente se dedicaba a la venta de este tipo de productos y fue así como Karina aprendió desde muy niña sobre este arte. Actualmente ella cuida y vela por su madre ya que ella ya no puede vender porque su visión no es muy buena, pero en algunas ocasiones ayuda a Karina a tejer, Karina sabe que sus productos son de buena calidad y que sus tejidos son distintos a los demás, por el momento ella solo vende los días miércoles y sábados, en el transcurso de la semana ella se dedica a la recepción de pedidos. Esta es la segunda vez que los prestatarios Kiva le brindan su apoyo, Karina podrá realizar la compra de Juncos, Totora, Pintura, entre otros materiales que son necesarios para la confección de sus productos, con esta mejora podrá cumplir su gran sueño “Ser una empresaria exitosa y desde luego aprender otro tipo de arte para ampliar la variedad de sus productos”
texts.en:
Karina is 18 years old and lives in the city of Chincha, Perú. She enjoys listening to her favorite music and weaving items and ornaments to decorate her home.

Karina works making and selling basketweave products in the entrance to her home. This type of product is sold throughout the city of Chincha. Basketweave can be used to make pretty, simple and colored items that range from chairs to wallets and purses. Karina says that her mother used to work selling these products, and that she learned this art from her mother since she was a little girl.

Now Karina cares for and looks after her mother, who is no longer able to work selling items because her vision is not very good. However she sometimes still helps Karina weave. Karina says that her products are of good quality and that her weaves are different from the others. At the moment she only sells her products Wednesdays and Saturdays, and during the rest of the week she accepts orders.

This is the second time that Kiva lenders will support Karina. She plans to buy reeds, rushes, paint and other materials needed to make her products. She hopes to make her greatest dream a reality, which is to be a successful businesswoman and to learn another type of art to increase the variety of her products.

loans.use: to buy reeds, rushes, paint and other materials needed to make her basketweave products.

loans.name: Lucila

texts.es:
Lucia es una mujer muy trabajadora, desde hace unos 3 años tiene su pequeño negocio de venta de abarrotes, verduras, pollo, bebidas gaseosas entre otros, ella le dedica le dedica a su negocio hasta 10 horas ya que de los ingresos que brinda su negocio depende que ella siga adelante y solvente los gastos de su hogar.

Lucia esta agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar mercadería para la campaña navideña y de año nuevo, como adornos, para el hogar, abarrotes, panetones, entre otros, lo que le permitirá poder atender mejor a sus clientes y seguir luchando para hacer realidad su gran sueño:” aumentar su negocio”.
texts.en:
Lucia is a very hardworking woman and has had a small grocery, vegetable, chicken, soft drinks, and other sales business for three years.  She works for up to 10 hours because she depends on the income from her business so she can pay her household expenses.

Lucia is grateful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to their help, she has been able to buy merchandise, such as household items, groceries, pants, and other things for the Christmas and New Year season, which will allow her to better serve her customers and continue to strive for making her greatest dream a reality, “To grow her business.”

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Yanet

texts.es:
Yanet tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante, ella con muchos esfuerzo inicio su negocio de venta de recargas telefónicas, equipos celulares y golosinas y snack, con lo cual tiene ingresos para poder salir adelante cada día.

Yanet esta agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar mercadería para su negocio como tarjetas de recargas, accesorios para celulares, entre otros, que le permitirán tener mayor variedad de productos para ofrecer y poder mejorar sus ventas, así ella seguirá luchando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Comprar un terreno para poder construir su vivienda”.
texts.en:
Yanet has a strong desire to get ahead. With a lot of effort, she started her own business selling mobile phone refills and equipment, candies and snacks. She uses the income she earns to keep working to get ahead every day.

Yanet is grateful to Kiva lenders, because thanks to their support she will be able to buy merchandise for her business, such as mobile phone refill cards and accessories. This will allow her to offer a greater variety of products and improve her sales. She hopes to keep striving to make her greatest dream a reality, which is to buy a plot of land on which to build a house.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her business, such as mobile phone refill cards and accessories.

loans.name: Manuel David

texts.es:
Manuel vive en la ciudad de Ica y desde hace un año trabaja en una pequeña empresa de la ciudad como empleado, el labora alrededor de 9 horas al día y con los ingresos de su trabajo puede solventar sus gastos de manutención.

Manuel está agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar una mesa y sillas, y de esta manera poder tener un lugar donde comer y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Manuel lives in the city of Ica and works for a small company in town.  He works nine hours a day and pays his expenses with his salary.

Manuel is grateful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to their help he will be able to buy a table and chairs and be able to have a place to eat and improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a table and chairs.

loans.name: Humelia

texts.es:
Humelia vive en la ciudad de Chincha, trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de abarrotes, gas domésticos y adornos y utensilios para el hogar, asimismo en ocasiones vende comida en especial los fines de semana, Humelia trabaja desde muy temprano en su negocio, sobre todo porque es madre de un hijo al cual quiere mucho y por el cual sale adelante.

Humelia esta agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que podrá comprar mercadería para su tienda de abarrotes  como arroz, azúcar, entre otros, con los cual podrá abastecer su tienda y poder atender a sus clientes de mejor manera, de esta manera podrá seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:”Tener su casa construida de material noble”.
texts.en:
Humelia lives in the city of Chincha. She has a small business selling groceries, gas and utensils and decorations for the home.  Humelia sometimes also sells meals, mainly at the weekend.  Humelia works from very early in the morning.  She is a mother to one son, whom she loves very much and for whom she is trying to get ahead.

Humelia is grateful to Kiva lenders as she will now be able to buy merchandise for her grocery store. She can buy products such as rice, sugar and more and use them to stock up her store and better serve her customers.  Humelia can then continue fighting to make her dream, of having a house built of stronger material, a reality.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Yolanda Emperatriz

texts.es:
Yolanda tiene 20 años de edad, ella vive en la calidad ciudad de ICA, junto a su linda familia. Yolanda es una joven muy emprendedora, debido a los bajos ingresos de sus padres ella decidió estudiar y trabajar al mismo tiempo, ella a la actualidad estudia la carrera de administración y trabaja como encargada de tienda (zapatería) en un centro comercial de la cuidad.

Yolanda está muy agradecida con los prestatarios de KIVA, ya que el dinero lo invertirá en la compra de un escritorio y así tener mayor comodidad para realizar sus trabajos de la universidad.

El sueño de Yolanda es culminar sus estudios y lograr ser una gran empresaria.
texts.en:
Yolanda is 20 years old. She lives in the city of ICA, with her beautiful family. Yolanda  is a very enterprising young woman. Due to her parents' low income, she decided to go to school and work at the same time. Right now, she is studying business administration and she works as a store manager (shoe store) in the commercial center of the city.  

Yolanda is very grateful to the KIVA lenders because she will invest the money in buying a desk so she can do her college work more conveniently. Yolanda's dream is to finish her major and become a great businesswoman.

loans.use: to buy a desk for her studies.

loans.name: Nilton Nicanor

texts.es:
Nilton es un hombre muy trabajador, el desde muy joven tuvo la necesidad de trabajar ya que sus padres tenían pocos medios económicos y es debido a ello que solo pudo estudiar hasta el quinto grado de secundaria, aunque le hubiera gustado mucho estudiar la carrera de mecánica automotriz. La vivienda de Nilton se ubica en la ciudad de Chincha, vive al lado de su esposa y sus hijos, los cuales son muy traviesos pero Nilton los quiere muchísimo y es por ello que lucha y se  sacrifica cada día para poder convertirlos en personas de bien 

Cada día Nilton trabaja en su negocio de venta de reparación y mantenimiento de autos, el trabaja alrededor de 8 horas al día y puede atender hasta 6 clientes diariamente; él cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy amable con los clientes y realiza su trabajo con honradez y responsabilidad.
Nilton está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar repuestos para autos y de esta manera poder venderlos a sus clientes, así mejorara sus ingresos y seguirá luchando por hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle buena educación a sus hijos y Tener un taller muy grande”
texts.en:
Nilton is a very hardworking man who had to begin working at a very early age because his parents were of low financial means.  Because of this he was only able to get through the fifth grade, although he would have liked to study to become an automotive mechanic.  Nilton’s house is located in the city of Chincha, where he lives with his wife and children, who are very mischievous, but Nilton loves them very much and he strives and sacrifices each day to be able to turn them into persons of means.

Nilton is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, because thanks to their help he has been able to buy car parts and sell them to his customers.  This way he can improve his income and will continue to work toward making his greatest dreams a reality: “To provide a good education for his children and to have a larger workshop.”

loans.use: to buy inventory.

loans.name: Deny

texts.es:
Deny es un joven de 23 años, el cual tiene un hijo al cual quiere mucho y por el cual se esfuerza cada día para salir adelante. Deny con mucho esfuerzo trabaja en su pequeño negocio de herrerría y cerrajería, en el cual elabora puertas, ventanas, entre otros, con lo cual puede tener ingresos para poder salir adelante.

Deny está agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su apoyo el podrá comprar materiales para poder realizar su trabajo como fierro, liquido soldador, entre otros; de esta manera podrá atender el pedido de sus clientes y poder seguir adelante en busca de hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Comprar un terreno”.
texts.en:
Deny, 23, is a young man who has a son whom he loves a lot and for whom he works hard every day to get ahead.

Deny works in his small blacksmith and locksmith business.  He makes doors, windows, and other things, and earns the income to be able to get ahead.

Deny's grateful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to their support he'll be able to buy iron, liquid solder, and other materials for work.  This way he'll be able to take care of his customers' requests and move forward in search of achieving his big dream of buying a plot of land.

loans.use: to buy supplies

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a wardrobe [furniture for storing clothes], computer furniture, and others.

loans.name: Maria Luz

texts.es:
Maria vive en la ciudad de Nazca y trabaja en su negocio de salón de belleza alrededor de 4 años, Maria logro iniciar su negocio luego de mucho ahorro y esfuerzo, sobre todo porque e smadre de 2 hijos y necesitaba tener un ingresos para poder sacarlos adelante, empezó su negocio en un pequeño local alquilado en el mercado de su ciudad.

Maria esta agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le están brindado ella podrá comprar muebles para su negocio como sillones espejos, mesitas de manicura y pedicura, entre otros, ya que ella habilitara un espacio de su casa para poder atender a sus clientes y de esta manera ya no pagar alquiler, así ella seguirá luchando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener un gran spa”.
texts.en:
María lives in the city of Nazca and has worked in her beauty salon business for about four years.  She managed to start her business with a lot of savings and effort in a small rented space in the city market.  She's the mother of two children and needed to have an income to get them ahead.  

María's grateful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to their help she'll be able to buy chairs, mirrors, manicure and pedicure tables, and other furniture for her business.

She's going to renovate a space in her home to be able to serve her customers and not have to pay rent.  This way she'll keep on striving to achieve her big dream of having a spa.

loans.use: to buy tables and chairs

loans.name: Raul

texts.es:
