Carlos está agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado podrá comprar un rotamartillo para demolición, el cual le servirá de mucha ayuda ya que actualmente tiene que alquilarlo; así podrá seguir trabajando y podrá mejorar sus ingresos y seguir esforzándose para tener una vida mejor.
texts.en:
Carlos is a very hardworking man, he lives with his mother who he supports through his work. Carlos has gotten through from day to day offering his services as a construction worker for jobs such as plastering, construction and painting etc, for two years.

Carlos is grateful to the Kiva lenders, as thanks to they help they have offered, he will be able to buy an electric drill for demolition, which will be a great help, as now he has to hire one; so he will be able to keep working and will be able to make a better income and keep striving to have a better life.

loans.use: to buy an electric drill.

loans.name: Leon

texts.es:
León vive en la ciudad de Aguaytia, es un hombre muy trabajador, el labora en una tiene como vendedor y atención al cliente, asimismo tiene una pequeña parcela en la cual cultiva productos de pan llevar con lo cual tiene un dinero extra para poder salir adelante, debido a los pocos recursos económicos de sus padres, solo pudo estudiar hasta el nivel primario, pero le hubiera gustado ir a la universidad.

Leon está agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar un terreno, en el cual mas adelante podrá construir su vivienda, así Leon seguirá esforzándose ´para poder hacer realidad su sueño de Tener su casa construida”.
texts.en:
Leon lives in the city of Aguaytia, he is a very hardworking man, he works in a shop as a salesman and doing customer service. He also has a small piece of ground where he grows staple food crops, which gives him some extra money to be able to get ahead. Due to the few financial resources his parents had, he was only able to study to primary school level, but he would have liked to go to university.

Leon is grateful to the Kiva lenders, as thanks to the help they offer, he will be able to buy a piece of land in which he will be able to build a house. Leon will keep on striving to make his dream come true: to have his house built.

loans.use: to buy a piece of land.

loans.name: Abigail Yuvitza

texts.es: Abigail, tiene 20 años, vive en casa familiar con su esposo y su menor hijo de 2 años. Su hijito es su motivo de ser y trabaja en todo lo que puede para que no le falte nada. Actualmente trabaja en un restaurant por las mañanas y aparte tiene otro ingreso por las tardes de alquiler de mesa billar en su casa. Beneficiaria utilizará el crédito para comprar otra mesa de billar, el cual le generara mayor ingreso. Su sueño es tener un local propio donde pueda tener su restaurant y sus mesas de billar.
texts.en:
Abigail is 20. She lives in the family home with her husband and two-year-old son. Her little boy is her reason for being and she does everything she can so that he will never suffer want. She currently works in a restaurant in the mornings. She has another income in the afternoons, renting billiards tables in her home.
She will use this loan to purchase another billiards table, which will generate her a greater income. Her dream is to have her own space for a restaurant and billiards tables.

loans.use: to buy another billiards table.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.es:
Virginia tiene 31 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica y con mucho esfuerzo logro estudiar una repostería, lo cual le ha ayudado mucho para salir adelante, ya que ha iniciado su negocio de elaboración y venta de pasteles con lo cual puede tener ingresos para salir adelante cada día, Virginia cree que le va bien en su pequeño negocio puede tiene una buena sazón.

Virginia esta agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar un horno para poder elaborar mejor sus pasteles y de esta manera hacer crecer su negocio y seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener su propio local para su negocio”.
texts.en:
Virginia is 31 years old, she lives in the city of Ica and with a lot of effort, managed to study confectionary, which has helped her a lot to get ahead, as she has started a business making and selling cakes with which she can have the income to be able to get ahead every day. Virgina believes that she is doing well in her small business because it has good flavor.

Virginia is grateful to the Kiva lenders, as thanks to the help they offer, she will be able to buy an oven to be able to make her cakes better, and in this way grow her business and keep struggling to make her big dream come true: "To have her own shop for her business".

loans.use: to buy an oven.

loans.name: Lorenzo

texts.es:
Lorenzo es un hombre muy trabajador, desde hace 3 años trabaja como obrero en un fundo agrícola, con lo cual ha sacado adelante a su familia, sobre todo porque es padre de 3 hijos, de los cuales 2 de ellos ya son mayores, Lorenzo es de condición humilde, pero muy responsable y por ello cree que le va bien en su trabajo.

Lorenzo esta agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar electrodomésticos para su vivienda y de esta manera poder mejorar su calidad de vida y seguir esforzándose por hacer realidad su sueño:” Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Lorenzo is a very hard worker. He has been working as a construction laborer for a large farm for three years. This has allowed him to provide for his family, particularly because he has three children, two of them adults. Lorenzo's situation is humble, but he is very responsible, which he believes is the reason why things are going well for him at work. 

Lorenzo is grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the help they have given him he will be able to buy appliances for his home in order to improve his quality of life. He plans to continue to strive for his dream of owning a house to become a reality.

loans.use: to buy appliances.

loans.name: Paola Noelia

texts.es: Paola, tiene 35 años, es casada, vive en casa familiar. Desde muy joven se vio obligada a trabajar por las condiciones económicas precarias de sus padres. Actualmente trabaja en un restaurante pollería donde se desempeña como mesera, ella es una chicha muy carismática en su trabajo y muy amable con los clientes. Beneficiaria solicita el crédito para compra de una cocina, el cual quiere regalar a su madre, ya que la que tiene actualmente está muy deteriorada. Su sueño es tener su propia casa y su propio restaurante.
texts.en:
Paola, 35, is married and lives in her family´s home. She has been obligated to work since she was very young, due to her parents´ precarious economic situation. She currently works in a chicken restaurant as a waitress. She is a very charismatic girl at work, and she is very friendly with the customers. 

She is requesting the loan for the purchase of a stove, which she will give to her mother, since the one her mother currently has is very worn out. Her dream is to have her own home and restaurant.

loans.use: to buy a stove

loans.name: Yessica Maria

texts.es:
Yessica tiene 38 años de edad y es una mujer con muchas ganas de salir adelante, con mucho esfuerzo logro iniciar su negocio de compra y venta de huevos con lo cual puede tener ingresos para poder salir adelante.

Yessica esta agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su apoyo el podrá comprar mercadería para su negocio como huevos al pro mayor y también podrá comprar algunos electrodomésticos para su vivienda, de esta manera podrá atender mejor a sus clientes y mejorar su calidad de Vida, así seguirá luchando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener una gran empresa”.
texts.en:
Yessica is 38 years old and really wants to get ahead in life. With a lot of effort, she managed to start her own business of buying and selling eggs, through which she earns money so she can get ahead.

Yessica is grateful to Kiva lenders, since thanks to their support she will be able to purchase merchandise for her business, such as wholesale eggs, and some electrical appliances for her home. In this way, she will be able to better attend to her clients and improve her quality of life, thereby continuing to fight to realise her great dream of having a large business.

loans.use: to purchase electrical household appliances and wholesale eggs

loans.name: Teodomira

texts.es:
Teodomira es una mujer con muchas ganas de salir adelante, es por ello que con mucho esfuerzo logro iniciar su negocio de venta de comida típica, desde hace 2 años, con lo cual puede salir adelante y sobre todo porque es madre de 4  hijos a quienes ama mucho y son su razón de vivir.

Teodomira esta agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá realizar mejoras en su negocio sobre todo para poder dar una mejor atención a sus clientes, asi podrá mejorar sus ingresos y seguir luchando  para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener un negocio mas grande y seguir adelante”.
texts.en:
Teodomira is a woman with a great desire to prosper. Because of this, with a lot of effort she was able to start her business selling typical meals two years ago. She has been able to get ahead with this business, particularly as she is a mother to four children whom she loves dearly and who are her reason for living.

Teodomira is grateful to Kiva lenders as, thanks to their support, she will be able to improve her business, especially by offering her customers better service. Teodomira can then increase her income and continue to make her dream - of having a bigger business and of prospering - a reality.

loans.use: to improve her business.

loans.name: Carmen Lindaura

texts.es:
Carmen es un mujer muy trabajadora, con mucho esfuerzo logro iniciar su negocio de venta de verduras y tubérculos en el mercado de la ciudad donde vive, ella trabaja alrededor de 9 horas al día y con ello puede tener ingresos para poder salir adelante.

Carmen esta agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su apoyo ella podrá comprar mercadería para su negocio como verduras y tubérculos al por mayor  y de esta manera poder mejorar sus ventas y seguir esforzándose para poder mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Carmen is a very hard-working woman who, with a lot of effort, was able to start her own business selling vegetables and tubers at the market in the city where she lives. Carmen works some nine hours per day and, with this job, she is able to earn an income in order to get ahead.

Carmen is grateful to Kiva lenders as, thanks to their help, she will be able to buy merchandise - such as vegetables and tubers - for her business in bulk. She can then improve her sales and continue putting in the effort in order to improve her and her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as vegetables and tubers in bulk.

loans.name: Jonas Segundo

texts.es:
Jonas es un hombre muy trabajar, ha pasado por momento difíciles pero a pesar de ello ha sabido seguir adelante, sobre todo porque tiene una familia a la cual ama mucho y la cual es su motor para seguir luchando, Jonas con mucho esfuerzo logro tener su negocio de transporte fluvial y de carga, con lo cual puede tener ingresos para seguir adelante.

Jonas está agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su apoyo el podrá realizar un mantenimiento a sus transportes de carga y de esta manera poder tener vehículos en mejor estado, lo que le permitirá trabajar de manera más segura y poder mejorar sus ingresos y luchar por hacer realidad de gran sueño:” Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Jonas is a very hard-working man. Despite having had a difficult time, he has managed to get ahead due to his family, whom he loves very much and who is his drive for continuing to fight to get ahead. With a lot of effort, Jonas managed to start his own river transportation and freight transportation business, from which he earns money so he can get ahead in life.

Jonas is grateful to Kiva lenders, since thanks to their support he will be able to maintain his freight ships so they are in better condition, which will allow him to work more safely, increase his earnings, and fight to realise his great dream of having his own house.

loans.use: to maintain his vehicle

loans.name: Gavino

texts.es:
Gavino es un hombre muy trabajador, cada día desde muy temprano acude a su trabajo, ya que el labora en el cama de la ciudad vendiendo menudencias por pedido y con este pequeño negocio pude tener ingresos para poder salir adelante.

Gavino está agradecido con los prestamistas kiva y que gracias a su apoyo el podrá comprar mercadería, especialmente menudencias  al por mayor y de esta manera poder mejorar sus ventas y atender los pedidos de sus clientes, lo que le permitirá seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Mejorar su calidad de Vida”.
texts.en:
Gavino is a very hardworking man. Every day he goes to work very early because he works in the city slaughterhouse selling giblets to order. With this little business he is able to have income to get ahead. 

Gavino is grateful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to their support he will be able to buy merchandise, especially giblets, wholesale. This way, he can improve his sales and fill his customers' orders, which will allow him to keep fighting to make his big dream com true: improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy giblets wholesale

loans.name: Leonarda

texts.es:
Leonarda vive en el distrito de San Juan de Lurigancho, es madre de un pequeño de 7 años, al cual quiere mucho y es su motor de vida y de superación, Leonarda trabaja todos los días en su pequeño negocio de venta de choclos desde hace 2 años, ella trabaja alrededor de 7 horas al d´pia y cree que le va bien porque ofrece productos de calidad.

Leonarda esta agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su ayuda ella podrá comprar un terreno, lo que le permitirá poder construir su vivienda propia y poder darle una mejor calidad de vida a su hijo, ya que actualmente vive en la casa de un familiar.
texts.en:
Leonarda lives in the district of San Juan de Lurigancho, and the mother of a young 7-year-old boy, who she loves very much and is the love of her life and her inspiration. Leonarda has worked every day in her small business selling corn for the last two years; she works around 7 hours daily on her feet and believes that it is going well because she offers quality products.

Leonarda is grateful for the Kiva Loan Officers since thanks to their help she will be able to buy land, which will allow her to build her own store and give a better quality of life to her son, who currently lives with a family member.

loans.use: to buy land.

loans.name: Cesar Armando

texts.es:
Cesar tiene 67 años, vive en al ciudad de Chiclayo y vive al lado de su esposa, quien lo acompaña y apoya en todo lo que él hace. Cesar es jubilado, pero a pesar de su edad, tiene el carisma de un joven de 23 años.

Cesar está agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su apoyo el podrá solventar los gastos de su tratamiento médico, con lo cual le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida y seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener un negocio propio”.
texts.en: Cesar, 67, lives in the city of Chiclayo alongside his wife, who accompanies and supports him in all that he does. Cesar is retired, but in spite of his age, he has the charisma of a 23-year-old. Cesar is grateful to Kiva lenders, because thanks to their help, he will be able to pay for his medical treatment, which will allow him to improve his quality of life and continue working to make his biggest dream a reality: "to have his own business".

loans.use: to pay for his medical treatment

loans.name: Mariana Stefania

texts.es:
Mariana es una joven de 21 años, es soltera, vive en la ciudad de Nazca con sus padres y hermanos, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación, gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo de sus padres, Mariana se encuentra estudiando la carrera profesional de Enfermería y adicionalmente Diseño Gráfico, Con mucho empeño y entusiasmo, Mariana trabaja en una Óptica, brindando servicios de atención al público y fotocopiado, todos los días desde tempranas horas inicia su labor, ella puede trabajar un aproximado de 8 horas diarias y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás. 

Mariana se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que es la segunda vez que le dan su apoyo, y de esta manera podrá solventar algunos gastos personales y poder seguir esforzándose para lograr su sueño de tener su propio negocio de diseño.
texts.en:
Mariana is 21 years old, single and lives in the city of Nazca with her parents and siblings. She is a very friendly, hardworking, and enthusiastic person who had a great desire to succeed.

Thanks to her efforts and the support of her parents, Mariana is studying Nursing and also Graphic Design. With a lot of effort and enthusiasm, Mariana works in an optics office, offering services to the public and photocopying. She starts work early every morning and can work for approximately 8 hours and thinks that she is doing well because of her good performance and the friendly service she offers others.

Mariana is very grateful with the Kiva loaners, as this is the second time they offer their support, and she will be able to take care of some personal expenses and be able to continue striving towards achieving her dream of having her own design business.

loans.use: to pay personal expenses

loans.name: Leky

texts.es:
Leky vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa, trabaja como empleada de lavandería en un hotel de su ciudad y también para poder tener un ingreso extra tiene un pequeño negocio de venta de ropa y artículos para vestir, de esta manea puede tener ingresos para poder salir adelante, sobre todo porque tiene un hijo de 14 años.

Leky esta agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar mercadería como ropa y de esta manera mejorar su pequeño negocio y hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Darle una profesión a su hijo”.
texts.en:
Leky lives in Pucallpa. She works as an employee at a hotel laundry in her town. In order to earn some extra funds she also has a small business selling clothing and garments. By this, she has an income to get ahead, which is important because she as a 14-year-old son.

Leky is grateful to the Kiva lenders. Thanks to help they have given, she will be able to buy merchandise like clothing and by this to improve her small business and to realize her great dream: “That her son learns a profession.”

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Jose Celestino

texts.es:
Jose vive en la ciudad e Pucallpa, trabaja como vigilante de un colegio de su ciudad desde hace 7 años y con este humilde trabajo puede tener ingresos para poder salir adelante y poder solventar sus gastos de manutención.

Jose está agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar mercadería para poder iniciar un pequeño negocio con lo cual podrá tener un ingreso extra y poder mejorar su calidad de vida y seguir luchando para hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Poder tener una mejor vivienda”.
texts.en:
Jose lives in the city of Pucallpa. He has worked as a caretaker in his city for 7 years. With this humble job, he can have income to be able to get ahead and be able to cover his living expenses.

Jose is grateful for the Kiva lenders, since thanks to their help he has been able to buy merchandise to start a small business. With the business, he will be able to have extra income to improve his quality of life and continue fighting to make his greatest dream a reality: to have a better home.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Simeon Nestor

texts.es:
Simeon es un hombre muy trabajador, a sus 64 años de edad, mantiene la vitalidad y la alegría de un joven de 20, Simeon vive en la ciudad de Nazca, Simeon comparte su vida junto a su esposa, quien lo anima en todo lo que él hace y sobre todo es su amiga y su mejor compañera. Cada día Simeon trabaja como en una ladrillera y también realiza labores como agricultor, él le dedica a su trabajo alrededor de 8 horas al día ya que con ello solventa los gastos de su hogar, cree que está saliendo adelante porque es responsable y sobre todo le gusta lo que hace.

Simeon agradece a los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias al apoyo que le esta n brindando por segunda vez, gracias a ello podrá mejorar las paredes de su vivienda, ya que actualmente se encuentran rajadas y de esta  manera podrá tener una mejor calidad de vida para su familia, de esta manera el podrá seguir luchando para podrá hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Reunir a sus hijos que se encuentra lejos de la ciudad”.
texts.en:
Simeon is a very hardworking man.  He's 64 years old but has the vitality and happiness of a 20-year-old man.  Simeon lives in the city of Nazca and shares his life with his wife, who encourages him in everything he does and is his friend and best companion.

Simeon works as a bricklayer and also does farm work.  He works about eight hours a day to pay the household expenses.  He thinks he's getting ahead because he's responsible and likes what he does.

Simeon's grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the support he's getting for the second time, he'll be able to fix the cracks in the walls of his home.  That way his family will have a better quality of life and he'll be able to continue striving to realize his big dream of bringing together his children, who are far away from the city.

loans.use: to make improvements on his home

loans.name: Denisse Laura

texts.es:
Denisse es una joven de 21 años con muchas ganas de salir adelante, es por ello que cada día con mucho esfuerzo trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de Chocho con ceviche, desde hace 2 años, lo cual le ha permitido poder solventar los gastos de sus estudios, ya que actualmente estudia la carrera de contabilidad en la universidad de su ciudad, lo cual a ella le llena de orgullo ya que a pesar de las adversidades sigue adelante.

Denisse esta agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá realizar los pagos de la mensualidad de su universidad y de esta manera poder continuar sus estudios y seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Terminar su carrera profesional”.
texts.en:
Denisse is a young 21-year-old with a great desire to get ahead. For this reason she works hard every day at her small business selling "chocho" (bean-like seeds) ceviche, a business she's had for two years. This has allowed her to cover her school expenses. Currently she is studying accounting at her city's university. This fills her with pride because despite challenges, she continues forward. 

Denisse is thankful for the Kiva lenders because thanks to the help that has been brought to her, she will be able to cover her monthly payments at university. In this way she will be able to continue her studies and working to make her greatest dream a reality: finishing her professional career.

loans.use: to pay monthly university fees.

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es:
Miguel es un joven con muchas ganas de salir adelante, cada día el se levanta muy temprano para poder acudir a su empleo en una pequeña empresa como asistente, con lo cual puede tener ingresos para poder solventar sus gastos de estudio, ya que actualmente se encuentra en el noveno ciclo de la carrera de administración, lo cual le llena de orgullo ya que el cree que le va bien porque se esfuerza mucho.

Miguel está agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su ayuda el podrá solventar sus gastos de estudio como materiales, mensualidad, matricula, entre otros y de esta manera podrá seguir estudiando y luchando para hacer realidad su gran sueño:”Terminar su carrera y ser un gran profesional”.
texts.en:
Miguel is a young man who is motivated to move forward. Every day, he wakes up very early to go to work at a small business as an assistant. This provides him with income to pay school expenses, as he is currently in the ninth cycle of his management degree. He is proud because he thinks it's going well because he is working so hard.

Miguel is grateful for Kiva lenders because their help will allow him to pay expenses for school, including materials, registration, tuition, among other things. This will allow him to keep studying and working to realize his greatest dream, which is to finish his degree and be a successful professional.

loans.use: to pay university expenses.

loans.name: Daniel

texts.es:
Daniel vive en el distrito de san juan de Lurigancho, es un joven con muchas ganas de salir adelante, es por ello que con mucho esfuerzo logro iniciar su negocio de venta de accesorios para celulares y computadoras, en el mercado de su distrito; gracias a ello puede tener ingresos para poder salir adelante.

Daniel está agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar más accesorios para su negocio y de esta manera poder  atender mejor los pedidos de sus cliente y mejorar sus ventas; de esta manera podrá seguir luchando y haciendo realidad su gran sueño:” Tener otro local y crecer en su negocio”.
texts.en:
Daniel lives in the San Juan de Lurigancho district. He is a young man eager to get ahead, which is why with much effort he started his business selling cell phone and computer accessories in the market in his district. Thanks to this, he has the income to get ahead. 

Daniel is grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the help they have given him, he has been able to buy more accessories for his business, and thus better serve his customer's requests and improve his sales. He will keep striving to make his greatest dream a reality: to have another location and grow his business.

loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Ananias

texts.es:
Ananias vive en la ciudad de Tuman, para poder salir adelante trabaja como maestro panadero en una pastelería de su ciudad desde hace 10 años, con lo cual puede tener ingresos para poder salir adelante y sobre todo por el bienestar de su familia ya que es casado y tiene un hijo de 3 años al cual quiere muchísimo.

Ananias está agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su apoyo el podrá solventar los gastos para poder realizar las instalaciones y conexiones de desagüe y alcantarillado domiciliario, de esta manera podrá mejorar su calidad de vida y la salud de su familia, lo cual le ayudara a seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:”Tener su propia panadería”.
texts.en:
Ananias lives in the city of Tuman. In order to get ahead, he has been working for 10 years as a master baker at a pastry shop in his city. This enables him to earn income so that he can move forward and provide everything for his family’s welfare. He is married and has a three-year-old son who he loves dearly.

Ananias is grateful to the Kiva lenders. Thanks to their support, he will be able to pay the cost of installing a sewage and drainage system in his home. This will improve his family’s health and their quality of life. Ananias continues to strive toward fulfilling his greatest wish of opening his own bakery.

loans.use: to install a sewage and drainage system in his home.

loans.name: Domingo Soriano

texts.es:
Domingo vive en el distrito de Santiago, desde hace 15 años trabaja como agricultor y gracias a ello puede tener ingresos para poder salir adelante y apoyar a su familia con los gastos del hogar, a Domingo le gusta lo que hace y por ello cree que le va bien, ya que cuida mucho su cultivo para poder tener buenas cosechas.

Domingo está agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su apoyo podrá comprar abono, y fertilizantes para su cultivo, asimismo podrá apoyar a su sobrina con los gastos de sus estudios, asi podrá obtener una mejor cosecha y podrá apoyar a su familia a salir adelante y seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia”.
texts.en:
Domingo lives in the district of Santiago. For 15 years, he has worked as a farmer and thanks to this, he has income to move forward and help his family with household expenses. Domingo likes what he does and thinks it's going well because he takes care of his crop so he'll have a good harvest.

Domingo is grateful for Kiva lenders because their help allows him to buy manure and fertilizer for his crop. He is also able to support his niece with her school expenses. This will allow him to have a better harvest and and support his family to move forward and keep fighting to realize his greatest dream, which is to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizer and support his family's education.

loans.name: Santos Leonardo

texts.es:
Santos vive en la ciudad de Ica y cada día trabaja con mucho empeño en su trabajo como mototaxi, el trabaja alrededor de 9 horas al día ya que con este empleo puede tener ingresos para salir adelante.

Santos está agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá realizar un mantenimiento a la mototaxi, así como también cambio de llantas y colocación de puertas, de esta manera tendrá un vehículo en mejores condiciones y podrá seguir luchando cada día para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener un auto”.
texts.en:
Santos lives in the city of Ica and every day he is very determined at his work as a rickshaw driver. Santos works around nine hours every day as, with this job, he has the income to be able to get ahead.

Santos is grateful to Kiva lenders as, thanks to the support provided, he will be able to maintain his rickshaw and replace the tyres and doors. His vehicle will then be in better condition and he can continue to fight to make his dream - of owning a car - a reality.

loans.use: to maintain his rickshaw and replace the tyres and door.

loans.name: Carlos Irving

texts.es:
Carlos es un joven que vive en el distrito de manantay, Pucallpa; es un joven trabajador, el cual cada día se esfuerza mucho como chofer de transporte terrestre desde hace 1 año, el puede atender hasta 17 clientes al día y cree que le va bien porque es muy amable con los clientes, ya que de su trabajo depende el que pueda tener ingresos para salir adelante.

Carlos está muy agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la  ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar llantas para el vehículo en el cual trabaja y de esta manera poder manejar con más seguridad y poder seguir luchando y trabajando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener una flota de autos”.
texts.en:
Carlos is a young man who lives in the Manantay district in Pucallpa.  He is a hard-working young man who puts forth a lot of effort every day as an inland transportation drive.  He has been doing this for one year.  He can tend to up to 17 customers a day.  He believes that it is going well for him because he is very friendly with the customers.  This is because his being able to have income in order to get ahead is dependent upon his work.

Carlos is very grateful to the Kiva lenders.  Thanks to the help they have provided for him, he will be able to buy tires for the vehicle he works with.  This way he will be able to drive more safely.  He will be able to continue struggling and working to be able to make his big dream a reality.  His dream is to have a fleet of automobiles.

loans.use: to buy tires.

loans.name: Patricia Del Socorro

texts.es: Doña Patricia es originaria de la ciudad de León. Es de oficio comerciante, se dedica al negocio de pulpería. Se siente agradecida con KIVA y MiCrédito ya que con el crédito anterior logró satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes. Solicita el nuevo crédito para comprar: Galletas, Papel higiénico, Comidas instantáneas, Productos para lavar y entre otros. Estima que el crédito le será de mucha ayuda ya que podrá obtener mejores ingresos y lograra sacar adelante a su familia.
texts.en:
Doña Patricia is originally from the city of León. She a merchant by trade and manages a grocery business.

Patricia is grateful to Kiva and MiCrédito for her previous loan, which helped her to satisfy the demand from her customers. She is requesting a new loan so that she can buy cookies, toilet paper, instant meals, cleaning products, and other items. Patricia expects this loan to be a great help since she will be able to generate more income and help her family get ahead.

loans.use: to buy cookies, toilet paper, instant meals, cleaning products, and other items.

loans.name: Husna

texts.en:
Husna is a married woman who has been blessed with two schoolgoing children. She lives at her own house that has electricity and not piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

Husna has operated a charcoal-selling business, selling from home to her neighbors and villagers. Her greatest monthly challenge is high cost of transportation.

She is requesting for a loan of KES 20,000 to purchase charcoal for resale. She joined Yehu to get financial support.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal for resale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more food ingredients such as rice, oil, pepper, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy supplies at wholesale (flour, yeast, margarine and eggs) and make adjustments in the workspace.

loans.name: Miguel Ángel

texts.es:
Miguel es un joven  trabajador de 21 años de edad, vive con su abuelo de avanzada edad y su madre, su nivel de estudio es noveno grado de educación básica;  pero esto no es un obstáculo para que el joven pueda salir adelante, a pesar de las muchas dificultades que se le han presentado. 

Él se dedica al comercio desde los 12 años, anteriormente le ayudaba a sus padres, que salían a vender en las rutas de buses, hasta que  decidió ahorrar e invertir en productos para su propia venta, Miguel sale todos los días a pie hasta los cantones cercanos, cargando su productos en la espalda, este trabajo no es nada fácil pero la necesidad en la que vive obliga a que el salga a otros lugares a ofrecer su producto que generalmente es pan y vitaminas. El dinero que logra obtener de las ventas lo invierte en la misma.

Anteriormente la forma en que comercializaba era un poco riesgosa ya tenía que subirse de un bus a otro, para vender el producto de sus padres, pero luego que decidió poner su propia venta, aunque  viajar a otros cantones es bastante cansado, pero le genera un poco más de ganancia. Su experiencia en el negocio le ha ayudado mucho para saber que es lo que la gente necesita.  


El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de bebidas, arroz, frijoles, golosinas, etc para su tienda  y le servirá para poner un negocio estable, debido a que viajar a los cantones es un poco peligroso y a la vez cansado, por lo que el crédito le beneficiara mucho para que pueda alquilar un local y aumentar el producto en su tienda.


Miguel por el momento lo que necesita es tener su tienda con suficiente producto y en un futuro sueña con poder tener tres tiendas más en diferentes lugares, de donde pueda obtener ingresos necesarios para ayudar a su madre y abuelo que lo necesitan mucho.
texts.en:
Miguel is a 21-year-old worker. He lives with his grandfather and his mother. His level of education is basic grade 9 but this isn’t an obstacle for him because he is young and can come out ahead despite many difficulties that he has faced. 

He has been working in business since he was 12 years old. Previously he helped his parents who went out and sold products on bus routes until he decided to save and invest in products for his own sale. Miguel goes each day on foot to the cantons nearby, carrying his products on his back. This work is not at all easy but the need is what drives him to go to other places and offer his products which are usually bread and vitamins. The money he obtains from the sales he reinvests in the same products.

Previously, the way in which he sold his products were a bit rigorous as he had to go from one bus to another to sell his parent’s products but later he decided to have his own business. Although travelling to other cantons is very exhausting, he generates a bit more income. His experience in business has helped him to understand greatly what people need.  

He will invest the loan to purchase drinks, rice, beans, soft drinks etc... for his store and it will serve him to have a fixed location because travelling to the cantons is a bit dangerous as well as tiring. The loan will serve to rent a place and increase products in his store.

loans.use: to purchase drinks, rice, beans, soft drinks etc... for his store.

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es:
Don Mercedes tiene 52 años de edad, es casado, tiene 3 hijos y vive en el municipio de la Másica, Atlantida.
Don Mercedes hace varios años que estableció un negocio de un taller de ebanisteria donde elabora muebles de cocina, puertas, ventanas, chineros, contramarcos, mesas, sillas etc. El dedica tiempo completo, comenta que tiene bastante demanda en los muebles. Con los financiamientos que ha recibido a logrado mantener su negocio activo. actualmente solicito otro préstamo por 22,000 Lempiras para construir un baño en su casa, ponerle ventanas y comprar cables para energía eléctrica. Con esta inversión termina su casa y podra vivir mejor. Su meta es hacer crecer su negocio y poderle dar calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Mercedes is 52 years old, married, has three children and lives in the municipality of Másika, Atlantida. Mercedes set up a cabinetmaking workshop several years ago, where he makes kitchen furniture, doors, windows, china cabinets, window casings, tables, chairs etc. He works at this full-time and says that he has quite a bit of demand for his furniture. 

With the loans that he has received, he has managed to keep his business going and now is requesting another loan for 22,000 lempiras in order to build a bathroom in his home, install windows and buy electrical wiring. With this investment he will finish his home and be able to live better. His goal is to see his business grow and be able to provide quality of life to his family.

loans.use: To buy the materials for building a bathroom in his home, including windows and electrical wiring.

loans.name: Emilia

texts.es: Doña Emilia, tiene 54 años  de edad, es casada, tiene 4 hijos, vive en una aldea de Colinas Santa Bárbara. Tiene su propio negocio desde hace 17 años, ella vende productos de la canasta básica familiar como una pequeña pulpería, este mismo lo tiene hace 17 años lo tiene ubicado en su casa antes se dedicaba a ser ama de casa. Este préstamo es por 15,000 Lempiras y lo invertirá, en la compra de granos básicos, harina, azúcar, pastas, papel higiénico, sal, refrescos, churros etc. Este mismo le ayudara a surtir su negocio. La meta es ver crecer su negocio y seguir sosteniendo su familia.
texts.en:
Emilia is 54 years old married and has four children. She lives in the village of Colinas, Santa Bárbara. She has had her own business for 17 years, a small general store located in her home, where she sells basic household necessities. Before, she devoted herself to being a housewife.

This loan is for 15,000 lempiras and she will use it to buy basic staples, flour, sugar, pasta, toilet paper, salt, soft drinks, snacks, etc., helping her to stock her store.

Her goal is to see her business grow and to continue supporting her family.

loans.use: To buy basic staples, flour, sugar, pasta, toilet paper, salt, soft drinks, snacks, etc. for stocking her store.

loans.name: Maria Cristina

texts.es:
María, tiene 50 años de edad, esta casada, tiene 3 hijos, vive en una aldea que pertenece al municipio de Esparta, Atlántida con su familia.
Doña María, tiene su propia fuente de ingresos, hace 6 años que estableció una pulpería donde vende productos de la canasta básica familiar como es frijoles, arroz, café, pan, manteca, harina, azúcar, pastas, condimentos, aceite, manteca, sal, verduras y otros abarrotes. Ha invertido varios prestamos a su negocio para mantenerlo surtido. El préstamo actual es por 10,000 lempiras con el cual va surtir el negocio de productos básicos alimenticios como azúcar, granos básicos, manteca, café, pastas, harina, churros y otros. Su meta es seguir creciendo con el negocio para obtener mejores ganancias para el bienestar personal y familiar.
texts.en: Maria is 50 years old. She is married and has 3 children. She lives in a town that belongs to the municipality of Esparta, Atlántida, with her family. María has her own source of income. Six years ago, she opened a convenience store where she sells staple products such as beans, rice, coffee, bread, lard, flour, sugar, pasta, condiments, oil, salt, vegetables, and other groceries. She has invested several loans in her business to keep it stocked. The present loan is for 10,000 lempiras, with which she will stock the business with basic food products such as sugar, basic grains, lard, coffee, pasta, flour, churros and more. Her goal is to keep growing with the business to obtain better profits for her personal and family's well being.

loans.use: to stock the business with basic food products such as sugar, basic grains, lard, coffee, pasta, flour, churros and more.

loans.name: Dilcia Diamantina

texts.es: Dilcia, tiene 37 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposo, tiene 3 hijos y vive en una aldea de la Másica Atlántida. Ella Se dedica a la venta de ropa americana como jeans, blusas, camisas y otros y también tiene un salón de belleza, donde hace peinados para toda ocasión, tratamientos para cabello y venta de productos de belleza. Este negocio lo tiene hace 5 años en su casa y ya cuenta con buena clientela. Ha solicitado el séptimo ciclo en la instituciones y es por 20,000 lempiras para la compra de ropa y productos para su salón de belleza como ser champú, cremas, tintes, tratamientos etc. el cual le ayudara a tener mayores ingresos. Como meta tiene seguir creciendo y darle una mejor forma de vida a su familia y sacar adelante a sus hijos.
texts.en: Dilcia is 37 years old. She is in a common law marriage with her husband. She has 3 children and lives in the town in Másica Atlántida. She sells American clothing such as jeans, blouses, shirts and more. She also has a beauty salon where she does hair styling for all occasions. She sells hair treatments and beauty products. She has had this business for 5 years in her house and she has a good clientele. She has asked for her seventh loan in the institution and it is for 20,000 lempiras. It is to buy clothing and products for her beauty salon, such as shampoo, creams, dyes, treatments, etc. This will help her to have more income. She has the goal to keep growing and giving her family a better life and getting her children ahead.

loans.use: to buy clothing and products for her beauty salon, such as shampoo, creams, dyes, treatments, etc.

loans.name: Nelson Javier

texts.es: Nelson, tiene 24 años de edad, esta soltero, vive en el municipio del Progreso,Yoro junto a su madre. Desde muy joven adquirió experiencia en la elaboración de pan. Hace 4 años que tiene su negocio de una panadería, donde elabora variedad de pan dulce y de repostería. Este negocio lo tiene ubicado en su casa. El préstamo que solicita es por 10,000 Lempiras y lo invertirá en la compra de la materia prima como harina, manteca, huevos, levadura etc. para elaborar pan.  El piensa que la inversión le ayudara a reducir sus gastos y ganar mas porque comprara de contado. Tiene como meta expandir su negocio y comprar una maquina cortadora de pan molde.
texts.en: Nelson is 24 years old. He is single and lives in the town of Progreso, Yoro, with his mother. Since he was very young, he acquired experience making bread. He has had a bread baking business for four years where he makes a variety of sweet bread and pastries. He has the business in his house. The loan he is asking for is for 10,000 Lempiras and he will invest it in buying raw materials such as flour, lard, eggs, yeast, etc. to make bread. He thinks that the investment will help him to reduce his expenses and earn more because he will pay for his purchases up front. His goal is to expand his business and buy a bread slicing machine.

loans.use: to buy raw materials such as flour, lard, eggs, yeast, etc. to make and sell bread.

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es:
Julio, tiene 36 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposa, tiene 2 hijos y vive en la comunidad de la Másica Atlántida. Tiene como negocio un taller de ebanistería, donde fabrica puertas, juegos de muebles de comedor, de cocina, ventanas, mesas, sillas etc. Este negocio lo tiene hace 3 años funcionando en su casa. Este préstamo que solicita es por 3,500 lempiras y es el tercer ciclo, el cual lo invertirá en la compra de madera para la elaboración de muebles. El propósito de invertir es para aumentar las ventas y sus ingresos.
Tiene como meta mejorar su situación económica y mejorar su nivel de vida.
texts.en:
Julio is 36 years old. He is in a common law marriage with his wife. They have 2 children and live in the community of Másica Atlántida. He has a woodworking workshop where he makes doors, dining room furniture sets, kitchen sets, windows, tables, chairs, etc. He has had this business for 3 years in his house. This loan he has asked for is for 3,500 lempiras and this is his third cycle. He will invest it in buying wood to make furniture. The purpose of investing is increase sales and his income. 

His goal is to improve his financial situation and improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy wood to make furniture.

loans.name: Hilda Marina

texts.es: Hilda, tiene 30 años de edad,vive en  unión libre con su esposo con quien tiene 3 hijos y  vive en el municipio de la Másica,Atlantida. Ella tiene su propio  negocio de una pulpería y venta de comida como pastelitos baleadas, tajadas  etc. este negocio lo tiene ubicado en su casa desde hace 2 años,en la pulperia vende frijoles, pan, condimentos, churros, queso, embutidos y carnes. El préstamo que solicita es por 4,500 lempiras para comprar abarrotería Como granos basicos,churros,condimentos,carnes y otros para surtir la pulpería y poder ofrecer mejor variedad de productos. Tiene como meta ampliar su negocio para  darles una mejor educación a su hijos.
texts.en:
Hilda, 30, lives in the town of La Masica, Altántida, in a common-law marriage with her husband, with whom she has three children.

Hilda has had her own business in her house for two years, a grocery store where sells beans, bread, condiments, chips, cheese, cold cuts, and meat.  She also sells fried empanadas, "baleadas" [folded flour tortillas with fillings], fried plantains, and other food.

The loan Hilda's requesting is for 4,500 lempiras [HNL] to buy basic grains, chips, condiments, meat, and other groceries to stock her store and offer a greater variety of products.

Her goal is to expand her business so she can give her children a better education.

loans.use: to buy groceries for her store

loans.name: Ana Julia

texts.es: Ana Julia, tiene 50 años de edad, casada, tiene 4 hijos, vive en una aldea del municipio de Puerto Cortes junto a dos hijos. Ella siempre se ha dedicado al comercio, ella vendía todo tipo de mercadería. Hace mas de 6 años decidió establecer un negocio de venta de comidas ya que es rentable. El local esta ubicado Anexado a su casa donde vende refrescos, golosinas, comidas como pollo frito con tajadas, baleadas, fritas, tacos, y otros. Ella ha solicitado varios préstamos lo que ha permitido que su negocio se mantenga en crecimiento. Actualmente solicita el noveno ciclo y es por 30,000 lempiras con el cual va comprar insumos para la elaboración de comidas como ser harinas, carnes, frijoles, refrescos, lácteos, manteca, condimentos etc. Su meta es seguir trabajando con el negocio para satisfacer a sus clientes y tener un crecimiento con su familia.
texts.en:
Ana Julia is 50 years old, married, has four children, and lives in a suburb of the town of Puerto Cortes with her children.  She has always been a merchant and sold all types of merchandise.  She decided to set up her food business more than six years ago because its more profitable.

Her shop is located as an annex to her home and she sells soft drinks, snacks, food such as fried chicken, baleadas, tacos, and other things.  She has asked for various loans which have allowed her business to keep growing.  Currently she is asking for 30,000 Lempiras so she can buy ingredients, such as flour, meat, beans, soft drinks, dairy, lard, condiments, etc. to make her dishes.  Her goal is to continue working with her business to satisfy her customers and grow with her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es: Margarita, tiene 32 años de edad, esta casada tiene dos hijos con quienes vive en el municipio de Choloma, Cortes. Ella realiza su propia actividad de negocio, lleva 10 años de dedicarse a la venta de ropa, celulares, sombrillas y cosméticos. Esta venta la realiza de manera ambulante.  El préstamo que solicita es por 5,000 lempiras y lo invertirá en el negocio va surtir de ropa, sombrillas, celulares y cosméticos como cremas, lociones y otros, para obtener mejores ganancias. Tiene en plan seguir creciendo con  su negocio y así ayudar a su familia.
texts.en: Margarita is 32 years old and is married with two children. She lives in the town of Choloma, Cortes. She has performed her own business activity for ten years. She sells clothing, cell phones, umbrellas, and cosmetics as an ambulant vendor. She requests a loan for 5,000 Lempiras that she will invest in the business, supplying clothing, umbrellas, cell phones, and cosmetics such as creams, lotions, and other products, to get better profits. She has a plan to grow with her business and help her family.

loans.use: to purchase clothing, umbrellas, cell phones, and cosmetics to sell.

loans.name: Mirna Alicex

texts.es: Mirna, tiene 23 años de edad, esta soltera, vive junto a una Tía en el municipio de Roatan. Su negocio es la elaboracion y venta de tortillas de maiz y lo tiene desde hace 8 años instalado en un anexo a su casa,anteriormente trabajaba en un restaurante luego decidio por su propio negocio. Solicita 7,000 Lempiras para comprar harina de maiz para la elaboracion  de tortilla, y poder incrementar las ventas. Su meta es seguir creciendo Con su negocio para darle mejor vida a su familia.
texts.en: Mirna is 23 years old. She is single and lives with an aunt in the town of Roatan. Her business is making and selling corn tortillas She has had it set up for 8 years in an annex to her house. Previously, she worked in a restaurant and then she decided to open her own business. She is asking for 7,000 Lempiras to buy corn meal to makes the tortillas and be abel to increase sales. Her goals is to keep growing with her business to give her family a better life.

loans.use: to buy corn meal to make and sell tortillas.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a display case and cell phone accessories.

loans.name: Idalia Marizza

texts.es: Doña Idalia, esta casada, tiene 57 años de edad, vive con su esposo y sus 3 nietos en el municipio de Choloma, Cortes. Hace 7 años que se dedica a la venta de mercadería en general como ropa usada americana, lociones, calzado y otra achinería. Las ventas las realiza en forma ambulante. Ha solicitado 8,000 Lempiras para comprar ropa en general como pantalones, camisas, blusas, ropa de niño etc. para cumplir con los pedidos que tiene. Su propósito de seguir trabajando es poder ver en crecimiento su negocio.
texts.en: Idalia, 57, is married and lives with her husband and three grandchildren in the town of Choloma, Cortes.  For seven years she has been selling merchandise in general such as used American clothing, lotions, shoes and trinkets, working as a street vendor.  Idalia is requesting a loan in the amount of 8,000 HNL to buy clothing in general such as pants, shirts, blouses, children's clothing, etc. to fill the orders she has.  Her goal is to continue working and growing her business.

loans.use: To buy American clothing such as blouses, shirts, pants, children's clothing, etc. to meet customer demand.

loans.name: Betty Elizabeth

texts.es: Betty, tiene 39 años de edad, es casada, tiene 4 hijos y vive en el municipio de Choloma, Cortés. Ella Se dedica a la venta de mercadería como ropa nueva, usada, lociones, cremas y otros encargos. las ventas son realizadas de manera ambulante. Esta actividad es realizada desde hace 20 años de donde a podido mantener a su familia. El préstamo que solicita es por 7,500 lempiras y lo invertirá en la compra de mercadería y cubrir encargos como ser ropa, cremas, lociones y otros. Este préstamo le ayudara en un futuro lograr poner su propia tienda en una zona comercial. Como meta tiene darles una mejor educación a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Betty, age 39, is married and has four children.  She lives in the Choloma municipality in Cortés.  She sells merchandise like new and used clothes, lotions, creams, and other ordered items.  She makes her sales in an itinerant manner.  She has been engaged in this business activity for 20 years, and through it she has been able to support her family.

She is requesting a loan for 7,500 lempiras to buy merchandise and cover orders for things like clothes, creams, lotions, and others.  This loan will help her in the future to manage to set up her own store in a commercial area.  Her goal is to give her children a better education.

loans.use: to buy merchandise and cover orders for things like clothes, creams, lotions, and others.

loans.name: Sara Nohemy

texts.es: Sara, tiene 18 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposo tiene una  hija  y vive en el municipio de Roatán. Se dedica a la elaboración y venta de tortillas. Este negocio lo tiene en su casa. Desde muy pequeña aprendió con su madre y ahora lo administra ella. El préstamo es por 7,000 lempiras y lo invertirá en la compra de harina de maíz para elaborar tortillas. Como meta tiene seguir creciendo y mejorando, para generar empleo.
texts.en:
Sara, age 18, lives in a common-law marriage with her husband, and she has a daughter.  She lives in the Roatán municipality.  She makes and sells tortillas.  She has this business at her house.  When she was very little she learned with her mother, and she now runs the business.

The loan is for 7,000 lempiras, and she will use it to buy corn flour to make tortillas.  Her goal is to continue growing and improving in order to generate employment.

loans.use: to buy corn flour to make and sell tortillas.

loans.name: Maria Catalina

texts.es: María Catalina, tiene 47 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene tres hijos, vive con dos de ellos en una aldea que pertenece al municipio de Intibucá. María lleva diez años de dedicarse a la elaboración y venta de tamales de pollo y de cerdo, elaboración y venta de pan, venta de cuajada de leche y ropa. Además vende comida cuando le solicitan. El negocio lo tiene establecido en un local del mercado local donde ya tiene sus clientes fijos. Ella vende todos los días. Actualmente esta solicitando el tercer préstamo a ODEF, por 14,000 Lempiras, para comprar los insumos necesarios para la elaboración de tamales, pan y compra de ropa para vender. Esta inversión le permitirá tener siempre materiales para elaborar su producto y siempre vender. Su meta es obtener mayor venta para poderle costear los estudios a sus hijos y arreglar su casa.
texts.en:
María Catalina, who is 47 years old, is a single mother. She has three children. She lives with two of her children in a village that belongs to the town of Intibucá. María has been working making and selling chicken and pork tamales for ten years. She also bakes and sells bread and milk curd, as well as clothing. She also sells food when customers request it. Her business is located in a stall in the local market where she has regular customers. She makes sales every day.

She is currently requesting a third loan from ODEF for 14,000 lempiras. She will use it to buy the ingredients she needs to make tamales and bread, and to purchase clothing to sell. This investment will allow her to always have enough supplies to make her product so that it is readily available. Her goal is for her sales to increase so that she can pay for her children's education and fix up her house.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for tamales and bread, and also clothing to sell.

loans.name: Mynor Fabricio

texts.es: Mynor, tiene 30 años de edad, es casado, tiene 2 hijos y reside en el municipio de Tela, Atlántida. Tiene su propio negocio de una joyería, este negocio lo tiene hace 7 años y lo ha establecido en un local donde alquila. Vende relojes, aretes, cadenas, pulseras de plata y oro y también hace reparaciones. Este préstamo que esta solicitando es por 11,000 lempiras y lo invertirá en la compra de materia prima como argollas de oro usado, plata, aretes, anillos para vender y reparar, con el cual mantendrá activo su negocio. Su objetivo es  mejorar los  ingresos y suplir las necesidades de su familia.
texts.en:
Mynor is 30 years old. He is married, has two children and lives in the municipality of Tela, Atlántida. He has had his own business, a jewelry store in a location he rents, for the last 7 years. He sells watches, earrings, chains, gold and silver bracelets and also does repairs.

Mynor is requesting a loan of 11,000 HNL which he will invest buying raw material like used gold rings, silver and earrings and rings to repair and sell. This will keep his business active. His main objective is to improve his income and provide the necessities for his family.

loans.use: to buy raw material like used gold rings, silver and earrings and rings to repair and sell.

loans.name: Florinda Elizabeth

texts.es: Florinda, tiene 29 años de edad, es soltera vive junto a una hermana en el municipio de Choloma, Cortes. Se dedica a la confección de prendas de vestir como pantalones, camisas, ropa de cama y otros. Este negocio lo tiene hace 5 años  en su casa, ella adquirió experiencia en una maquila donde trabajaba. Ha decidido solicitar un préstamo por 6,000 Lempiras para la compra de materia prima, como telas e hilos y confeccionar prendas de vestir. Esta inversión  le ayudara a atender la demanda de sus productos. Su plan es mantener el negocio y poner un taller más grande con empleados.
texts.en: Florinda, 29, is single and lives with her sister in the town of Choloma, Cortes. She makes her living making clothing such as pants, shirts, bed linens, and more. She began this business five years ago in her home. She gained experience in a factory where she worked. She has decided to apply for a loan of 6,000 Lempiras for the purchase of raw materials such as fabric and thread for making clothing. This investment will help her meet the demand for her products. Her plan is to maintain her business and build a larger workplace with employees.

loans.use: to purchase fabrics and thread to make clothing.

loans.name: Uberlinda

texts.es: Uberlinda tiene 58 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene 3 hijos y vive con una hija en el municipio de Villanueva,  Cortes. Tiene su propio negocio desde hace 19 años, donde brinda el servicio de carpintería, en este taller fabrican sillas, mesas, estantes de madera y otros que le piden. El préstamo que solicita es por 15,000 Lempiras y es el segundo ciclo, con el cual va comprar materia prima como madera, pegamento para elaborar mesas y sillas, este mismo le ayudara a mantener el taller activo. Su  plan es  mejorar su  administración y hacerlo crecer para darles un patrimonio a sus hijos.
texts.en: Uberlinda is 58 years old. She is a single mother with three children. She lives with a daughter in the town of Villanueva, Cortes. She has had her own business for 19 years, offering the service of carpentry. This workshop has made chairs, tables, shelves, and other woodwork as requested. The loan she is requesting is for 15,000 Lempiras. It is her second loan cycle. She will buy raw materials like wood and glue for making furniture and keeping her workshop active. Her plan is to improve and grow her business to leave assets for her children.

loans.use: to purchase wood and glue to make chairs and tables to sell.

loans.name: Daisy

texts.es: Doña Daisy,  tiene 55 años de edad, esta casada, tiene  5 hijos y reside en  el municipio de Tela, Atlántida. Anteriormente doña Daisy se dedicaba a la venta de cerdos y ropa y hace 5 años decidió por  dedicarse  a la venta de carnes como pollo y res, esta  actividad la realiza  en su casa. El préstamo que solicita es por 6,000 Lempiras y lo invertirá en la compra de carne de pollo  y carnes de res, para poder aumentar las ventas.  Su objetivo es poder incrementar los ingresos y lograr instalar una pulpería para vender productos básicos alimenticios.
texts.en: Daisy is 55 years old. She is married and has five children. She lives in the town of Tela, in Atlántida. Daisy used to work selling pigs and clothing, but five years ago she decided to start selling meat, such as chicken and beef. She runs her business from her home. The loan she is requesting is for 6,000 lempiras, which she will invest in purchasing chicken and beef in order to increase her sales. Her goal is to be able to raise her income and set up a grocery store to sell basic grocery products.

loans.use: to buy chicken and beef to sell.

loans.name: Iris Janeth

texts.es: Iris, tiene 40 años de edad, esta casada, tiene 2 hijos y vive en una aldea del municipio de Puerto, Cortes. Hace 8 años que se dedica a la venta de comida rápida en una escuela, vende pollo frito con tajadas, tacos, baleadas, enchiladas, agua, refrescos, dulces, galletas, jugos etc. El préstamo que solicita es por 8,000 lempiras y lo invertirá en la compra de insumos para elaborar comidas y golosinas, para mantener variedad de productos y obtener ingresos que ayuden a su familia.
texts.en:
Iris is 40 years old, married, and has two children. She lives in a small village in the municipality of Puerto, Cortes. She has worked for eight years now selling fast food in a school. She sells fried chicken with fried plantain slices, tacos, baleadas [a typical Honduran dish consisting of a wheat flour tortilla stuffed with refried beans, eggs, avocado, meat and cheese], enchiladas, water, soft drinks, candy, cookies, juice, etc.

Iris is requesting this loan of 8,000 HNL to buy ingredients to make her meals, as well as candy and snacks. She hopes to maintain the variety of products she sells and to earn income to help her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to make the meals she sells in her school food stall, as well as candy and snacks.

loans.name: Guillermo

texts.es: Don Guillermo, tiene 61 años de edad, es casado, tiene  6 hijos y vive en una aldea del municipio de Intibucá. Siempre se ha dedicado a la agricultura, tiene aproximadamente 32 años de dedicarse al cultivo de papa, repollo y zanahoria. Esta producción la vende en el mercado local. El ha obtenido varios préstamos para mantener en buen estado sus cultivos. Actualmente solicita otro por 15,000 lempiras para comprar abonos, semillas de papas, insecticidas, herbicidas  etc. Para darle buen mantenimiento a los cultivos y mejorar la producción. Su plan es  mejorar su casa y aumentar el área de producción de sus cultivos.
texts.en: Guillermo is 61 years old, married, and has six children. He lives in a small village in the department of Intibucá. He has always worked in agriculture. He now has about 32 years of experience growing potatoes, cabbage and carrots. He sells his produce in a local market. He has had a number of previous loans which he used to keep his crops in good condition. He is requesting this loan for 15,000 HNL to buy fertilizer, seed potatoes, insecticides and herbicides, which he will use to maintain his crops and improve his production. He hopes to improve his home and increase the area of land he has under cultivation.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, seed potatoes, insecticides and herbicides.

loans.name: Leonidas

texts.es: Leonidas, tiene 23 años de edad, esta soltero, vive con una tía en una aldea del municipio de Intibucá. Se dedica a la siembra y producción de papa,  granos básicos como frijoles y maíz.  Este negocio lo tiene hace 8 años, desde muy joven se ha dedicado a la agricultura. Este préstamo es el segundo ciclo y  es por 25,000 lempiras, el cual  lo invertirá en la compra de semilla de papa y de fertilizantes para mejorar el nivel de producción y sus ganancias. Tiene como meta mejorar su casa de habitación y apoyar a su familia.
texts.en: Leonidas is 23 years old. He is single and lives with an aunt in a village in the municipality of Intibucá. He works planting and growing potatoes and basic grains like beans and rice. He has been in business for eight years, since he started farming when he was very young. This is his second loan cycle and it is for 25,000 lempiras, which he will invest in purchasing potato seeds and fertilizer to improve his production level and his earnings. One of his goals is to improve the home where he lives and support his family.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer for his potato plants.

loans.name: María Virginia

texts.es:
Doña María, tiene 58 años de edad, es madre soltera, reside en el municipio de Choloma, Cortés junto a una nieta. Doña María se ha dedicado desde siempre a la venta de alimentos a través de una pulpería, tiene 18 años de poseer su negocio. Ella vende arroz, manteca, sopas instantáneas, cereales, medicamentos de uso común, sardinas, refrescos, pan, azúcar, café, pan, productos enlatados y golosinas.
Actualmente ha solicitado otro préstamo siendo el cuarto ciclo y es por 21,000 Lempiras, los que piensa utilizar en compra de granos básicos, azúcar, carnes, lácteos,productos de aseo y refrescos.
Su objetivo es mantener surtir su negocio para aumentar sus ventas e ingresos lo que le permite mejorar su nivel de vida.
texts.en:
Maria, 58, is a single mother. She lives in the town of Choloma, Cortes, along with her granddaughter. Maria has always worked in food sales in a convenience store. She has had this business for 18 years. She sells rice, butter, instant soup, cereal, basic medications, sardines, drinks, bread, sugar, coffee, canned products, and sweets.

She is now requesting another loan (this is her fourth loan cycle) for 21,000 HNL. She will use this loan to buy basic grains, sugar, meat, dairy products, personal hygiene products, and drinks.

Her goal is to keep her business stocked to increase sales and income, which will allow her to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy basic grains,  sugar, meat, dairy products, personal hygiene products, and drinks.

loans.name: Jimy Alexander

texts.es: Jimy, tiene 25 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposa con quien tiene 1 hijo y reside en una aldea del municipio de Intibucá. Siempre se a dedicado a la agricultura. Hace 3 años comenzó a cultivar hortalizas, como repollo, lechuga, papas y siempre granos básicos como maíz y frijoles. La producción la vende en el mercado local de la zona.  El préstamo que solicita es por 10,000 lempiras y lo invertirá en preparar el terreno y  compra de semilla de papa, su objetivo es aumentar las ganancias, aumentando la producción y así podrá darle mejor vida a su familia.
texts.en: Jimy is 25 years old, is in a common law marriage, and has a son.  He lives in a village called Intibuca and has always been a farmer.  He began raising vegetables, such as cabbage, lettuce, potatoes, and basic grains such as corn and beans three years ago and sells his harvest in the local market.  He will use the 10,000 Lempiras from this loan to prepare the land to plant potatoes.  His goal is to increase his earnings by increasing his production.  This way he can improve his family’s life.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es: María, tiene 33 años de edad, es casada, tiene  2 hijos y vive en la comunidad de Choloma, Cortes.  Ella trabajo por varios años en una maquila, pero hace un año decidió mejor por su propio negocio para estar cerca a sus hijos. Vende ropa para damas, caballeros y niños. Lociones y otros productos de catalogo. Las ventas las realiza de manera ambulante. El préstamo que solicita es por 13,000 lempiras y lo invertirá en la compra de ropa y lociones para vender. Su plan es hacer crecer el negocio y llegar a ser auto sostenible.
texts.en: María is 33 years old. she is married and has 2 children. She lives in the community of Choloma, Cortes. She worked for several years in a factory, but a year ago she decided to have her own business so that she could be close to her children. She sells women's, men's and children's clothing, lotions and other products via catalog. She sells as a street vendor. The loan she is asking for will be invested in buying clothes and lotions to sell. Her plan is to grow her business and become self supporting.

loans.use: to buy clothes and lotion to sell.

loans.name: Maria De Jesus

texts.es: Doña María, tiene 48 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene 5 hijos a su cargo y reside en una aldea del municipio de Choloma, Cortes. Trabajo varios años en una empresa prestando servicios varios, y hace 4 años se ha dedicado a elaborar pan para vender y al cultivo de maíz y frijol. de estas actividades ella logra cubrir las necesidades básicas de sus hijos. Ha solicitado un préstamo por 5,000 Lempiras para comprar insumos como abonos para el cultivo,  herramientas para la siembra de maíz y frijoles. y materiales como harina, leche huevo manteca para elaborar pan y vender. El propósito de su crédito es aumentar la producción de maíz y frijol para obtener mas ingresos, ya que quiere mejorar su vivienda y dar buena educación a sus hijos.
texts.en:
María is 40 years old and is a single mother. She has five children in her care and lives in a village in the municipality of Choloma, Cortes. She worked for several years in a company providing various services, and for four years has been making bread to sell and growing corn and beans. With these activities she manages to cover the basic needs of her children. 

She is requesting a loan of 5,000 lempiras to buy supplies such as crop fertilizers, tools for growing corn and beans, and ingredients such as flour, milk, eggs and lard for making bread to sell. 

The purpose of her loan is to increase corn and bean production, in order to obtain more income, as she wants to improve her home and provide her children with a good education.

loans.use: To buy agricultural supplies such as crop fertilizers, tools for growing corn and beans, and ingredients such as flour, milk, eggs and lard for making bread to sell.

loans.name: Claudia Maritza

texts.es: Claudia, tiene 37 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene 3 hijos y vive en el municipio de San Marcos, Santa Bárbara. Ella Se dedica a la venta de mercadería en general como blusas, pantalones, camisas, camisetas, útiles escolares, plásticos, accesorios y otra achinería. Este negocio lo tiene hace 5 años 3 meses y lo tiene establecido en su casa. Esta solicitando 20,000 Lempiras para surtir de ropa como pantalones, camisas y blusas para vender, con el cual espera obtener clientes nuevos y mantener su clientela. Tiene como meta invertir más en ropa de segunda para obtener mas ingresos y darles una mejor educación a sus hijos.
texts.en: Claudia, 37, is a single mother. She has three children and lives in the municipality of San Marcos, Santa Barbara. She works by selling merchandise such as blouses, pants, shirts, t-shirts, school supplies, plastic products, accessories, and other low-cost consumer goods. She has had this business for 5 years and 3 months, which is based in her home. She is requesting 20,000 HNL to stock up on clothing such as pants, shirts, and blouses to sell. With this loan, she hopes to gain new customers and maintain her current customer base. Her goal is to invest in more second-hand clothing to earn income and give her children a better education.

loans.use: to stock up on clothes such as pants, shirts, and blouses to sell.

loans.name: Trinidad

texts.es: Doña Trinidad, tiene 65 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene  3 hijos y vive en el municipio de San Pedro Sula. Hace muchos años que ella se dedica a la venta de leña para cocinar, este negocio lo tiene en su casa, de donde obtiene sus ingresos.  ha obtenido varios prestamos para mantener surtido su negocio, actualmente solicita otro que  es por 25,000 Lempiras, con el cual va comprar mas leña para vender y con una parte pagara un saldo pendiente que tiene con una institución. Su plan es seguir trabajando para lograr la compra de un carro  para transportar la leña.
texts.en:
Trinidad is 65 years old. She is a single mother of three children. She lives in San Pedro Sula. She has been selling firewood for many years. She sells the wood at home and this is how she makes a living.

She has received different loans for her business and is now requesting another one of 25,000 lempiras [HNL]. She will buy firewood to sell and will use the rest to pay off a debt she has with an institution. Her plan is to continue working to be able to buy a cart to transport the wood.

loans.use: to buy more firewood to sell, and to pay off a debt she has with an institution.

loans.name: Isidra

texts.es: Doña Isidra, tiene 54 años de edad, esta casada, tiene dos hijos y vive en el municipio de Puerto Cortes. Anteriormente se dedicaba a la venta de frutas y mercadería. Hace aproximadamente 2 años que se dedica a la elaboración de sillas de hierro decoradas con cabuya de nylon para la venta. Ella ha mantenido varios prestamos con ODEF para inversión en sus negocios. Actualmente solicita otro préstamo por 15,000 Lempiras y lo va invertir en la compra de materiales como hierro, estaño y cabuya de nylon para la elaboración de las sillas. Su plan es obtener buenas ganancias para agrandar mas el negocio.
texts.en:
Isidra is 54 years old, married and has two children. She lives in Puerto Cortes. She used to sell fruits and other goods, but two years ago she started to make iron chairs, decorated with nylon twine.

Isidra has received several loans from ODEF to invest in her business. She is now requesting a loan of 15,000 Lempiras [HNL] to buy materials such as iron, tin and nylon twine for making chairs. Her goal is to earn good profits and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy materials such as iron, tin and nylon twines to make chairs.

loans.name: Maria Marta

texts.es: Doña María, es madre soltera, tiene  3 hijos quienes ya son independientes y vive en la comunidad de Choloma, Cortes. Se dedica a la costura de prendas de vestir como camisas de niño, pantalones cortos y faldas para damas.  Este negocio lo tiene hace 10 años y trabaja en su casa. Este negocio es su fuente de ingresos la que ha mantenido mediante la inversión de varios préstamos. Actualmente solicita el octavo ciclo y es por 7,000 Lempiras, ella va comprar telas, hilos, elásticos, botones y otros para confeccionar ropa. Su propósito es incrementar las ventas y las ganancias para poder mejorar su vivienda.
texts.en: Maria is a single mother who has 3 grown children who are already independent.  She lives in the community of Choloma, in Cortes.  Maria works as a dressmaker, making garments such as children's shirts, short pants, and women's skirts.  She's had this business for 10 years, and she works from her home.  This business is her source of income, and she's kept it going through investments made with various loans.  At this time, she is in her 8th loan cycle.  She's requesting a loan of 7,000 Honduran lempiras to buy fabric, thread, elastic, buttons, and other dressmaking supplies.  Maria's goal is to increase her sales and earnings so she can make some improvements to her home.

loans.use: to buy dressmaking supplies

loans.name: Santos Aurelia

texts.es: Doña Santos,  tiene 53 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene  4 hijos y vive en el municipio de Choloma, Cortes.  Hace 15 años que estableció su propio negocio de  venta de comidas, pollo frito, tajadas, baleadas, tacos, y refrescos. Esta actividad la realiza en su casa.  Ha solicitado el cuarto ciclo de préstamo y es por 30,000 Lempiras, el cual lo invertirá en la compra de materia prima como carnes, arroz, vegetales, harina, manteca, condimentos etc. Para elaborar la comida y vender. Ella considera que esta inversión le va ayudar más a que su negocio siga creciendo, ya que su meta es ayudar a su familia.
texts.en:
Santos is 53 years old. She is a single mother of four children and lives in the municipality of Choloma, in Cortes. She opened her own business fifteen years ago; she sells different foods at home, like fried chicken, fried plantain, baleadas [thick flour tortillas filled with beans], tacos and beverages.

For her fourth cycle, she has requested a loan of 30,000 Lempiras [HNL] to buy ingredients such as different types of meat, rice, vegetables, flour, shortening and spices. She believes that this investment will help her to expand her business and help her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients such as different types of meat, vegetables, flour, shortening and spices.

loans.name: Deyvir Javier

texts.es: Deyvir, tiene  37 años de edad, esta casado, tiene  3 hijos y vive en el municipio  de Choloma, Cortes. Se dedica a la venta de mercadería en general desde hace 8 años, vende ropa para damas, caballeros y niños.  También  vende materiales para confección de ropa interior como elásticos, tela para bóxer etc. Este negocio lo realiza de manera ambulante. El préstamo que solicita es el quinto ciclo en ODEF y es por 21,000 Lempiras, el que utilizara para comprar ropa nueva para poder incrementar el inventario y aumentar las ventas. Su plan es que el negocio crezca y que sus hijos tengan buena educación.
texts.en:
Deyvir is 37 years old, married and has three children. He lives in the municipality of Choloma, in Cortes. He has been selling different types of merchandise for eight years, such as clothes for women, men and children. He also sells supplies to make underwear, such as elastics and fabrics to make boxers. He works as a street vendor.

Deyvir is requesting a loan of 21,000 Lempiras [HNL]for his fifth cycle with ODEF. He will buy new clothes to increase his inventory and his sales. His goal is to expand his business and support his children’s education.

loans.use: to buy new clothes to sell.

loans.name: Sandra Lizeth

texts.es: Sandra, tiene 35 años  de edad, es casada, tiene  4 hijos y vive en el municipio de Choloma, Cortes. Ella tiene su propio  negocio de una pulpería donde vende granos básicos, azúcar, sal, pan, verduras, pastillas de uso común, condimentos, jabón, manteca, huevos papel higiénico etc. este negocio lo tiene hace 10 años del cual a podido mantener a su familia. Ha solicitado el noveno ciclo de préstamo el  cual es por 13,000 lempiras, con este capital va poder surtir mejor la pulpería con productos como arroz, azúcar, manteca, frijoles, refrescos, pan, verduras etc. Su meta es darles una buena educación a sus hijos.
texts.en: Sandra, 35, is married and has 4 children.  She lives in the municipality of Choloma in Cortes, Honduras.
