Sandra has her own grocery store where she sells staple consumer goods, sugar, salt, bread, vegetables, common over-the-counter pills, condiments, soap, butter, toilet paper, etc.  She's had this grocery store for 10 years, and with it she is able to support her family.  She is requesting her 9th loan for 13,000 Honduran lempiras to stock up her grocery store with products such as: rice, sugar, butter, beans, soft drinks, bread, vegetables, etc.  Sandra's goal is to provide her children with a good education.

loans.use: to buy products for her grocery store

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es: Carmen, tiene 42 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene dos hijos y reside con ellos en el municipio de Azacualpa, Santa Bárbara. Siempre se ha dedicado al comercio, hace tres años ella decidió por establecer una pulpería donde vende productos de la canasta básica familiar como ser azúcar, arroz, frijoles, manteca, huevos, pan, pollo, churros, refrescos, jabón, dulces etc. El préstamo que ha solicitado es por 10,000 Lempiras con el cual va surtir la pulpería con granos básicos, pollo, azúcar, manteca y otros para lograr aumentar el inventario y las ventas. su plan es tener el negocio bien surtido para con sus ganancias darle mejor vida a sus hijos.
texts.en: Carmen is 42 years old and a single mother. She has two children who live with her in the Azacualpa municipality of Santa Bárbara. Carmen has always worked in business. Three years ago she decided to start a grocery store where she sells basic staple goods such as sugar, rice, beans, butter, eggs, bread, chicken, churros, soft drinks, soap, sweets and more. Carmen has applied for a loan of 10,000 Lempira in order to stock up her store with basic grains, chicken, sugar, butter and other items. She can keep up her inventory and sales with this loan. Carmen's plan is have her business well-stocked so that she can use her profits to give her children better lives.

loans.use: to stock up her grocery store with basic grains, chicken, sugar, butter and other items.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es: Carmen, tiene 39 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposo con quien tiene 3 hijos, reside en el municipio de San Pedro Sula. Lleva seis años de tener su propia actividad de negocio donde elabora y vende tortillas de maíz, esta actividad la realiza en su casa. Ha solicitado el tercer ciclo de préstamo que es por 10,000 Lempiras, con el cual va comprar harina de maíz, leña para elaborar las tortillas y también va reparar la galera de la hornilla donde cocina las tortillas. Su objetivo es mantener siempre el negocio para asegurar el sostenimiento de la familia.
texts.en: Carmen is 39 years old and lives with her husband, with whom she has three children. Carmen lives in the San Pedro Sula municipality. For six years she has had her own business making and selling corn tortillas. She works from home. Carmen has applied for her third loan, this time for 10,000 Lempira. She will use this loan to to buy corn flour and firewood to make and sell tortillas, and to fix the stove galley where she prepares her tortillas. Carmen's objective is to keep the business going in order to support her family.

loans.use: to buy corn flour and firewood to make and sell tortillas, and to fix the galley where she has her stove.

loans.name: Cospa Group

texts.es: María, tiene 30 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposo con quien tienen cuatro hijos, reside en una aldea del municipio de Gracias, Lempira. Siempre se ha dedicado a la agricultura de granos básicos, y hace 7 años ha cultivado café, el cual vende en la misma zona. Ha solicitado un préstamo en forma grupal de 5,000 Lempiras, para comprar fertilizante y pago de mano de obra por limpieza de la finca de café. Su propósito es crecer con este cultivo y llegar a ser una productora grande de café para ayudar a su familia. El grupo se llama Cospa, que esta integrado por cuatro miembros que también se dedican a la agricultura, viven en la misma zona y el préstamo lo invertirán en la compra de fertilizantes para el cultivo de café. El préstamo grupal es por 18,000 lempiras. En la foto esta María a la Izquierda, seguido esta doña Catalina, Prudencio y a la derecha Isidra.
texts.en:
Maria is 30 years old. She lives in free union with her husband, with whom she has four children. She lives in a village in the township of Gracias, Lempira. She has always worked in agriculture, growing basic grains, and for seven years she has grown coffee, which she sells in the same zone. She has applied as a group member for a loan of 5000 Lempiras to buy fertilizer and pay for labor to clean her coffee farm. Her goal is to increase this crop and become a great producer of coffee in order to help her family. 

The group is called "Cospa," and it consists of four members who also work in agriculture. They live in the same zone, and they will invest the loan in the purchase of fertilizers for growing coffee. The loan for the group is 15,000 Lempiras. In the photo, Maria is on the left, followed by Doña Catalina, Prudencio, and on the right, Isidra.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pay for labor to clean her coffee planting.

loans.name: Gladis Argentina

texts.es: Gladis, tiene 39 años de edad, es casada, tiene 6 hijos y reside en una aldea del municipio de Macuelizo, Santa Bárbara. Hace diez años ella decidió dedicarse a la compra y venta de materiales para reciclar, como ser artículos en mal estado, desperdicios de hierro, botellas plásticas y otros para reciclaje. Ha obtenido varios prestamos para mantener este negocio, actualmente solicita el quinto ciclo que es por 8,000 Lempiras, con el cual va comprar material chatarra para vender a las fabricas recicladoras. Su objetivo es mantener una fuente de ingresos y poderles dar una educación a sus hijos.
texts.en: Gladis is 39 years old, married, has six children, and lives in a suburb of Macuelizo, Santa Barbara.  Ten years ago she decided to buy and sell recyclable items, such as items in poor condition, iron, plastic bottles, and other recyclables.  She has gotten several loans for this business and is currently requesting a loan of 8,000 Lempiras to buy discards to sell to recycling plants.  Her goal is to maintain a source of income so she can provide for an education for her children.

loans.use: to buy recyclables.

loans.name: Dina Bila

texts.es: Dina, tiene 40 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene tres hijos y vive con sus padres y dos de sus hijos en el municipio de Intibucá. Ella anteriormente se dedicaba a la agricultura, y lleva 15 años de elaborar y vender pan casero como ser semitas, quesadillas, rosquillas, tortas etc. Sus clientes le compran el producto en su casa. también vende churros, refrescos, café y otros abarrotes. Ha solicitado un préstamo por 6,000 Lempiras el cual invertirá en la compra de insumos para elaborar el pan como ser harina, huevos, azúcar, manteca, levadura, leche etc y otros productos para vender. Tiene como meta cuidar su  negocio para que crezca en clientes, aumentar las ventas y poder mejorar su vivienda.
texts.en: Dina is 40 years old and is a single mother. She has three children. Dina lives with her parents and two of her children in the Intibucá municipality. Dina previously worked in farming but she now has 15 years experience making and selling homemade bread, as well as quesadillas, doughnuts, cakes and more. Dina's customers come to her house to buy her products and there she also sells churros, soft drinks, coffee and other groceries. Dina has applied for a loan of 6000 Lempira, which she will invest in buying products for making her bread, such as flour, eggs, sugar, butter, yeast, milk and more. She will also buy other products to sell. Dina's goal is to look after her business so that her number of customers grows, her sales increase and so that she can improve her home.

loans.use: to buy supplies - such as flour, eggs, sugar, butter, yeast and milk - in order to make bread; she will also buy other products to sell.

loans.name: Juan Jose

texts.es: El señor Juan, tiene 52 años de edad, esta casado, tiene  2 hijos y  vive en el municipio de Puerto. Cortes. Se dedica a la ebanistería desde hace 15 años, este taller  lo tiene establecido en su casa y siempre se ha dedicado a lo mismo. Elabora puertas de madera, cunas para bebes, roperos, juegos de comedor y sala. El producto lo hace de acuerdo a pedidos. El préstamo que solicita es el cuarto ciclo  y es por 8,000 Lempiras con el cual va comprar madera para la fabricación de muebles que le soliciten sus clientes. su plan es lograr agrandar el negocio y obtener mejores ganancias para la familia.
texts.en: Juan is 52 years old, married, and has two children.  He lives in Puerto Cortes and has been doing woodworking for the past 15 years.  His workshop is in his home and he has always done this.  He makes wooden doors, clothing armoires, and living and dining room sets to order.  He is in his fourth cycle and will use the money from this loan of 8,000 Lempiras to buy lumber, to make furniture that his customers are requesting.  His plan is to grow his business and obtain more earnings for his family.

loans.use: to buy lumber.

loans.name: Alan Rolando

texts.es: Alan, tiene 30 años de edad, esta soltero, vive  en el municipio de Azacualpa, Santa Bárbara junto a su madre. Alan se dedicaba a la albañilería y hace dos años decidió establecer una pulpería donde vende productos de la canasta básica familiar como ser arroz, maíz, frijoles, azúcar, manteca, harina, refrescos, churros, verduras, carnes, condimentos y otros. Ha solicitado el segundo ciclo de préstamo, el cual es por 20,000 Lempiras y lo va invertir en surtir el negocio con productos como frijoles, carnes, manteca, refrescos y otros. El considera que esta inversión le ayudara a ofrecer mas variedad de productos y a que su negocio crezca. Su plan es mantener el negocio para cuando logre tener a su familia poderles dar lo mejor.
texts.en: Alan is 30 years old, single and lives with his mother in the Azacualpa municipality in Santa Bárbara. Alan used to be a builder but two years ago he decided to start a grocery store where he sells staple goods such as rice, beans, corn, sugar, butter, flour, drinks, churros, vegetables, meats, condiments and more. He has applied for his second loan, this time for 20,000 Lempira. He will use it to invest in stocking up his business with products such as beans, meats, butter, juices and more. Alan believes that this loan will help him to offer a greater variety of products and it will help his business to grow. Alan's plan for the future is to keep his business going so that, when he has a family, he will be able to give them the best that he can.

loans.use: to stock up his grocery store with products such as beans, meats, butter, juices and more.

loans.name: Johny Oswaldo

texts.es: Johny, tiene 28 años de edad, esta soltero, vive en el municipio de Azacualpa, Santa Bárbara junto a su madre. El tiene su propio negocio desde hace 6 años, donde vende útiles escolares como cuadernos, lápices, reglas, papel, mochilas etc. El negocio lo tiene en un local alquilado cerca a su casa. El negocio se ha mantenido estable mediante dos prestamos que ha invertido anteriormente. Ahora ha solicitado el tercer ciclo que es por 30,000 Lempiras con el cual va poder ampliar el negocio surtiéndolo de cuadernos, lápices, colores, borradores, tintas, papel etc. y así lograra mayor volumen de ventas y mayor numero de clientes en esta temporada escolar. Su sueño es tener su propio local y crecer como microempresario.
texts.en: Johny is 28 years old and single. He lives with his mother in the Azacualpa municipality in Santa Bárbara. Johny has had his own business for six years. There he sells school materials, such as notebooks, pencils, rulers, paper, rucksacks and more. Johny runs the business out of rented premises near to his home. The business has remained stable with two previous loans. Johny has now applied for a third loan, this time for 30,000 Lempira. With this he can expand his business, stocking up with notebooks, pencils, coloured pencils, erasers, ink, paper and more. He can then have higher sales and more customers for this school term. Johny's dream is to have his own premises and to grow as a small-time businessman.

loans.use: to buy notebooks, pencils, coloured pencils, erasers, ink, paper and more to sell.

loans.name: Xiomara Judith

texts.es: Xiomara, tiene 24 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene un hijo y vive con el en el municipio de Macuelizo, Santa Bárbara. Ella ha iniciado su propia actividad de negocio desde hace 1 año. Confecciona faldas, blusas, vestidos y otros, estos trabajos los hace mediante pedidos. Ha solicitado un préstamo por 5,000 Lempiras para comprar telas, hilos, botones, y otros materiales que necesita para la confección de ropa que le pidan sus clientes. Su meta es ampliar su negocio y obtener mejores ganancias para darle mejor vida a su hijo.
texts.en: Xiomara is 24 years old, a single mother with a son, and lives with him in the town of Macuelizo, Santa Bárbara.  She started her own business a year ago and makes skirts, blouses, dresses, and other things.  She does these jobs to order and is asking for a loan of 5,000 Lempiras to buy fabric, thread, buttons, and other supplies she needs to make clothing for her customers.  Her goal is to expand her business and increase her earnings so she can provide a better life for her son.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Hector Andres

texts.es: Don Hector, tiene 54 años de edad, esta casado, tiene dos hijos y reside en el municipio de Tocoa, Colon. El trabajo por varios años prestando el servicio de topografía. Hace 5 años decidió con su esposa establecer un negocio de pulpería donde vende productos de la canasta básica familiar, como ser frijoles, harina, pan, arroz, manteca, huevos, azúcar, churros, condimentos, productos de aseo, carnes, etc. El préstamo que solicita es por 15,000 Lempiras con el fin de surtir la pulpería de productos como manteca, harina, arroz, azúcar, productos de aseo, pan, huevos, churros, carnes, pastas etc. Y poder aumentar las ganancias. Su sueño es llegar a tener su negocio grande y en un local propio.
texts.en: Hector is 54 years old, married with two children and lives in the town of Tocoa, Colon. He worked for a number of years providing topography services. Five years ago he decided with his wife to establish a grocery store selling everyday items such as beans, flour, bread, rice, lard, eggs, sugar, churros, condiments, cleaning products, meats and other items. He is requesting the loan with the goal of stocking his store with more of these kinds of products so he can increase his income. His goal is to have a big business with its own location.

loans.use: to stock his store with products such as lard, flour, rice, sugar, cleaning supplies, bread, eggs, churros, meats, pastas, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy fabrics, threads, buttons, fasteners, zippers, and other materials to make clothing.

loans.name: Brenda Mariela

texts.es: Brenda, tiene 23 años de edad, esta soltera, reside en el municipio de Quimistán, Santa Bárbara junto a su hermano y sobrino. Anteriormente estuvo estudiando pero siempre le ha gustado el negocio y hace un año decidió dedicarse a la venta de zapatos y ropa para damas como blusas, pantalones, camisas etc. las ventas las realiza en forma ambulante. El préstamo que solicita es el segundo ciclo y es por 15,000 Lempiras con el cual va comprar mas zapatos y ropa para vender y cubrir los pedidos que le han hecho. Su plan es poder construir un apartamento y también ayudar económicamente a su familia.
texts.en: Brenda is 23 years old, is single, and she lives in the town of Quimistán, Santa Bárbara with her brother and nephew. Previously Brenda was studying, but she has always liked business, and a year ago, she decided to work selling women's shoes and clothes, including blouses, pants, tops, etc., which she does as a street vendor. The loan Brenda is requesting is the second cycle, and it is for $775 (15,000 Lempiras), which she will use to buy more shoes and clothes to sell and to cover orders that have been made. Her plan is to be able to construct an apartment and to support her family economically.

loans.use: buy more shoes and clothes to sell.

loans.name: Ana Bessy

texts.es: Ana, tiene 43 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene dos hijos y vive en el municipio de San Pedro Sula junto a su hija menor. Siempre se ha dedicado a la costura, ella confecciona vestidos y trajes para toda ocasión, este taller lo tiene en su casa desde hace 10 años. El préstamo que solicita es por 6,000 Lempiras para comprar maniquí para exhibir los vestidos y una maquina industrial para confeccionar vestidos y trajes. Su plan es lograr tener un local propio para el negocio en el centro de la ciudad y aumentar las ventas.
texts.en:
Ana is 43 years old, she is a single mother and has two children. She lives in the municipality of San Pedro Sula with her younger daughter. She has always working in the sewing industry, making clothes and suits for all occasions. She has had this workshop in her home for ten years. 

The loan that Ana is seeking is for 6,000 Honduran Lempiras to buy mannequins to display the clothes and an industrial sewing machine to make clothes and suits. Her plan is to have her own premises for the business in the city center and increase sales.

loans.use: to buy a mannequin to display clothes and an industrial sewing machine to make clothes and suits.

loans.name: Carlos Andres

texts.es: Carlos, tiene 58 años de edad, es soltero por viudez, reside en una aldea del municipio de Quimistán, Santa Bárbara. don Carlos, por muchos años se dedico a la agricultura y hace 8 años decidió realizar otra actividad que le generara mas ingresos, el recolecta y compra botellas plásticas, latas, rines de carro, beterías en mal estado, y metales para vender a las empresas de reciclaje. Ha obtenido varios prestamos los que le ha permitido mantener el negocio activo. Actualmente solicita otro por 12,000 Lempiras para comprar mas chatarra y plástico para vender a las recicladoras. Su propósito es mejorar el negocio para obtener mas ganancias y tener un estilo de vida mejor.
texts.en:
Carlos, 58, is single after becoming a widower; he lives in a small town of the municipality of Quimistán, Santa Bárbara. For many years Carlos made a living in agriculture, and eight years ago he decided to perform another activity which would generate more income: the collection and purchase of plastic bottles, cans, vehicle wheel rims, batteries in a poor state, as well as metals to sell to recycling companies. He has obtained a series of loans which has enabled his to keep the business afloat. 

Carlos is currently seeking another loan for 12,000 Honduran Lempiras to buy more scrap metal and plastic to sell to recycling companies. His aim is to improve the business to obtain more profits and have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more scrap metal and plastic to sell to recycling firms.

loans.name: Alfredo

texts.es: Alfredo, tiene 40 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposo, con quien tiene 4 hijos y reside en una aldea de Nueva Frontera, Santa Bárbara. El siempre se ha dedicado a la agricultura, al cultivo de maíz y frijoles, pero hace 18 años que decidió cultivar café, el cual vende en grano en la misma zona. Ha solicitado el segundo ciclo de préstamo el cual es por 10,000 Lempiras y lo utilizara en la compra de fertilizantes y pago por limpieza del cultivo, así podrá mejorar la cosecha y obtener mayores ingresos.
texts.en:
Alfredo, 40, lives in a common-law partnership together with his wife, with whom he has four children and they live in the town of Nueva Frontera, Santa Bárbara. He has always worked in agriculture, growing corn and beans, but 18 years ago he decided to grow coffee which he sells in grains in the same area. 

Alfredo is requesting the second loan cycle which is for 10,000 Lempiras and which he will use to buy fertilizers and pay to clear the crop, therein improving the crop and obtaining larger profits.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pay for the clearing of the coffee field.

loans.name: Rigoberto

texts.es: Don Rigoberto, tiene 56 años de edad, esta casado, tiene dos hijos, y reside en una aldea de Nueva Frontera, Santa Bárbara. Toda su vida se ha dedicado al transporte, presta el servicio de transporte de fletes, acarrea material de construcción, animales, granos básicos, leña, etc. este trabajo lo realiza con su vehículo que es tipo camión. El préstamo que esta solicitando es el segundo ciclo y es por 22,000 Lempiras, con el cual va poder darle mantenimiento y reparación a su vehículo, para mantenerlo en buenas condiciones y brindar mejor servicio. Su plan es seguir trabajando día a día para obtener mejores utilidades y darle a su familia un mejor nivel de vida.
texts.en:
Rigoberto is 56 years old; he is married, has two children and lives in the town of Nueva Frontera, Santa Bárbara. He has spent his whole life working in the transport industry, and provides a freight service, shipping construction materials, animals, bulk grains, firewood and so on. He has been performing this work with his vehicle which resembles a truck. 

The loan that Rigoberto is seeking is for 22,000 Honduran Lempiras and is the second cycle. With this money he will be able to maintain and repair his vehicle in order to ensure that it is in good working order and to offer a better service. His plan is to continue working from day to day to earn more profits and give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to pay for the upkeep and repair of his work vehicle.

loans.name: Keydi Julissa

texts.es: Keydi, tiene 22 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposo, con quien tiene dos hijos, reside en el municipio de Tocoa, Colon. Keydi lleva más de 3 años de dedicarse a su propio negocio de elaboración de pan, pizzas y encurtidos. Después de estudiar ella aprendió a elaborar estos productos que ahora vende y los hace en su casa. Esta solicitando un préstamo por 15,000 Lempiras para comprar insumos como harina, huevos, manteca, levadura, vegetales etc., y elaborar sus productos de pan, pizzas  y encurtidos para vender, con esta inversión ella piensa crecer y obtener más ganancias con el negocio. Su meta es lograr tener un local en el centro de la ciudad para vender más.
texts.en: Keydi is 22 years old and lives with her husband and their two children in the city of Tocoa, Colon. For more than three years Keydi has dedicated herself to her business making bread, pizzas and pickles. After going to school, she learned how to make these products, which she now sells and makes out of her home. She is requesting a loan to purchase ingredients such as flour, eggs, lard, yeast, vegetables and other items to make her bread, pizza and pickle products to sell. With this investment, she plans to grow her business and earn more profits. Her goal is to have a central location in the city so she can sell more food.

loans.use: to purchase supplies like flour, eggs, lard, yeast, vegetables and other items to make her bread, pizza and pickle products to sell.

loans.name: Gloria Zulema

texts.es: Gloria, tiene 41 años de edad, casada, tiene dos hijos, vive con su esposo en el municipio de la Esperanza Intibucá. Ella tiene aproximadamente 18 años de dedicarse al comercio, tiene un puesto de venta en un mercado local, donde vende ropa y zapatos de todo tipo para damas, caballeros y niños. Ha mantenido estable económicamente su negocio mediante la inversión de varios préstamos. El préstamo que solicita es por 15,000 lempiras, el cual lo invertirá en la compra de mercadería principalmente uniformes escolares y calzado, ya que es la temporada escolar y necesita tener producto. Su meta es siempre seguir creciendo con el negocio.
texts.en: Gloria is 41 years old, married with two children and lives in the town of La Esperanza, Intibucá. She has dedicated herself to commerce for approximately 18 years. She has a sales post at the local market where she sells clothes and shoes of all kinds for men, women and children. She has maintained financial stability for her business by investing a number of loans. She is requesting this loan to purchase more merchandise, mainly school uniforms and footwear, since it is school season and these products are in need. Her goal is to always be growing her business.

loans.use: to purchase footwear and school clothes to sell this season.

loans.name: Trinidad

texts.es:
Don Trinidad tiene 60 años de edad, es casado y tiene 3 hijos y vive en una aldea que pertenece a la ciudad de Choloma, Cortes.
Don Trinidad se dedica a una actividad que es hacer lazos y hamacas de cabuya de nylon. Lleva muchos años realizando esta actividad. Este producto lo vende en el mercado local. Con los financiamientos que ODEF le ha proporcionado ha logrado mantener estable su negocio. Actualmente solicita el cuarto ciclo de préstamo el cual es por 21,000 lempiras, y lo utilizara para comprar materiales (cabuya) para elaborar lazos y hamacas para la venta.
Su meta es mejorar su negocio para que sus ingresos sean rentables y darle un mejor nivel de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Trinidad is 60 years old. He is married and has 3 children, and he lives in a village in the city of Choloma, Cortes.

Trinidad makes ropes and hammocks form nylon cord. He has been doing this work for many years. He sells this product in the local market. With the financing that ODEF has given him, he has succeeded in keeping his business stable. Currently he is asking for his fourth loan, which is for 21,000 lempiras, and which he will use to buy materials (cord) to make ropes and hammocks to sell.

His goal is to improve his business so that he will have a profitable income and give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy materials (nylon cord) to make ropes and hammocks to sell

loans.name: Dina Osiris

texts.es: Dina, tiene 31 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene dos hijos con quienes vive en el municipio de Choloma, Cortes. Ella trabajo por varios años en una maquila y luego de quedar sin empleo decidió poner una pulpería para la venta de productos alimenticios como granos básicos, carnes, refrescos, churros, pan, dulces, condimentos, verduras etc. El préstamo que solicita es por 7,000 lempiras y los utilizara en la compra de granos básicos, refrescos, jugos, manteca, azúcar, jabón, y productos enlatados. Con el propósito de aumentar las ventas. Su plan es poderles dar una mejor educación a sus hijos y tener mejor vida familiar.
texts.en: Dina is a 31 year old single mother who lives with her two children in the municipality of Choloma, Cortes. She worked for several years in a factory and after ending up unemployed she decided to open a grocery store to sell food products such as bulk grains, meat, soft drinks, churros, bread, sweets, condiments, vegetables, etc. The loan she's requesting is in the amount of 7,000 lempiras and she will use it to purchase bulk grains, soft drinks, juices, lard, sugar, soap, and canned goods with the objective of increasing sales. Her plan is to give her children a better education and a better life for her family.

loans.use: To purchase bulk grains, soft drinks, juices, lard, sugar, soap, and canned goods for sale

loans.name: Jose Alberto

texts.es: Don José, tiene 57 años de edad, esta soltero, tiene dos hijos con quienes vive en el municipio de Choloma, Cortes. Tiene muchos años de dedicarse al comercio, vende ropa como blusas, calcetines, ropa usada para damas y caballeros y también desodorantes. El negocio lo tiene en su casa. Ha solicitado varios prestamos para mantener su negocio, actualmente obtiene otro por 5,500 Lempiras para comprar ropa interior para damas y caballeros y vender. Su objetivo es obtener utilidades que le permitan tener un mejor nivel de vida.
texts.en:
Don José is 57 years old, single, and has two children. They live in the town of Choloma, Cortes.

José has been in the retail trade for many years. He sells clothing such as blouses, socks, and used garments for men and women. In addition, he sells deodorants. His business is located in his home.

José has requested several loans in order to maintain his business. He is currently acquiring another one in the amount of 5,500 HNL in order to buy undergarments for women and men that he can sell. His goal is to generate profit so that he can have a better standard of living.

loans.use: to buy undergarments to sell.

loans.name: Maria Apolonia

texts.es: María, tiene 25 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene dos hijos y vive en el municipio de Intibucá con sus hijos, hermana y sobrina. María siempre se ha dedicado a la agricultura, siembra papas, maíz y frijoles, esta producción la vende en el mercado de la zona y es su fuente de ingresos. El préstamo que solicita es el segundo ciclo y es por 7,000 Lempiras, con el cual va comprar abonos, semilla de papa, e insecticida, para siembra y asistencia al cultivo de papa de una parcela mas. Su plan es obtener mayores ganancias para su hogar.
texts.en:
María, 25, is a single mother with two children. She lives in the municipality of Intibucá with her children, her sister, and her niece. María has always worked in agriculture. She plants potatoes, corn, and beans. She then sells her harvested crops in the local market, which is her source of income. 

She has applied for a second loan of 7,000 Honduran lempiras. She will use this loan to buy fertilizer, potato seeds, and insecticide to plant and maintain one more plot of potato crops. Her plan is to earn a higher income for her household.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, potato seeds, and insecticide to plant and maintain her crops.

loans.name: Lourdes Natalia

texts.es: Lourdes, tiene 30 años de edad, es madre soltera, vive en el municipio de Victoria, Yoro, junto a su hija y sus padres. Tiene mas de dos años de tener su propio negocio de pulpería donde vende churros, papel higiénico, lácteos, refrescos, carnes, productos enlatados, verduras, pan, azúcar, manteca y otros de la canasta básica. El préstamo es por 20,000 Lempiras y lo invertirá en la compra de clavos, tornillos, tubos PVC y otros productos de ferretería, también va comprar sandalias, botas y zapatos de hule, con el objetivo de ampliar la variedad de productos para aumentar las ventas. Su meta es crecer como microempresaria y darle una mejor vida a su hija y hacer crecer el negocio.
texts.en:
Lourdes is 30 years old, is a single mother, and lives in the municipality of Victoria, Yoro, with her daughter and her parents. She has had her own grocery store business for more than two years where she sells churros, toilet paper, dairy products, fruit drinks, meat, canned goods, vegetables, bread, sugar, butter and other basic food items. 

The loan is for 20,000 Honduran lempiras and she will invest it in buying nails, screws, PVC tubes and other hardware products. She is also going to buy sandals, boots and rubber shoes with the objective of expanding the variety of products in order to increase her sales. Her goals are to grow as a small business, to give her daughter a better life and to make the business grow.

loans.use: to buy nails, screws, PVC tubes and other hardware products, and to buy sandals, boots and rubber shoes with the objective of expanding the variety of products to sell

loans.name: Arcadio

texts.es: Don Arcadio, tiene 53 años de edad,  esta soltero, tiene dos hijos, con quienes vive en una aldea del municipio de Gracias, Lempira. Siempre se ha dedicado a la agricultura al cultivo de granos básicos maíz, frijoles y café.  Esta producción la vende en los mercados locales. Lleva tres ciclos de préstamos con el actual que es por 4,500 Lempiras, que invertirá en la compra de fertilizantes para asistir los cultivos de café, maíz y frijol. Con el fin de sacar buenas cosechas. Su meta es seguir creciendo con el negocio y poder ayudar a sus hijos con la educación.
texts.en: Arcadio is 53 years old.  He is single and lives with his two children in a village in the town of Gracias in the Lempira district.  He has always been engaged in farming, cultivating basic grains, corn, beans, and coffee.  He sells his production at the local markets.  He is in his third cycle and the current loan is for 4,500 Lempiras, which he will invest in fertilizers to maintain his coffee, corn, and bean crops and get good harvests.  His goal is to continue growing his business and be able to help his children with their education.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers to maintain coffee, corn, and bean crops.

loans.name: Mario

texts.es: Mario, de 49 años de edad, es casado, tiene un hijo y reside en una aldea que pertenece a Peña Blanca, Santa Cruz. El tiene su propia actividad agrícola, produce banano y café desde hace varios años. de esta actividad saca ingresos para el sustento diario de su familia. Vende banano y el café en el mercado local de la zona. El préstamo que ha solicitado es por 15,000 Lempiras y los va invertir en la compra de semillas de plátano, y fertilizantes para asistir bien el cultivo. Su plan es mejorar los cultivos y las cosechas para darle  mejor condicion de vida a su familia.
texts.en: Mario, 49 years old, is married. He has one son and lives in a village in Peña Blanca, Santa Cruz. He does his own farming work. He has produced banana trees and coffee for several years. He receives an income from this work for the day-to-day support of his family. He sells banana trees and the coffee in the area's local market. The loan he has requested is for 15,000 lempiras and he is going to use it to buy banana seeds and fertilizer in order to properly care for the crops. His plan is to improve the crops and harvests in order to give his family better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy banana seeds and fertilizer for his crops

loans.name: Damaris

texts.es: Damaris, tiene 31 años de edad, esta casada, vive con su esposo en una aldea de Nueva Frontera, Santa Bárbara. Anteriormente ella tenia una pulpería y hace 8 años que se ha dedicado a cultivar granos básicos como maíz, frijoles y café, estos productos los vende en la zona donde vive. El préstamo es por 17,000 lempiras y los invertirá en la compra de fertilizantes y en limpieza de la finca de café, para darle buen mantenimiento y sacar mejores cosechas. Tiene como meta la compra de 1/2 manzana de terreno para la siembra de café.
texts.en:
Damaris is 31 years old and married.  She lives with her husband in the village of Nueva Frontera, Santa Bárbara.  Previously, she had a convenience store.  

For eight years now she has worked growing basic staples such as corn, beans, and coffee.  She sells these products in the area where she lives.  Her loan is for 17,000 lempiras.  She will invest it in the purchase of fertilizers and in cleaning her coffee field, to keep it maintained and get better harvests.  Her goal is to buy half a “manzana” [a manzana = about 1.7 acres] to sow coffee.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and to clean up her coffee farm.

loans.name: Maria Altagracia

texts.es: María, tiene 50 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene 4 hijos, reside con dos hijas y un nieto en una aldea del municipio de San Marcos Caiquin, Lempira. Siempre se ha dedicado a la agricultura cultivando maíz, frijoles y café, el cual lo vende en el mercado local. El préstamo que solicita es el segundo ciclo y es por 20,000 Lempiras el cual va invertir en la compra de abonos y pago de mano de obra para fertilizar y sembrar mas plantas de café, para aumentar la cosecha y las ganancias. Su  plan es ampliar el cultivo para darle calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
María is 50 years old and a single mother. She has four children and lives with two daughters and a grandson in a village of the San Marcos Caiquin municipality in Lempira. She has always worked in agriculture, growing corn, beans, and coffee, which she sells in the local market.

The loan she is requesting is her second loan cycle, and it is for 20,000 HNL, which she will invest in buying compost and in hiring help to fertilize and sow more coffee plants, so as to increase her harvest and her profits. Her plan is to increase her crop to give quality of life to her family.

loans.use: to buy compost and hire help to fertilize and to sow more coffee

loans.name: Reyna Leticia

texts.es: Reyna, tiene 41 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene 3 hijos y vive en el municipio de Gracias, Lempira. Hace 5 años que Reyna decidió establecer su propio negocio donde vende blusas, camisas, pantalones, bóxer y ropa de niños nueva y usada, además vende accesorios como colas, ganchos para cabello, billeteras, collares etc. Ha decidido solicitar un préstamo por 20,000 lempiras para comprar mas mercadería como ropa, nueva y usada y variedades para la venta, considerando que va obtener mejores ingresos y mejor nivel de vida.
texts.en:
Reyna, 41, is a single mother with three children. She lives in the municipality of Gracias, Lempira. Five years ago, Reyna decided to start her own business selling blouses, shirts, pants, boxers, and new and used children's clothing. She also sells accessories such as hair clips, wallets, necklaces, etc. 

She has decided to apply for a loan of 20,000 Honduran lempiras to buy more merchandise, such as new and used clothing and an assortment of items for sale. She will then earn a higher income and have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise, such as new and used clothing and an assortment of items for sale.

loans.name: Victorina

texts.es: Doña Victorina, tiene 49 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene 2 hijos y vive en una aldea de Gracias, Lempira. Hace varios años que realiza su propia actividad de negocio, vende cosméticos, champú, cremas, lociones, desodorantes mediante catalogo de productos AVON y ARABELLA, y también vende ropa como camisas, camisetas, pantalones y otros que le pidan sus clientes. Las ventas las realiza de manera ambulante, por pedidos y entrega a domicilio. Este préstamo es el cuarto ciclo con ODEF y es por 4,000 Lempiras, con el cual va comprar más producto que le han pedido sus clientes como ser cosméticos, ropa, lociones y otros. Asi podra mejorar sus ventas y sus ingresos. Su plan es mantener en crecimiento su negocio y que sus hijos estudien y se superen y también piensa en lograr tener un local donde poner su negocio fijo.
texts.en:
Victorina is 49-years-old and is a single mother of two. She lives in a community of Gracias, Lempira. Several years ago she started her own business. She sells cosmetics, shampoo, creams, lotions, and deodorants through the Avon and Arabella catalogs.She also sells clothing including shirts, t-shirts, pants and other items that her customers request. She makes her sales on foot by taking order and delivering the products to customers' homes. 

This loan is her fourth with ODEF and is for 4,000 lempiras. With this loan she will buy more products that her customers have requested including cosmetics, clothing, and lotions. In this way she will be able to improve her sales and her earnings. Her plan is to maintain her business' growth so that her children can go to school, and get ahead in life. She also hopes to have her own locale where she can establish her business.

loans.use: to buy products like lotions, cosmetics, and clothing to sell so she can fill her orders.

loans.name: Julia Aracely

texts.es: Doña Julia, tiene 52 años de edad, es madre soltera, vive con su hijo en el municipio de Tocoa, Colon. Por varios años se desempeño como enfermera auxiliar y hace 3 años decidió por su propio negocio donde elabora y vende aretes, cadenas, pulseras, anillos, collares y todo en bisutería. Estos productos que elabora los vende de forma ambulante y por pedidos. Ha solicitado un préstamo por 18,000 Lempiras para comprar mas insumos como piedras, hilos, collares, aretes para elaborar y vender bisutería, ella considera que el préstamo le ayudara a incrementar el inventario y los ingresos. Su plan es seguir trabajando para que su hijo tenga una mejor vida y que pueda administrar el negocio.
texts.en: Julia is 52 years old and a single mother. She lives with her son in the Tocoa municipality of Colon. Julia worked as an auxiliary nurse for a number of years and, three years ago, she decided to start her own business making and selling earrings, chains, bracelets, rings, necklaces and all kinds of jewellery. Julia makes this products and then sells them as a street vendor or on order. She has applied for a loan of 18,000 Lempira is order to buy more supplies such as stones, threads, necklaces and earrings in order to make and sell jewellery. Julia believes that this loan will help her to increase her stock and her income. Her plan is to continue working so that her son can have a better life and manage the business.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as stones, threads, necklaces and earrings in order to make and sell jewellery.

loans.name: Hilda Marilu

texts.es: Hilda, tiene 29 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene un hijo y vive con sus hermanos en Gracias, Lempira. Hace 6 años que ella decidió cultivar Maíz, frijoles y café,  el cual vende en grano en la misma zona. El préstamo que solicita es por 12,000 Lempiras, con el cual va comprar fertilizantes y abonos para dar asistencia a  media manzana de café y así ampliar la producción y sus ingresos. Su meta es mejorar el nivel de vida de la familia y darle educación a su hijo.
texts.en:
Hilda is 29 years old. She is a single mother of one son and lives with her siblings in Gracias, Lempira. Six years ago, she decided to cultivate corn, beans, and coffee, which she sells in the same area.

The loan that she is requesting is for 12,000 lempiras and she will purchase fertilizer and manure to help her 3,500-square meter plot of coffee plants. This way, she will increase her production and her income. 

Her goal is to improve her family's quality of life and provide her son with an education.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and manure to help her 3,500-square meter plot of coffee plants.

loans.name: Isabel Reina

texts.es: Doña Isabel tiene 51 años de edad, es casada, tiene 3 hijos y vive en el municipio de Azacualpa, Santa, Bárbara. Ella siempre se ha dedicado al comercio, hace dos años vende ropa, camisas, pantalones, blusas etc. esta actividad la realiza de manera ambulante y por encargos. Doña Isabel a solicitado varios prestamos para mantener su negocio como la fuente de ingresos, actualmente solicita otro por 9,000 Lempiras para surtir de productos para la venta como ser ropa para damas, caballeros y niños y otros productos que le piden. su propósito es hacer crecer el negocio para poder darles mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Doña Isabel is 51 years old, married, and has three children. She lives in the town of Azacualpa, Santa Bárbara. Isabel has always worked in the retail sector. For the past two years, she has been selling clothes such as shirts, trousers, blouses, and other items. She conducts her business as a street vendor and by taking orders.

Doña Isabel has requested several loans in order to maintain her business as a source of income. She is currently requesting another loan in the amount of 9,000 HNL so that she can restock her inventory of products, which includes clothing for women, men, and children, as well as other products that are requested.

Her goal is to grow her business so that she can provide a better quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to buy clothing to sell.

loans.name: Ana Marleni

texts.es: Ana, tiene 24 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposo, con quien tiene un hijo y reside en el municipio de Tocoa, Colon. Desde hace 3 años se dedica  a la venta de ropa nueva y usada, lociones, cremas, zapatos, bolsos y ropa de cama. Su negocio lo realiza de manera ambulante y por encargos. El préstamo que ha solicitado es por 20,000 lempiras y lo invertirá en la compra de mas producto como ser ropa usada y nueva, lociones, cosméticos, zapatos y otra mercadería, para poder ofrecer variedad de productos y aumentar las ventas. Su plan es mantener a su clientela fija y establecerse en el mercado y así poder ayudar económicamente a su familia.
texts.en:
Ana is 24 years old and is part of a civil union, from which she has one son. She lives in the municipality of Tocoa, Colón. She has been selling new and used clothing, lotions, creams, shoes, purses, and bedding for the past three years. She carries out her business both by taking orders and making sales on foot. 

The loan she is requesting is for 20,000 lempiras which will be invested in the purchase of more products including used and new clothing, lotions, cosmetics, shoes, and other merchandise, so that she can offer a greater variety of products and increase her sales. Her plan is to maintain her loyal customers and establish herself in the market so that she can help her family economically.

loans.use: to buy used and new clothing, lotions, cosmetics, shoes, and other merchandise so that she can offer a greater variety of products and increase her sales.

loans.name: Rosmery Yamileth

texts.es: Rosmery, tiene 43 años de edad, esta casada, tiene cinco hijos y vive en el municipio de Morazán, Yoro. Ella siempre a tenido su propio negocio, anteriormente tenia pulpería y hace 5 años decidió por la venta de mercadería como ropa calzado, cosméticos y utensilios para el hogar. Ha solicitado el tercer ciclo de préstamo para seguir invirtiendo en el negocio, este es por 10,000 Lempiras y los invertirá en la compra de ropa, cosméticos y artículos para el hogar. Su plan es crecer con el negocio y aumentar las ventas.
texts.en: Rosmery is 43 years old, married, has five children, and lives in the municipality of Morazán in Yoro. Rosmery has always run her owns businesses. Previously she had a grocery store but, five years ago, she decided to start selling merchandise such as clothes, footwear, cosmetics and home utensils. Rosmery has applied for her third loan cycle in order to continue investing in her business. This loan is for 10,000 Lempira and will be invested in buying clothes, cosmetics and items for the home. Rosmery's plan is to expand her business and increase sales.

loans.use: to buy clothes, cosmetics and items for the home to sell.

loans.name: Las Quebradas 2 Group

texts.es:
Don Emilio, tiene 64 años de edad, esta casado, es padre de 10 hijos, vive con su esposa, 3 de sus hijos y un nieto en una aldea de Yamaranguila, Intibucá. Toda su vida la ha dedicado a la agricultura de granos básicos. El cultiva papas en forma grupal y en forma individual cultiva hortalizas como remolacha, coliflor y brócoli, esta producción la venden en el mercado local. Don Emilio ha solicitado otro préstamo que es el noveno ciclo y es por 22,500 Lempiras en forma individual, con el cual va comprar semillas de papas, abonos, insecticidas y pago de mano de obra para darle asistencia técnica a los cultivos, con el fin de mejorar la producción y los ingresos. Su meta es ampliar el área de producción de manera tecnificada para sacar mejores cosechas.
El grupo se llama Las Quebradas 2 y esta integrado por 7 miembros, de los cuales 5 han decidido solicitar otro préstamo de 22,500 cada uno haciendo un total grupal por 112,500 Lempiras para comprar abonos, insecticidas y mejorar la producción de papas, todos viven en la misma comunidad. En la foto se identifican así: a la izquierda al frente esta Luis y Emilio a la derecha, atrás,  a la izquierda esta Pio, Calixto y Tomas a la derecha.
texts.en:
Emilio is 64 years old, married and the father of 10 children. He lives with his wife, 3 of their children and a grandson in a small town of Yamaranguila, Intibucá. His whole life he has made his living farming staple foods. He grows potatoes as part of a group, and individually he grows vegetables such as beets, cauliflower and broccoli. They sell the produce in the local market.

Emilio has applied for another loan, which is his ninth and is for 22,500 Lempiras for an individual loan. With this he is going to buy potato seeds, compost and insecticides, and pay for labor to provide technical support for his crops, with the aim of improving his production and income. His goal is to expand his area of production in a systematic way in order to get better harvests.

The group is called Las Quebradas 2, and is made up of 7 members, 5 of whom have decided to apply for another loan of 22,500 each, for a group total of 112,500 Lempiras to buy compost and insecticides, and to improve their potato production. They all live in the same community.

In the photo they are: front left - Luis, and Emilio to the right. Back, at left - Pio, Calixto, and Tomas to the right.

loans.use: to buy potato seeds, compost and insecticides, and to pay for labor to provide technical support for the crops.

loans.name: Unidos Venceremos Group

texts.es:
Carlos, tiene 38 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposa con quien tiene dos hijos y vive en el municipio de Tela, Atlántida. Siempre trabajó en la agricultura y hace un año 8 meses se dedica a la compra y venta de cerdos para destazo y venta de carne. Este negocio lo tiene en su casa. Ha solicitado un segundo ciclo de préstamo el cual es por 9,000 Lempiras en forma grupal, con este va comprar mas cerdos para el destazo y venta de carne. Su plan es crecer con el negocio y poderse estabilizar económicamente. 
El grupo se llama Unidos Venceremos y esta integrado por 4 miembros quienes han solicitado 9,000 Lempiras cada uno haciendo un total de 36,000 lempiras para comprar cerdos y mercadería para la venta, todos viven en la misma comunidad y se dedican a la venta de carnes y mercadería. En la foto se identifican así: a la izquierda esta Miguel, luego Marvin, María y Carlos que esta a la derecha.
texts.en:
Carlos is 38 years old and lives common-law with his wife. They have two sons and live in the municipality of Tela, Atlántida. He has always worked in agriculture and 8 months ago he started buying and selling pigs to butcher them and sell the meat. He does this business from his house. This is his second loan cycle and it is for 9,000 HNL as one member of a group. He will use this money to buy more pigs to butcher and sell the meat. His plan is to expand his business and stabilize his finances. 

The group is called "Unidos Venceremos" and is made up of 4 members who have requested 9,000 HNL each, making a total of 36,000 HNL to buy pigs and merchandise for sale. They all live in the same community and work at selling pigs and merchandise. In the photo we see, from the left: Miguel, then Marvin, María and Carlos who is on the right.

loans.use: to buy pigs to butcher and sell.

loans.name: Maria Isabel

texts.es: Doña María, tiene 58 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene 4 hijos, vive en el municipio de Choloma, Cortes. desde hace 15 años se dedica a la elaboración y venta de tortillas de maíz. Es una señora muy emprendedora. Esta pequeña actividad la realiza en su casa. Ha solicitado el noveno ciclo que es por 25,000 lempiras con el cual va comprar harina de maíz y leña para elaborar y vender tortillas. Su objetivo es aumentar las ventas y ayudar a sus hijos.
texts.en:
María, who is 58 years old, is a single mother and has 4 children. She lives in the town of Choloma, Cortes. For 15 years she has earned a living making and selling corn tortillas. She is a very enterprising woman and runs this small business in her home. 

She has asked for her ninth loan, for 25,000 lempiras, and will use it to buy cornflour and firewood for making and selling tortillas. Her goal is to increase her sales and help her children.

loans.use: to buy cornflour and firewood for making and selling tortillas.

loans.name: Nelvi Margot

texts.es: Nelvi, tiene 40 años de edad, es casada, tiene 3 hijos, vive con sus hijas en el municipio de Choloma, Cortes. Siempre se ha dedicado al comercio, anteriormente vendía comidas y pan. Hace 18 años vende ropa nueva y usada, calzado, artículos para el hogar, cameras, cortinas etc. El préstamo es de 10,000 Lempiras para comprar lociones, achinería, producto de enchape como aretes, cadenas, pulseras etc. Así podrá ofrecer otros productos e incrementar las ventas. Su meta es tener el negocio mas grande y viajar a comprar mercadería y vender.
texts.en:
Nelvi, age 40, is married and has three children.  She lives with her daughters in the Choloma municipality in Cortes.  She has always devoted herself to commerce.  She previously sold food and bread.  For 18 years she has been selling new and used clothes, shoes, household items, cameras, and curtains, etc.

The 10,000 lempiras loan is to buy lotions; low cost consumer goods; and plated jewelry like earrings, necklaces, and bracelets, etc.  This way she will be able to offer these products and increase sales.  Her goal is to have a bigger business and to travel to purchase merchandise to sell.

loans.use: to buy lotions; low cost consumer goods; and plated jewelry like earrings, necklaces, and bracelets, etc.

loans.name: Janice Marleny

texts.es: Janice, tiene  30 años de edad, esta casada, tiene  3 hijos,  vive en el municipio de Morazán Yoro.  Ella tiene su propio  negocio de pulpería  donde vende productos alimenticios como arroz, azúcar, manteca, frijoles, productos de limpieza. Este negocio lo tiene desde hace 6 años en su casa, como su fuente de ingresos.  Anteriormente dependía solo de su esposo quien le enviaba remesas, ahora obtiene sus propios ingresos. Este préstamo es el tercer ciclo y es por 25,000 Lempiras para comprar azúcar, sal, manteca, frijoles, arroz, churros, verduras, refrescos, carnes, productos de limpieza, etc. Y le ayudara a incrementar su inventario. Este mismo le ayudara a incrementar las ventas. Tiene como meta apoyar siempre a su familia y darles a sus hijos una buena educación.
texts.en:
Janice is 30 years old, married and has three children.  She lives in the Morazán Yoro municipality.  She has her own grocery store where she sells food products like rice, sugar, lard, beans and cleaning products.  She has had this business in her house as a source of income for the past six years.  Previously, she depended only on her husband who sent her remittances, but now she earns her own income.

This loan is her third, and it is for 25,000 Lempiras.  It will be used to purchase sugar, salt, lard, beans, rice, churros, vegetables, beverages, meat, cleaning products, etc.  It will help her to increase her inventory, allowing her to increase her sales.  Her goal is to always support her family and provide her children with a good education.

loans.use: purchase sugar, salt, lard, vegetables, beans, rice, churros, beverages, meat, cleaning products, etc.

loans.name: Martha Julia

texts.es: Martha, tiene 36 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposo, con quien tiene dos hijos, vive en el municipio de Morazán, Yoro. Siempre se ha dedicado al comercio hace 7 años se dedica a la venta de ropa como pantalones, camisas, ropa intima, ropa de cama, cortinas, forros de muebles etc. La venta la realiza de manera ambulante.Ella ha mantenido el negocio mediante varios prestamos, actualmente solicita otro por 2,000 lempiras para surtir de pantalones, ropa intima y forros de cama. Con esta inversión considera satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes. Su plan a futuro es que  sus hijos puedan terminar sus estudios y también terminar su casa.
texts.en: Martha is 36 years old and lives common-law with her husband. They have two children and live in the municipality of Morazán, Yoro. She has been in business for 7 years, selling clothing like pants, underwear, bed clothing, curtains, coverings for furniture, etc. She does her selling door-to-door. She has had various loans to keep her business going and now she is requesting a loan of 2,000 HNL to buy pants, underwear and bed covers. This loan will satisfy the demand from her customers. Her plan for the future is for her children to complete their studies and to finish building their house.

loans.use: to stock her business with pants, underwear and bed covers.

loans.name: Gloria Arasely

texts.es: Gloria,  tiene  35 años de edad, esta casada, tiene 2 hijos  y vive en el municipio de Choloma, Cortes.  Se dedica a la confección de prendas de vestir como camisas, pantalones y uniformes para toda ocasión. Este negocio lo tiene hace 7 años  en su casa.  Ella adquirió experiencia en una maquila y al quedar sin empleo decidió establecer su propio negocio. Solicita un préstamo por 7,000 lempiras para la reparación de dos maquinas de costura que tiene en mal estado y así podrá aumentar la producción. Tiene como meta tener un taller grande y sacar adelante a su familia.
texts.en: Gloria is 35 years old, married, has two kids, and lives in the town of Choloma, Cortes. She works making garments like shirts, pants, and uniforms for all occasions. She has had this business for 7 years in her house. She acquired experience in a factory, and being left with out a job, she decided to establish her own business. She requests a loan for 7,000 lempiras to repair two sewing machines that are in disrepair and be able to increase her production. She has as a goal to have a larger shop and move forward with her family.

loans.use: to buy replacement parts to repair two sewing machines.

loans.name: Moises Alfredo

texts.es: Moisés, tiene 42 años de edad, es casado, tiene  2 hijos,  vive en el municipio de Puerto Cortes.  El trabajo por varios años en una maquila y cuando quedo sin empleo pudo establecer su propio negocio de una pulpería donde vende productos de la canasta básica como arroz, azúcar, manteca, refrescos, carnes, churros, pan, huevos, condimentos etc. Este negocio lo tiene hace 8 años en su casa. El préstamo es por 6,000 lempiras y lo invertirá en la compra de productos para surtir la pulpería como es granos básicos, manteca, refrescos, churros, pan, azúcar etc. para aumentar las ventas. Su meta es mantener surtida la pulpería y obtener mejores ingresos para salir adelante con la familia.
texts.en:
Moisés is 42 years old, married, has two children, and lives in the city of Puerto Cortes.  For many years, he worked at an assembly plant, but when he lost his job he was able to open his own grocery store where he sells basic food products like rice, sugar, lard, beverages, meat, churros, bread, eggs, condiments, etc...  He has had this business for the past eight years in his home.

The loan of 6,000 Lempiras will be invested in the purchase of products to stock his grocery store like basic grains, lard, beverages, churros, bread, sugar, etc., to increase his sales.  His goal is to keep his store well stocked and increase his earnings so that his family can get ahead.

loans.use: purchase products to stock his grocery store such as: basic grains, lard, refreshments, churros, bread, sugar, etc... to increase his sales.

loans.name: Amilcar

texts.es: Amílcar, tiene 43 años de edad, esta  soltero, vive en la comunidad de Victoria, Yoro junto a sus padres. Este señor se dedica a la producción de maíz desde hace 16 años y cultiva en tierras agrícolas cerca a la comunidad. El préstamo es por 12,000 Lempiras siendo el sexto ciclo con la institución, el cual lo invertirá en pago de mano de obra, compra de insumos para fertilizar  el cultivo de maíz y  darle una mejor asistencia. Tiene como meta ampliar la producción y mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en: Amílcar is 43 years old. He is single and lives in the community of Victoria with his parents. This man has grown corn for the past 16 years on land close to his community. The loan is for 12,000 HNL, this being his 6th cycle with the institution. He will use it to invest in paying for labor and buying agricultural inputs to grow corn and maintain it. His goal is to expand his production and improve his living conditions.

loans.use: to pay for labor and buy agricultural inputs for his corn crops.

loans.name: Congolon Group

texts.es:
Doña María Fernanda, tiene 33 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposo con quien tiene 6 hijos, reside en una aldea de Gracias, Lempira. Toda su vida la ha dedicado a la agricultura de granos básicos maíz y frijol, hace 12 años decidió cultivar café el cual vende en la zoca local. El préstamo que solicita es por 5,000 Lempiras en forma grupal, y lo invertirá en la compra de fertilizantes y en limpieza de la finca de café. Su plan es mejorar la cosecha de café para utilizar las ganancias en mejorar su vivienda para que su familia viva mejor.
El grupo a que pertenece se llama Congolon que esta formado por 9 integrantes, que viven en la misma comunidad, se dedican a la agricultura y han solicitado 5,000 Lempiras cada uno haciendo un total de 45,000 Lempiras para fertilizar y limpiar su finca de café. En la foto se identifican así: a la izquierda esta Aquilino, Melquiades, María Rosario, Marilú, Juan, María Juana, José, María Fernanda y María a la derecha.
texts.en:
María Fernanda is 33 years old and lives with her husband, with whom she has six children. María lives in a village in Gracias, in Lempira. She has spent all of her life working in farming, growing basic grains and beans. Twelve years ago she decided to plant coffee, which she sells in the local area. María is applying for a loan of 5000 Lempira as part of a group loan. She will invest it in buying fertilisers and to clean her coffee farm. María's plan is to improve her coffee harvest in order to use the profits to improve her home so that her family can have a better life.

María is part of the "Congolon" group. It has nine members who all live in the same community. They all work in farming and each has applied for 5000 Lempira, giving a total of 45,000 Lempira. All of the members of the group will use their loans to buy fertilisers and to clean their coffee farms In the photo, from left to right, we can see Aquilino, Melquiades, María Rosario, Marilú, Juan, María Juana, José, María Fernanda and, on the far right, María.

loans.use: to buy invest in buying fertilisers and to clean her coffee farm.

loans.name: Colineñas S.b. Group

texts.es:
Iris, tiene 38 años de edad, esta casada, tiene 3 hijos, vive en San José de Colinas, Santa Bárbara junto a sus dos hijos menores. Tiene varios años de dedicarse al negocio de pulpería donde vende productos alimenticios como azúcar, arroz, manteca, verduras, refrescos, churros, pan, jugos, productos enlatados etc. Lleva 10 ciclos de prestamos con el actual que es por 10,000 lempiras, con el cual va surtir el negocio de productos alimenticios como granos básicos y verduras, su plan es crecer con el negocio para darle manutención necesaria a sus hijos.
El grupo se llama Colineñas S.B. esta formado por 3 mujeres, que viven en la misma comunidad, se dedican al comercio de pulpería y mercadería. El total del préstamo grupal es por 26,000 Lempiras y lo invertirán en sus negocios para la venta. En la foto se encuentra Iris a la Izquierda, Bessy y doña Gloria de falda blanca a la derecha.
texts.en:
Iris, 38, is married and has three children.  She lives in San José de Colinas in Santa Bárbara with her two minor children.  For several years she has been in the grocery business selling goods such as sugar, rice, shortening, vegetables, soft drinks, doughnuts, brad, juices, canned goods, etc.  She has taken out ten loans, including this one for 10,000 HNL which she will use to buy food products such as basic grains and vegetables.  Her plan is to expand her business to give her children the support they need.

The communal bank group is called Colineñas S.B. and is comprised of three women who live in the same community.  They are involved in grocery and merchandise sales.  The group loan is for a total 26,000 HNL to be invested in their businesses for sales.  In the photograph, from left to right, are Iris, Bessy, and Gloria.

loans.use: To buy basic grains and vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Brisas Del Higo Group

texts.es:
Don José, tiene 53 años de edad, esta casado, tiene dos hijos, vive en el municipio de San Nicolás, Santa Bárbara junto a uno de sus hijos. Don José anteriormente solo se dedicaba a la albañilería, pero hace 6 años decidió por dedicarse al cultivo de café, el cual vende en estado pergamino a los intermediarios de la zona. El ha solicitado un tercer ciclo de préstamo que es por 20,000 lempiras, para comprar fertilizantes y dar mejor mantenimiento al cultivo de café. Su propósito es cultivar otra parcela para aumentar la producción y mejorar la calidad de vida. 
El préstamo es en forma grupal, el grupo se llama Brisas del Higo, esta formado por dos miembros, en la foto esta don José de camisa azul a la izquierda y don Delmy de camiseta azul con gorra al lado derecho. Ellos solicitan un monto total por 35,000 lempiras para fertilizar su finca de café. los dos viven en la misma comunidad.
texts.en:
José is 53 years old, is married and has two children. He lives in the municipality of Sn Nicolás, in Santa Bárbara, with one of his sons. José previously worked only in building but six years ago he decided to start growing coffee, a product which he sells - with the husks still on - to local agents. José has applied for a third loan, this time for 20,000 Lempira, in order to buy fertilisers and support his coffee crops. José's plan is to grow more on another plot of land in order to increase production and improve his quality of life.

This is a group loan for the "Brisas del Higo" group. There are two members. In the photo, José is on the left, wearing a light blue shirt. Delmy, on the right has a dark blue shirt and a hat. The group is applying for a total of 35,000 Lempira in ordering to put down fertiliser in their coffee farm. The two group members live in the same community.

loans.use: to buy fertilisers for growing coffee.

loans.name: La Playa Group

texts.es:
Avacu, tiene 33 años de edad,  vive en unión libre con su esposa, tiene dos hijos y vive en una aldea del municipio de Concepción del Sur, Santa Bárbara. Siempre se ha dedicado a la agricultura cultivando maíz, frijoles y hortalizas. Hace 15 años decidió cultivar café, el cual vende en el mercado de la zona. el préstamo que solicita es el segundo ciclo y es por 11,500 lempiras en forma grupal, el cual lo invertirá en la compra de fertilizantes y en preparar el terreno para cultivar café. su plan es poder mejorar las cosechas para darle mejor vida a sus hijos y su familia. 
El grupo se llama La Playa y lo integran dos personas que se dedican al cultivo de café, viven en la misma comunidad, y el monto total del préstamo es por 18,500 para dar mantenimiento al cultivo de café. En la foto esta Joel de camiseta azul a la izquierda y Avacu de camisa gris a la derecha.
texts.en:
Avacu is 33 years old. He lives in free union with his wife and two children in a village in the township of Concepción del Sur, Santa Barbara. He has always worked in agriculture, growing corn, beans, and vegetables. Fifteen years ago he decided to grow coffee, which he sells in the area market. The loan that he is applying for is his second one, and it is for 11,500 lempiras as part of a group loan. He will invest it in the purchase of fertilizers and in preparing the land to grow coffee. His plan is to improve his harvests to give a better life to his children and his family.

The group is called "La Playa," and it is formed by two people who grow coffee. They live in the same community, and the total of the loan is 18,500 lempiras to maintain the coffee plantings. In the photo, Joel is on the left wearing a blue shirt, and Avacu is in the gray shirt on the right.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and prepare the land to grow coffee.

loans.name: Lesly

texts.es: Lesly, es madre soltera, tiene  2 hijos, con quienes  vive en el municipio Morazán, Yoro. Ella se dedica a la ganadería (producción de leche) este negocio lo tiene hace 20 años, siempre se ha dedicado a la ganadería y a la agricultura. La producción de leche la vende en su casa. El préstamo que solicita es por 21,000 lempiras y lo va invertir en la compra de dos vacas lecheras, para aumentar la producción diaria y cubrir la demanda.  Tiene como plan aumentar más  sus ganancias producir más leche y darle mejor vida a su familia.
texts.en: Lesly is a single mother of two. She lives with her children in the municipality of Morazán, Yoro. She works in livestock (milk production), and has had this business for 20 years. She has always worked in livestock and agriculture. She sells the milk from her home. She is requesting a loan of 21,000 lempiras to invest in the purchase of two dairy cows to increase her daily production and cover demand. She plans to increase her income even more, produce more milk, and give her family a better life.

loans.use: to buy two dairy cows to increase her daily milk production.

loans.name: Maria Inez

texts.es: María, tiene  46 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene 3 hijos y vive en el municipio de Morazán, Yoro. Ella  tiene 6 años de haber iniciado su propio negocio de venta de ropa como pantalones, camisas, blusas, forros de cama etc. Esta mercadería la vende de manera ambulante y por encargos. Ha solicitado varios préstamos para invertir al negocio. El que solicita actualmente es por 2,000 lempiras para comprar ropa como pantalones, camisas, blusas y forros de cama para vender y generar sus ingresos. Su plan es tener siempre el negocio y ayudar a sus hijos con la educación y a futuro piensa comprar un terreno.
texts.en: María, age 46, is a single mother of three children, and she lives in the city of Morazán, Yoro. She started her business 6 years ago selling clothing such as pants, shirts, blouses, and even bedclothes. She conducts her business both from door-to-door and also by custom order. She has requested various loans to invest in her business. The current request is for 2,000 lempiras, which she will use to purchase more items (including pants, shirts, blouses and bed covers) to sell and earn money. Her plan is to always operate her business to help her children with their education. In the future she is considering purchasing land.

loans.use: purchase clothing for resale

loans.name: Ana Celeny

texts.es: Ana, tiene 23  años de edad, vive en  unión libre, tiene 1 hijo,  vive en la comunidad de Olanchito, Yoro.  Hace 2 años ella decidió por tener su propio negocio de venta de jugo de naranja, pasteles y pan.  Anteriormente trabajo en una empresa privada. El negocio lo tiene en un local del mercado donde alquila.  Este préstamo es por 15,000 lempiras y lo invertirá en la compra de naranjas para jugos, pan y pasteles para vender, este préstamo le permitirá tener mayor variedad de productos. Su meta es hacer crecer  el negocio y salir adelante con su familia.
texts.en: Ana is 23 years old and has a partner. She has one son and lives in the Olanchito community in Yoro. Two years ago Ana decided to start her own business selling orange juice, cakes and bread. Ana previously worked for another business. Ana's business is located at a market stall, which she rents. This loan is for 15,000 Lempira and will buy used to buy oranges - to make juice -, and bread and cakes to sell. This loan will allow Ana to offer a greater variety of products. Ana's goal is to expand her business and prosper with her family.

loans.use: to buy juices, bread and cakes to sell.

loans.name: La Colonia 19 Group

texts.es: Ángela, tiene 50 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene 3 hijos, vive en el municipio de Yoro, Yoro. Ella inicio generando sus propios ingresos vendiendo pan y hace 7 años decidió vender ropa, zapatos y sandalias. Esta actividad la realiza en su casa y por encargos. Ella ha decidido solicitar un préstamo por 6,000 Lempiras para comprar mercadería en ropa, cosméticos y calzado para vender. Tiene como meta hacer crecer el negocio y sacar  adelante a su familia. El préstamo es en forma grupal por 24,000 Lempiras, que lo utilizaran para surtir de mercadería para vender. El grupo se denomina La Colonia 19, que esta formado por 4 mujeres tal como aparece en la foto a la izquierda esta Alba, Mirna, María y Ángela a la derecha, todas viven en la misma comunidad y se dedican al comercio con al venta de ropa, cosméticos y calzado.
texts.en: Ángela is 50 years old and is a single mother with 3 children. She lives in the town of Yoro, in the Yoro region. She began earning her own income selling bread and, after 7 years, decided to sell clothes, shoes, and sandals. She does this from her home and to order. She has decided to request a loan to buy merchandise such as clothes, cosmetics, and shoes to sell. Her goal is to make her business grow and to raise her family well. The loan is part of a group loan of $1,225 which the group will use to buy merchandise to sell. The group is called La Colonia 19 and is comprised of 4 women who appear in the photo: on the right is Alba, then Mirma, María, and Ángela at the right. They all live in the same community and are in business selling clothes, cosmetics, and shoes.

loans.use: to stock-up on merchandise such as clothes, shoes, and cosmetics to sell.

loans.name: Las Cañas Group

texts.es:
Ramón, tiene 42 años de edad, esta casado, tiene 4 hijos y reside en Sulaco, Yoro con su familia. El siempre se ha dedicado a la agricultura, cultiva granos básicos como maíz y frijol. Hace dos años decidio dedicarse también a la cria y engorde de pollo. El pollo lo vende destazado por libras en la misma comunidad. El préstamo que solicita es en forma grupal y es por 10,000 Lempiras, es el segundo ciclo que invierte en su negocio, y lo invertirá en la compra de pollos para engorde, destazo y venta de carne. Su plan es aumentar la producción y las ganancias, ser un gran empresario para darle mejor condición de vida a su familia.
El grupo de llama Las Cañas, integrado por 3 miembros en la foto esta Ramón camisa azul cuadriculada, Roberto camiseta roja y Osman camisa cuadriculada con blanco a la izquierda. Todos viven en la misma comunidad y se dedican a la agricultura y cría de pollos, han solicitado un préstamo grupal por 25,000 Lempiras para comprar mas pollos para engorde y venta.
texts.en:
Ramón is 42 years old. He is married with four children and lives with his wife in Sulaco, Yoro. He has always worked in farming, growing basic grains such as corn and beans. Two years ago he decided to dedicate himself to raising and fattening chickens. He sells the butchered chicken by the pound in the same community. 

He is asking for 10,000 lempiras as part of a group loan and this is the second cycle investing in his business. He will invest in the purchase of chickens for fattening and butchering and selling of the meat. His plan is to increase production and profits, and to be a great businessman in order to give his family a better quality of life.

The group is called Las Cañas and is made up of three members. Ramón is in the blue plaid shirt in the photo, Roberto is in the red shirt, and Osman is in the plaid shirt with white on the left. They all live in the same community and work in agriculture raising chickens, and have asked for a group loan of 25,000 lempiras in order to buy more chickens to fatten and sell.

loans.use: to buy chickens to fatten, butcher, and sell

loans.name: Maria Esmeralda

texts.es: María, tiene 27 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposo con quien tiene 4 hijos y vive en una aldea de Intibucá. María siempre se ha dedicado a la agricultura de maíz y frijol y hace dos años decidió cultivar una parcela de papas, la cual vende en el mercado local de la zona. Ha solicitado un préstamo por 12,000 lempiras para la compra de semilla de papa nueva y fertilizantes  con el fin de poder incrementar su área de cultivo y mejorar la producción. Tiene como plan seguir trabajando para superarse y que sus hijos estudien y en un futuro cosechar hortalizas también.
texts.en: María is 27 years old and lives with her partner with whom she has 4 children. She lives in the village of Intibucá. María has always worked in agriculture growing corn and beans and 2 years ago decided to grow a plot of potatoes which she sells in the local market. She has requested a loan of $625 to buy new potato seed and fertilizers with the goal of increasing the area that she cultivates and improving production. Her plan is to keep working in order to overcome challenges and that her children will study and to harvest vegetables in the future as well.

loans.use: to buy new potato seed and fertilizers.

loans.name: Bertha Lidia

texts.es: Bertha, tiene 40 años de edad, es casada, tiene dos hijos y reside en una aldea que pertenece a Nueva Frontera, Santa Bárbara. Ella se ha dedicado a la costura y hace un año decidió poner un negocio para vender materiales de construcción como ser cemento, clavos, alambre, herramientas de trabajo, varilla, tubos PVC, cables etc. Este negocio lo tiene en su casa. El préstamo que solicita es por 15,000 Lempiras para surtir de materiales de ferretería como cemento, varilla, clavo, alambre, tubos cables etc. Su objetivo es mantener surtido ya que tiene demanda y poder tener una ferretería grande para mejorar la calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Bertha, is 40 years old, married, and has two children. She lives in a village that is part of Nueva Frontera, Santa Bárbara. She has made a living sewing. 

A year ago she decided to start a business selling construction materials like cement, nails, wire, working tools, rods, PVC pipe, cables, etc. She runs the business from her home. 

The loan she is requesting is for 15,000 lempiras to stock her business with hardware supplies like cement, rods, nails, wire, tubes, cables, etc. Her goal is to stay stocked up, as there is a lot of demand, and be able to have a large hardware store to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to stock her business.

loans.name: Florentino

texts.es: Don Florentino, tiene 63 años de edad, es casado, tiene 5 hijos y vive en el municipio de Gracias, Lempira. Toda su vida la a dedicado a la agricultura, cultiva maíz, frijol y café. La producción de café la vende en grano seco despulpado en la misma zona. Ha solicitado varios prestamos para sus cultivos, actualmente solicita otro por 11,000 Lempiras para comprar abono y pago de mano de obra para el corte y cultivo de café. Su objetivo es mejorar la producción para obtener buenas ganancias y darle calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en: Florentino is 63 years old. He is married and has 5 children. He lives in the town of Gracias, Lempira. His whole life he has worked in agriculture. He grows corn, beans and coffee. He sells his coffee crop dry processed and pulped in the same area. He has asked for several loans for his crops. Right now he is asking for another loan for 11,000 Lempiras to buy fertilizer and to pay for labor to cut and grow coffee. His goal is to improve production to obtain good profits and to give his family a good quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pay for labor to cut and grow coffee.

loans.name: Alma Reina

texts.es:
Alma, tiene 35 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposa, tiene 5 hijos y vive en una aldea rural del Municipio de Gracias Lempira junto a dos de sus hijos.
Ella tiene varios años de dedicarse a la agricultura cultivando maíz, frijoles y café, también cultiva hortalizas. La producción de café y hortalizas la vende en el mercado local de la zona.
